                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S1.p22.m1.3"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S1.p22.m1.3">x</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S1.p22.m1.4"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S1.p22.m1.4">y</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. If <Math mode="inline" tex="q(x),q(y)" text="list@(q * x, q * y)" xml:id="S1.p22.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S1.p22.m2.3"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S1.p22.m2.4"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S1.p22.m2.3">
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S1.p22.m2.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S1.p22.m2.1">x</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S1.p22.m2.4">
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S1.p22.m2.2"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S1.p22.m2.2">y</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> are not <Math mode="inline" tex="\nu" text="nu" xml:id="S1.p22.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>-equivalent, say <Math mode="inline" tex="q(x){&lt;_{\nu}}q(y)" text="q * x less _ nu q * y" xml:id="S1.p22.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMApp meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                  <XMTok meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">&lt;</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S1.p22.m4.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S1.p22.m4.1">x</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S1.p22.m4.2"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S1.p22.m4.2">y</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, then <Math mode="inline" tex="b(x,y)^{2}{&lt;_{\nu}}q(y)^{2}" text="b * (open-interval@(x, y)) ^ 2 less _ nu q * y ^ 2" xml:id="S1.p22.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMApp meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                  <XMTok meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">&lt;</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S1.p22.m5.1"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S1.p22.m5.2"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S1.p22.m5.1">x</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S1.p22.m5.2">y</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S1.p22.m5.3"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S1.p22.m5.3">y</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, hence <Math mode="inline" tex="b(x,y){&lt;_{\nu}}q(y)" text="b * open-interval@(x, y) less _ nu q * y" xml:id="S1.p22.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMApp meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                  <XMTok meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">&lt;</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S1.p22.m6.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S1.p22.m6.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S1.p22.m6.1">x</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S1.p22.m6.2">y</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S1.p22.m6.3"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S1.p22.m6.3">y</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, and again the term <Math mode="inline" tex="b(x,y)" text="b * open-interval@(x, y)" xml:id="S1.p22.m7">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S1.p22.m7.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S1.p22.m7.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S1.p22.m7.1">x</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S1.p22.m7.2">y</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> can be omitted in <Math mode="inline" tex="(**)" xml:id="S1.p22.m8">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
              <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. If <Math mode="inline" tex="q(x){\cong_{\nu}}q(y)" text="q * x approximately-equals _ nu q * y" xml:id="S1.p22.m9">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMApp meaning="approximately-equals" role="RELOP">
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                  <XMTok meaning="approximately-equals" name="cong" role="RELOP">≅</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S1.p22.m9.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S1.p22.m9.1">x</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S1.p22.m9.2"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S1.p22.m9.2">y</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> then we have <Math mode="inline" tex="b(x,y)^{2}{\cong_{\nu}}q(x)^{2}" text="b * (open-interval@(x, y)) ^ 2 approximately-equals _ nu q * x ^ 2" xml:id="S1.p22.m10">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMApp meaning="approximately-equals" role="RELOP">
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                  <XMTok meaning="approximately-equals" name="cong" role="RELOP">≅</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S1.p22.m10.1"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S1.p22.m10.2"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S1.p22.m10.1">x</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S1.p22.m10.2">y</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S1.p22.m10.3"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S1.p22.m10.3">x</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, hence
<Math mode="inline" tex="b(x,y){\cong_{\nu}}q(x){\cong_{\nu}}q(y)," text="b * open-interval@(x, y) approximately-equals _ nu q * x approximately-equals _ nu q * y" xml:id="S1.p22.m11">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S1.p22.m11.5"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S1.p22.m11.5">
                    <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S1.p22.m11.1"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S1.p22.m11.2"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S1.p22.m11.1">x</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S1.p22.m11.2">y</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp meaning="approximately-equals" role="RELOP">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok meaning="approximately-equals" name="cong" role="RELOP">≅</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S1.p22.m11.3"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S1.p22.m11.3">x</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp meaning="approximately-equals" role="RELOP">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok meaning="approximately-equals" name="cong" role="RELOP">≅</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S1.p22.m11.4"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S1.p22.m11.4">y</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and the right hand side of <Math mode="inline" tex="(**)" xml:id="S1.p22.m12">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
              <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> equals <Math mode="inline" tex="eq(x)=q(x)+q(y)." text="e * q * x = q * x + q * y" xml:id="S1.p22.m13">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S1.p22.m13.4"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S1.p22.m13.4">
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S1.p22.m13.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S1.p22.m13.1">x</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S1.p22.m13.2"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S1.p22.m13.2">x</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S1.p22.m13.3"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S1.p22.m13.3">y</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> Thus <Math mode="inline" tex="(*)" text="*" xml:id="S1.p22.m14">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S1.p22.m14.1"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP" xml:id="S1.p22.m14.1">*</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> holds again.</p>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="S1.p23">
        <p>There remains the case that <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathcal{G}}" text="G" xml:id="S1.p23.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is discrete and <Math mode="inline" tex="b(x,y)^{2}{\cong_{\nu}}c_{0}q(x)q(y)." text="b * (open-interval@(x, y)) ^ 2 approximately-equals _ nu c _ 0 * q * x * q * y" xml:id="S1.p23.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S1.p23.m2.5"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S1.p23.m2.5">
                    <XMApp meaning="approximately-equals" role="RELOP">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok meaning="approximately-equals" name="cong" role="RELOP">≅</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S1.p23.m2.1"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S1.p23.m2.2"/>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S1.p23.m2.1">x</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S1.p23.m2.2">y</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S1.p23.m2.3"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S1.p23.m2.3">x</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S1.p23.m2.4"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S1.p23.m2.4">y</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> Now <Math mode="inline" tex="q(x)q(y)" text="q * x * q * y" xml:id="S1.p23.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S1.p23.m3.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S1.p23.m3.1">x</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S1.p23.m3.2"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S1.p23.m3.2">y</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is not a <Math mode="inline" tex="\nu" text="nu" xml:id="S1.p23.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>-square. We may assume that <Math mode="inline" tex="q(x){&lt;_{\nu}}q(y)" text="q * x less _ nu q * y" xml:id="S1.p23.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMApp meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                  <XMTok meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">&lt;</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S1.p23.m5.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S1.p23.m5.1">x</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S1.p23.m5.2"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S1.p23.m5.2">y</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Now <Math mode="inline" tex="c_{0}q(x){\leq_{\nu}}q(y)" text="c _ 0 * q * x less= _ nu q * y" xml:id="S1.p23.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMApp meaning="less-than-or-equals" role="RELOP">
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                  <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S1.p23.m6.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S1.p23.m6.1">x</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S1.p23.m6.2"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S1.p23.m6.2">y</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Hence <Math mode="inline" tex="b(x,y)^{2}{\leq_{\nu}}q(y)^{2}" text="b * (open-interval@(x, y)) ^ 2 less= _ nu q * y ^ 2" xml:id="S1.p23.m7">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMApp meaning="less-than-or-equals" role="RELOP">
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                  <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S1.p23.m7.1"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S1.p23.m7.2"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S1.p23.m7.1">x</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S1.p23.m7.2">y</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S1.p23.m7.3"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S1.p23.m7.3">y</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, and hence <Math mode="inline" tex="b(x,y){\leq_{\nu}}q(y)" text="b * open-interval@(x, y) less= _ nu q * y" xml:id="S1.p23.m8">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMApp meaning="less-than-or-equals" role="RELOP">
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                  <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S1.p23.m8.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S1.p23.m8.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S1.p23.m8.1">x</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S1.p23.m8.2">y</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S1.p23.m8.3"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S1.p23.m8.3">y</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. If <Math mode="inline" tex="b(x,y){&lt;_{\nu}}q(y)" text="b * open-interval@(x, y) less _ nu q * y" xml:id="S1.p23.m9">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMApp meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                  <XMTok meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">&lt;</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S1.p23.m9.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S1.p23.m9.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S1.p23.m9.1">x</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S1.p23.m9.2">y</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S1.p23.m9.3"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S1.p23.m9.3">y</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> we obtain <Math mode="inline" tex="(*)" text="*" xml:id="S1.p23.m10">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S1.p23.m10.1"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP" xml:id="S1.p23.m10.1">*</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> from <Math mode="inline" tex="(**)" xml:id="S1.p23.m11">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
              <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> as before. Otherwise <Math mode="inline" tex="b(x,y){\cong_{\nu}}q(y)" text="b * open-interval@(x, y) approximately-equals _ nu q * y" xml:id="S1.p23.m12">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMApp meaning="approximately-equals" role="RELOP">
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                  <XMTok meaning="approximately-equals" name="cong" role="RELOP">≅</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S1.p23.m12.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S1.p23.m12.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S1.p23.m12.1">x</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S1.p23.m12.2">y</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S1.p23.m12.3"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S1.p23.m12.3">y</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, and hence <Math mode="inline" tex="q(x+y)=eq(y)=q(x)+eq(y)." text="q * (x + y) = e * q * y = q * x + e * q * y" xml:id="S1.p23.m13">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S1.p23.m13.4"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S1.p23.m13.4">
                    <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S1.p23.m13.4.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S1.p23.m13.4.1">
                            <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S1.p23.m13.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S1.p23.m13.1">y</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S1.p23.m13.2"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S1.p23.m13.2">x</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S1.p23.m13.3"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S1.p23.m13.3">y</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> Thus, if <Math mode="inline" tex="q(y)\in eR," text="q * y element-of e * R" xml:id="S1.p23.m14">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S1.p23.m14.2"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S1.p23.m14.2">
                    <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S1.p23.m14.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S1.p23.m14.1">y</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> then <Math mode="inline" tex="q(x+y)=q(x)+q(y)." text="q * (x + y) = q * x + q * y" xml:id="S1.p23.m15">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S1.p23.m15.3"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S1.p23.m15.3">
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S1.p23.m15.3.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S1.p23.m15.3.1">
                            <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S1.p23.m15.1"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S1.p23.m15.1">x</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S1.p23.m15.2"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S1.p23.m15.2">y</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
∎</p>
      </para>
    </proof>
    <theorem class="ltx_theorem_remark" inlist="thm theorem:remark" labels="LABEL:rem:II.5.13" xml:id="S1.Thmthm13">
      <tags>
        <tag>Remark 13</tag>
        <tag role="refnum">13</tag>
        <tag role="typerefnum">Remark 13</tag>
      </tags>
      <title class="ltx_runin"><tag><text font="bold">Remark 13</text></tag></title>
      <para xml:id="S1.Thmthm13.p1">
        <p><text font="italic">The bad case is that <Math mode="inline" tex="R" text="R" xml:id="S1.Thmthm13.p1.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> is discrete, with <Math mode="inline" tex="c_{0}q(x){\cong_{\nu}}q(y){\cong_{\nu}}b(x,y)," text="c _ 0 * q * x approximately-equals _ nu q * y approximately-equals _ nu b * open-interval@(x, y)" xml:id="S1.Thmthm13.p1.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S1.Thmthm13.p1.m2.5"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S1.Thmthm13.p1.m2.5">
                      <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S1.Thmthm13.p1.m2.1"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

                            <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp meaning="approximately-equals" role="RELOP">

                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>

                            <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp meaning="approximately-equals" role="RELOP">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>

                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S1.Thmthm13.p1.m2.3"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S1.Thmthm13.p1.m2.4"/>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMWrap>

                            <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math> perhaps after interchanging <Math mode="inline" tex="x" text="x" xml:id="S1.Thmthm13.p1.m3">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="y" text="y" xml:id="S1.Thmthm13.p1.m4">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, and <Math mode="inline" tex="q(y)" text="q * y" xml:id="S1.Thmthm13.p1.m5">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S1.Thmthm13.p1.m5.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S1.Thmthm13.p1.m5.1">y</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> is tangible. Then <Math mode="inline" tex="q(x)+q(y)=q(y)," text="q * x + q * y = q * y" xml:id="S1.Thmthm13.p1.m6">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S1.Thmthm13.p1.m6.4"/>
                  <XMWrap>

                          <XMDual>
                            <XMRef idref="S1.Thmthm13.p1.m6.1"/>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>

                            <XMRef idref="S1.Thmthm13.p1.m6.2"/>
                            <XMWrap>

                      <XMApp>

                        <XMDual>

                    <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math> while <Math mode="inline" tex="q(x+y)=q(y)+b(x,y)=eq(y)." text="q * (x + y) = q * y + b * open-interval@(x, y) = e * q * y" xml:id="S1.Thmthm13.p1.m7">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>

    <theorem class="ltx_theorem_remark" inlist="thm theorem:remark" labels="LABEL:rem:II.5.14" xml:id="S1.Thmthm14">
      <tags>
        <tag>Remark 14</tag>
        <tag role="refnum">14</tag>
        <tag role="typerefnum">Remark 14</tag>
      </tags>
      <title class="ltx_runin"><tag><text font="bold">Remark 14</text></tag></title>
      <para xml:id="S1.Thmthm14.p1">
        <p><text font="italic">Let P be any of the properties in Definition <ref labelref="LABEL:def:II.5.10"/> <Math mode="inline" tex="({\operatorname{CS}},\dots)" text="open-interval@(CS, dots)" xml:id="S1.Thmthm14.p1.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S1.Thmthm14.p1.m1.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S1.Thmthm14.p1.m1.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post" xml:id="S1.Thmthm14.p1.m1.1">CS</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="upright" name="dots" role="ID" xml:id="S1.Thmthm14.p1.m1.2">…</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math> or – if <Math mode="inline" tex="R" text="R" xml:id="S1.Thmthm14.p1.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> is a tangible supersemifield – one of the conditions in Theorem <ref labelref="LABEL:thm:II.5.5"/>. Assume that <Math mode="inline" tex="{\lambda},\mu\in{\mathcal{T}}." text="list@(lambda, mu) element-of T" xml:id="S1.Thmthm14.p1.m3">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S1.Thmthm14.p1.m3.3"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S1.Thmthm14.p1.m3.3">
                      <XMTok font="upright" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S1.Thmthm14.p1.m3.1"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S1.Thmthm14.p1.m3.2"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S1.Thmthm14.p1.m3.1">λ</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                          <XMTok name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S1.Thmthm14.p1.m3.2">μ</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                      <XMTok font="caligraphic upright" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math> Then it is obvious that a pair <Math mode="inline" tex="(x,y)\in V\times V" text="open-interval@(x, y) element-of V * V" xml:id="S1.Thmthm14.p1.m4">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S1.Thmthm14.p1.m4.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S1.Thmthm14.p1.m4.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S1.Thmthm14.p1.m4.1">x</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S1.Thmthm14.p1.m4.2">y</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" meaning="times" role="MULOP">×</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> has property P iff <Math mode="inline" tex="({\lambda}x,\mu y)" text="open-interval@(lambda * x, mu * y)" xml:id="S1.Thmthm14.p1.m5">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S1.Thmthm14.p1.m5.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S1.Thmthm14.p1.m5.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S1.Thmthm14.p1.m5.1">
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S1.Thmthm14.p1.m5.2">
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math> has property P. Except for the properties discussed in Theorem <ref labelref="LABEL:thm:II.5.5"/>.b involving (<ref labelref="LABEL:eq:II.5.7"/>), this even remains true if <Math mode="inline" tex="{\lambda},\mu\in R{\setminus}\{0\}." text="list@(lambda, mu) element-of R set-minus set@(0)" xml:id="S1.Thmthm14.p1.m6">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S1.Thmthm14.p1.m6.4"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S1.Thmthm14.p1.m6.4">
                      <XMTok font="upright" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S1.Thmthm14.p1.m6.2"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S1.Thmthm14.p1.m6.3"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S1.Thmthm14.p1.m6.2">λ</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                          <XMTok name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S1.Thmthm14.p1.m6.3">μ</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="upright" meaning="set-minus" name="setminus" role="ADDOP">∖</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="set"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S1.Thmthm14.p1.m6.1"/>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="upright" meaning="0" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S1.Thmthm14.p1.m6.1">0</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math></text></p>
      </para>

  <section inlist="toc" labels="LABEL:sec:II.6" xml:id="S2">

    <title><tag close=". ">2</tag>CS-ratios: Definition and subadditivity </title>
    <toctitle><tag close=" ">2</tag>CS-ratios: Definition and subadditivity </toctitle>
<!--  %**** String Line 600 **** -->    <para xml:id="S2.p1">
      <p>If <Math mode="inline" tex="R" text="R" xml:id="S2.p1.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is any semiring and <Math mode="inline" tex="q:V\to R" text="q colon V to R" xml:id="S2.p1.m2">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok name="colon" role="METARELOP">:</XMTok>

                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
              </XMApp>

          </XMath>

          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
          </XMath>

          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, we call a vector <Math mode="inline" tex="x\in V{\setminus}\{0\}" text="x element-of V set-minus set@(0)" xml:id="S2.p1.m5">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="set-minus" name="setminus" role="ADDOP">∖</XMTok>

              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> <text font="bold">isotropic</text> if <Math mode="inline" tex="q(x)=0" text="q * x = 0" xml:id="S2.p1.m6">
          <XMath>

              <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>

                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S2.p1.m6.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.p1.m6.1">x</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> and <text font="bold">anisotropic</text> if <Math mode="inline" tex="q(x)\neq 0." text="q * x not-equals 0" xml:id="S2.p1.m7">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMRef idref="S2.p1.m7.2"/>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMApp xml:id="S2.p1.m7.2">
                  <XMTok meaning="not-equals" name="neq" role="RELOP">≠</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S2.p1.m7.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.p1.m7.1">x</XMTok>
