            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math> The zero vector in <Math mode="inline" tex="V" text="V" xml:id="S2.p1.m8">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is regarded both as isotropic and anisotropic. If the semiring <Math mode="inline" tex="R" text="R" xml:id="S2.p1.m9">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is supertropical, it follows directly from the definition of a quadratic from (cf. <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="QF1" separator="," yyseparator=","/>, Eq. (0.1) and Eq. (0.2)]</cite>) that the set of anisotropic vectors</p>
      <equation labels="LABEL:eq:II.6.1" xml:id="S2.E1">
        <tags>
          <tag>(2.1)</tag>
          <tag role="refnum">2.1</tag>
        </tags>
        <Math mode="display" tex="V_{\operatorname{an}}:=\{x\in V{\ {|}\ }q(x)\neq 0\}\cup\{0\}," text="V _ an assign conditional-set@(x element-of V, q * x not-equals 0) union set@(0)" xml:id="S2.E1.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMRef idref="S2.E1.m1.3"/>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMApp xml:id="S2.E1.m1.3">
                  <XMTok meaning="assign" role="RELOP">:=</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">an</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="union" name="cup" role="ADDOP">∪</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="conditional-set"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S2.E1.m1.3.1"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S2.E1.m1.3.2"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S2.E1.m1.3.1">
                          <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" rpadding="5.0pt">V</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="VERTBAR" rpadding="5.0pt" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S2.E1.m1.3.2">
                          <XMTok meaning="not-equals" name="neq" role="RELOP">≠</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMRef idref="S2.E1.m1.1"/>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.E1.m1.1">x</XMTok>
                                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="set"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S2.E1.m1.2"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                        <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S2.E1.m1.2">0</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math>
      </equation>
      <p>is an <Math mode="inline" tex="R" text="R" xml:id="S2.p1.m10">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>-submodule of <Math mode="inline" tex="V" text="V" xml:id="S2.p1.m11">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, and moreover</p>
      <equation labels="LABEL:eq:II.6.2" xml:id="S2.E2">
        <tags>
          <tag>(2.2)</tag>
          <tag role="refnum">2.2</tag>
        </tags>
        <Math mode="display" tex="V+V_{\operatorname{an}}=V_{\operatorname{an}}." text="V + V _ an = V _ an" xml:id="S2.E2.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMRef idref="S2.E2.m1.1"/>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMApp xml:id="S2.E2.m1.1">
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">an</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">an</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math>
      </equation>
    </para>
    <para xml:id="S2.p2">
      <p>We now always assume in this section that <Math mode="inline" tex="R" text="R" xml:id="S2.p2.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is supertropical, that <Math mode="inline" tex="eR" text="e * R" xml:id="S2.p2.m2">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> <text font="bold">is a nontrivial bipotent
semifield</text> (cf. Convention <ref labelref="LABEL:conv:II.5.9"/>), and that <Math mode="inline" tex="(q,b)" text="open-interval@(q, b)" xml:id="S2.p2.m3">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                <XMRef idref="S2.p2.m3.1"/>
                <XMRef idref="S2.p2.m3.2"/>
              </XMApp>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.p2.m3.1">q</XMTok>
                <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.p2.m3.2">b</XMTok>
                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is <text font="bold">a
fixed quadratic pair</text> on <Math mode="inline" tex="V." text="V" xml:id="S2.p2.m4">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMRef idref="S2.p2.m4.1"/>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.p2.m4.1">V</XMTok>
                <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math> We develop the concept of
“<text font="italic">CS-ratios</text>” for pairs of vectors in
<Math mode="inline" tex="V_{\operatorname{an}}." text="V _ an" xml:id="S2.p2.m5">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMRef idref="S2.p2.m5.1"/>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMApp xml:id="S2.p2.m5.1">
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">an</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math> To a large extent this may be viewed as a kind of
“trigonometry” in supertropical quadratic spaces.</p>
    </para>
    <para xml:id="S2.p3">
      <p>We start with a definition where the quadratic pair is not yet
needed.</p>
    </para>
    <theorem class="ltx_theorem_defn" inlist="thm theorem:defn" labels="LABEL:defn:II.6.1" xml:id="S2.Thmthm1">
      <tags>
        <tag>Definition 1</tag>
        <tag role="refnum">1</tag>
        <tag role="typerefnum">Definition 1</tag>
      </tags>
      <title class="ltx_runin"><tag><text font="bold">Definition 1</text></tag></title>
      <para xml:id="S2.Thmthm1.p1">
        <p><text font="italic">Given <Math mode="inline" tex="{\lambda}\in R" text="lambda element-of R" xml:id="S2.Thmthm1.p1.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                  <XMTok name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="\mu\in R{\setminus}\{0\}" text="mu element-of R set-minus set@(0)" xml:id="S2.Thmthm1.p1.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                  <XMTok name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" meaning="set-minus" name="setminus" role="ADDOP">∖</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="set"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S2.Thmthm1.p1.m2.1"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" meaning="0" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S2.Thmthm1.p1.m2.1">0</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> the
<Math mode="inline" tex="\nu" text="nu" xml:id="S2.Thmthm1.p1.m3">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math>-<text font="bold">ratio</text> <Math mode="inline" tex="\big{[}\frac{\lambda}{\mu}\big{]}_{\nu}" text="(delimited-[]@(lambda / mu)) _ nu" xml:id="S2.Thmthm1.p1.m4">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="delimited-[]"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S2.Thmthm1.p1.m4.1"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="120%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">[</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S2.Thmthm1.p1.m4.1">
                        <XMTok mathstyle="text" meaning="divide" role="FRACOP"/>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="120%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">]</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> is the
fraction <Math mode="inline" tex="\frac{e{\lambda}}{e\mu}" text="(e * lambda) / (e * mu)" xml:id="S2.Thmthm1.p1.m5">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok mathstyle="text" meaning="divide" role="FRACOP"/>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> in the semifield <Math mode="inline" tex="eR={\mathcal{G}}\cup\{0\}." text="e * R = G union set@(0)" xml:id="S2.Thmthm1.p1.m6">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S2.Thmthm1.p1.m6.2"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S2.Thmthm1.p1.m6.2">
                      <XMTok font="upright" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="upright" meaning="union" name="cup" role="ADDOP">∪</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="caligraphic upright" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="set"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S2.Thmthm1.p1.m6.1"/>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="upright" meaning="0" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S2.Thmthm1.p1.m6.1">0</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math> Thus for any <Math mode="inline" tex="\gamma\in R" text="gamma element-of R" xml:id="S2.Thmthm1.p1.m7">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                  <XMTok name="gamma" role="UNKNOWN">γ</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math></text></p>
        <equation labels="LABEL:eq:II.6.3" xml:id="S2.E3">
          <tags>
            <tag>(2.3)</tag>
            <tag role="refnum">2.3</tag>
          </tags>
          <Math mode="display" tex="\bigg{[}\frac{\lambda}{\mu}\bigg{]}_{\nu}\cong_{\nu}\gamma{\quad{%&#10;\Leftrightarrow}\quad}\gamma\mu\cong_{\nu}{\lambda}." text="formulae@((delimited-[]@(lambda / mu)) _ nu approximately-equals _ nu list@(gamma, Leftrightarrow), gamma * mu approximately-equals _ nu lambda)" xml:id="S2.E3.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S2.E3.m1.4"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMDual xml:id="S2.E3.m1.4">
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="formulae"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S2.E3.m1.4.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S2.E3.m1.4.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S2.E3.m1.4.1">
                        <XMApp meaning="approximately-equals" role="RELOP">
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok meaning="approximately-equals" name="cong" role="RELOP">≅</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="delimited-[]"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S2.E3.m1.1"/>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok fontsize="210%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">[</XMTok>
                              <XMApp xml:id="S2.E3.m1.1">
                                <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="divide" role="FRACOP"/>
                                <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMTok fontsize="210%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">]</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S2.E3.m1.2"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S2.E3.m1.3"/>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok font="italic" name="gamma" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.E3.m1.2">γ</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" name="quad" role="PUNCT"> </XMTok>
                            <XMTok name="Leftrightarrow" role="METARELOP" xml:id="S2.E3.m1.3">⇔</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="quad" role="PUNCT"> </XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S2.E3.m1.4.2">
                        <XMApp meaning="approximately-equals" role="RELOP">
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok meaning="approximately-equals" name="cong" role="RELOP">≅</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" name="gamma" role="UNKNOWN">γ</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
<!--  %**** String Line 625 **** -->                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
      </para>
    </theorem>
    <para xml:id="S2.p4">
      <p>This slightly funny notation reflects the desire in supertropical
algebra to work as much as possible with tangible elements.
Indeed, if <Math mode="inline" tex="R" text="R" xml:id="S2.p4.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> happens to be a tangible supersemifield (the most
important case for us), we can write all <Math mode="inline" tex="\nu" text="nu" xml:id="S2.p4.m2">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>-ratios <Math mode="inline" tex="\neq 0" text="absent not-equals 0" xml:id="S2.p4.m3">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="not-equals" name="neq" role="RELOP">≠</XMTok>
              <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
              <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> as
<Math mode="inline" tex="\big{[}\frac{\lambda}{\mu}\big{]}_{\nu}" text="(delimited-[]@(lambda / mu)) _ nu" xml:id="S2.p4.m4">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="delimited-[]"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S2.p4.m4.1"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok fontsize="120%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">[</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S2.p4.m4.1">
                    <XMTok mathstyle="text" meaning="divide" role="FRACOP"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok fontsize="120%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">]</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> with <Math mode="inline" tex="{\lambda},\mu\in{\mathcal{T}}." text="list@(lambda, mu) element-of T" xml:id="S2.p4.m5">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMRef idref="S2.p4.m5.3"/>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMApp xml:id="S2.p4.m5.3">
                  <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S2.p4.m5.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S2.p4.m5.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.p4.m5.1">λ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.p4.m5.2">μ</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math> Then the <Math mode="inline" tex="\nu" text="nu" xml:id="S2.p4.m6">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>-ratio <Math mode="inline" tex="\big{[}\frac{\lambda}{\mu}\big{]}_{\nu}" text="(delimited-[]@(lambda / mu)) _ nu" xml:id="S2.p4.m7">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="delimited-[]"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S2.p4.m7.1"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok fontsize="120%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">[</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S2.p4.m7.1">

    <theorem class="ltx_theorem_defn" inlist="thm theorem:defn" labels="LABEL:defn:II.6.2" xml:id="S2.Thmthm2">

      <para xml:id="S2.Thmthm2.p1">
        <p><text font="italic">Let <Math mode="inline" tex="x,y\in V_{\operatorname{an}}{\setminus}\{0\}." text="list@(x, y) element-of V _ an set-minus set@(0)" xml:id="S2.Thmthm2.p1.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S2.Thmthm2.p1.m1.4"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S2.Thmthm2.p1.m1.4">

                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="list"/>

                          <XMRef idref="S2.Thmthm2.p1.m1.3"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>

                          <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.Thmthm2.p1.m1.3">y</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="upright" meaning="set-minus" name="setminus" role="ADDOP">∖</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">an</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="set"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S2.Thmthm2.p1.m1.1"/>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="upright" meaning="0" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S2.Thmthm2.p1.m1.1">0</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math> We call</text></p>
        <equation xml:id="S2.Ex1">
          <Math mode="display" tex="{\operatorname{CS}}(x,y):=\bigg{[}\frac{b(x,y)^{2}}{q(x)q(y)}\bigg{]}_{\nu}" text="CS@(x, y) assign (delimited-[]@((b * (open-interval@(x, y)) ^ 2) / (q * x * q * y))) _ nu" xml:id="S2.Ex1.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="assign" role="RELOP">:=</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMRef idref="S2.Ex1.m1.5"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S2.Ex1.m1.6"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S2.Ex1.m1.7"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post" xml:id="S2.Ex1.m1.5">CS</XMTok>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.Ex1.m1.6">x</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.Ex1.m1.7">y</XMTok>

                    </XMWrap>

                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMDual>

                      <XMRef idref="S2.Ex1.m1.8"/>

                      <XMApp xml:id="S2.Ex1.m1.8">
                        <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="divide" role="FRACOP"/>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>

                              </XMApp>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p><text font="italic">the <text font="bold">CS-ratio</text> of the pair of vectors <Math mode="inline" tex="(x,y)" text="open-interval@(x, y)" xml:id="S2.Thmthm2.p1.m2">

    <theorem class="ltx_theorem_remark" inlist="thm theorem:remark" labels="LABEL:rem:II.6.3" xml:id="S2.Thmthm3">
      <tags>
        <tag>Remark 3</tag>
        <tag role="refnum">3</tag>
        <tag role="typerefnum">Remark 3</tag>
      </tags>
      <title class="ltx_runin"><tag><text font="bold">Remark 3</text></tag></title>
      <para xml:id="S2.Thmthm3.p1">
        <p><text font="italic">In case of anisotropic vectors <Math mode="inline" tex="x,y" text="list@(x, y)" xml:id="S2.Thmthm3.p1.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S2.Thmthm3.p1.m1.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S2.Thmthm3.p1.m1.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.Thmthm3.p1.m1.1">x</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.Thmthm3.p1.m1.2">y</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, we can reformulate Definition
<ref labelref="LABEL:def:II.5.10"/> as follows: The pair <Math mode="inline" tex="(x,y)" text="open-interval@(x, y)" xml:id="S2.Thmthm3.p1.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S2.Thmthm3.p1.m2.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S2.Thmthm3.p1.m2.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.Thmthm3.p1.m2.1">x</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.Thmthm3.p1.m2.2">y</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math> is CS iff
<Math mode="inline" tex="{\operatorname{CS}}(x,y)&lt;e;" text="CS@(x, y) less e" xml:id="S2.Thmthm3.p1.m3">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S2.Thmthm3.p1.m3.4"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S2.Thmthm3.p1.m3.4">
                      <XMTok font="upright" meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">&lt;</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMRef idref="S2.Thmthm3.p1.m3.1"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S2.Thmthm3.p1.m3.2"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S2.Thmthm3.p1.m3.3"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok font="upright" role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post" xml:id="S2.Thmthm3.p1.m3.1">CS</XMTok>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.Thmthm3.p1.m3.2">x</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>

                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMDual>
                      <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">;</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math> weakly
CS iff <Math mode="inline" tex="{\operatorname{CS}}(x,y)\leq e;" text="CS@(x, y) less= e" xml:id="S2.Thmthm3.p1.m4">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S2.Thmthm3.p1.m4.4"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S2.Thmthm3.p1.m4.4">
                      <XMTok font="upright" meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>

                </XMDual>

                    </XMApp>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> for any

              <XMath>

                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math> Notice also that</text></p>
        <equation labels="LABEL:eq:II.6.6" xml:id="S2.E5">
          <tags>
            <tag>(2.5)</tag>
            <tag role="refnum">2.5</tag>
          </tags>
          <Math mode="display" tex="{\operatorname{CS}}({\lambda}x,\mu y)={\operatorname{CS}}(x,y)" text="CS@(lambda * x, mu * y) = CS@(x, y)" xml:id="S2.E5.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>

                      <XMApp xml:id="S2.E5.m1.5">
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>

        </equation>
        <p><text font="italic">for any <Math mode="inline" tex="{\lambda},\mu\in R{\setminus}\{0\}." text="list@(lambda, mu) element-of R set-minus set@(0)" xml:id="S2.Thmthm4.p1.m2">

      </para>
    </theorem>
    <para xml:id="S2.p5">
      <p>Given vectors <Math mode="inline" tex="x,y,w\in V_{\operatorname{an}}" text="list@(x, y, w) element-of V _ an" xml:id="S2.p5.m1">
          <XMath>

        </Math>, we look for constraints on the

                  <XMApp xml:id="S2.p5.m3.3">
                    <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>

              </XMApp>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math> in terms of <Math mode="inline" tex="{\operatorname{CS}}(x,w)" text="CS@(x, w)" xml:id="S2.p5.m4">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMApp>

          <XMath>

          </XMath>
        </Math> We
need a lemma from <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="IzhakianRowen2007SuperTropical" separator="," yyseparator=","/>]</cite>, (in fact a weak
version of it), reproved here for the convenience of the reader.</p>

        <p><text font="italic">Assume

            </Math> is a semifield.<break/>Let <Math mode="inline" tex="a,b,c,d\in R." text="list@(a, b, c, d) element-of R" xml:id="S2.Thmthm5.p1.m2">

    </theorem>
    <proof>
      <title class="ltx_runin" font="italic"><!--  %**** String Line 675 **** -->Proof.</title>
      <para xml:id="S2.p6">
        <p>i): We assume without loss of generality that <Math mode="inline" tex="a\geq_{\nu}b." text="a &gt;= _ nu b" xml:id="S2.p6.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S2.p6.m1.1"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S2.p6.m1.1">
                    <XMApp meaning="greater-than-or-equals" role="RELOP">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math></p>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="S2.p7">
        <enumerate xml:id="S2.I2">
          <item xml:id="S2.I2.ix17">
            <tags>
              <tag>1.</tag>
              <tag role="typerefnum">item 1.</tag>
            </tags>
            <para xml:id="S2.I2.ix17.p1">
              <p><text font="italic">Case</text>: <Math mode="inline" tex="a\cong_{\nu}b\neq 0." text="a approximately-equals _ nu b not-equals 0" xml:id="S2.I2.ix17.p1.m1">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S2.I2.ix17.p1.m1.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S2.I2.ix17.p1.m1.1">
                          <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                          <XMApp meaning="approximately-equals" role="RELOP">
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                            <XMTok meaning="approximately-equals" name="cong" role="RELOP">≅</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>

                          <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMath>
                </Math> Now <Math mode="inline" tex="c\cong_{\nu}d." text="c approximately-equals _ nu d" xml:id="S2.I2.ix17.p1.m2">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S2.I2.ix17.p1.m2.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S2.I2.ix17.p1.m2.1">
                          <XMApp meaning="approximately-equals" role="RELOP">

                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMath>
                </Math> Both

                  <XMath>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S2.I2.ix17.p1.m3.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S2.I2.ix17.p1.m3.1">
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMath>
                </Math></p>
            </para>
          </item>
          <item xml:id="S2.I2.ix18">
            <tags>
              <tag>2.</tag>
              <tag role="typerefnum">item 2.</tag>
            </tags>
            <para xml:id="S2.I2.ix18.p1">
              <p><text font="italic">Case</text>: <Math mode="inline" tex="a&gt;_{\nu}b." text="a &gt; _ nu b" xml:id="S2.I2.ix18.p1.m1">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S2.I2.ix18.p1.m1.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S2.I2.ix18.p1.m1.1">
                          <XMApp meaning="greater-than" role="RELOP">
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                            <XMTok meaning="greater-than" role="RELOP">&gt;</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMath>
                </Math> Now <Math mode="inline" tex="bc\cong_{\nu}ad" text="b * c approximately-equals _ nu a * d" xml:id="S2.I2.ix18.p1.m2">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMApp meaning="approximately-equals" role="RELOP">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                        <XMTok meaning="approximately-equals" name="cong" role="RELOP">≅</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMath>
                </Math> implies that
<Math mode="inline" tex="c&gt;_{\nu}d" text="c &gt; _ nu d" xml:id="S2.I2.ix18.p1.m3">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMApp meaning="greater-than" role="RELOP">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                        <XMTok meaning="greater-than" role="RELOP">&gt;</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMath>
                </Math> or <Math mode="inline" tex="c=d=0." text="c = d = 0" xml:id="S2.I2.ix18.p1.m4">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S2.I2.ix18.p1.m4.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S2.I2.ix18.p1.m4.1">
                          <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                          <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                          <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                          <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMath>
                </Math> If <Math mode="inline" tex="c=d=0" text="c = d = 0" xml:id="S2.I2.ix18.p1.m5">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                      <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                      <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                      <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMath>
                </Math>, both sides of (<ref labelref="LABEL:eq:II.6.8"/>)
are zero. Otherwise <Math mode="inline" tex="ac&gt;_{\nu}bd," text="a * c &gt; _ nu b * d" xml:id="S2.I2.ix18.p1.m6">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S2.I2.ix18.p1.m6.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S2.I2.ix18.p1.m6.1">
                          <XMApp meaning="greater-than" role="RELOP">
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                            <XMTok meaning="greater-than" role="RELOP">&gt;</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMath>
                </Math> and both sides of
(<ref labelref="LABEL:eq:II.6.8"/>) equal <Math mode="inline" tex="ac." text="a * c" xml:id="S2.I2.ix18.p1.m7">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S2.I2.ix18.p1.m7.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S2.I2.ix18.p1.m7.1">
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMath>
                </Math></p>
            </para>
          </item>
          <item xml:id="S2.I2.ix19">
            <tags>
              <tag>3.</tag>
              <tag role="typerefnum">item 3.</tag>
            </tags>
            <para xml:id="S2.I2.ix19.p1">
              <p><text font="italic">Case</text>: <Math mode="inline" tex="a=b=0." text="a = b = 0" xml:id="S2.I2.ix19.p1.m1">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S2.I2.ix19.p1.m1.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S2.I2.ix19.p1.m1.1">
                          <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                          <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
                          <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                          <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMath>
                </Math> Both sides of (<ref labelref="LABEL:eq:II.6.8"/>) are zero.</p>
            </para>
          </item>
        </enumerate>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="S2.p8">
        <p>ii): This is evident.
∎</p>
      </para>
    </proof>
    <para xml:id="S2.p9">
      <p>We now are ready for a theorem, which states subadditivity of the function <Math mode="inline" tex="x\mapsto{\operatorname{CS}}(x,w)" text="x maps-to CS@(x, w)" xml:id="S2.p9.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="maps-to" name="mapsto" role="ARROW">↦</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMRef idref="S2.p9.m1.1"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S2.p9.m1.2"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S2.p9.m1.3"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post" xml:id="S2.p9.m1.1">CS</XMTok>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.p9.m1.2">x</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.p9.m1.3">w</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMApp>
              </XMDual>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> from <Math mode="inline" tex="V_{\operatorname{an}}{\setminus}\{0\}" text="V _ an set-minus set@(0)" xml:id="S2.p9.m2">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="set-minus" name="setminus" role="ADDOP">∖</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">an</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="set"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S2.p9.m2.1"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                  <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S2.p9.m2.1">0</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> to <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathcal{G}}" text="G" xml:id="S2.p9.m3">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> for a fixed <Math mode="inline" tex="w" text="w" xml:id="S2.p9.m4">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, together with refinements of this fact.</p>
    </para>
    <theorem class="ltx_theorem_thm" inlist="thm theorem:thm" labels="LABEL:thm:II.6.10" xml:id="S2.Thmthm6">

      <para xml:id="S2.Thmthm6.p1">
        <p><text font="italic">Let <Math mode="inline" tex="x,y,w" text="list@(x, y, w)" xml:id="S2.Thmthm6.p1.m1">

                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math> be anisotropic vectors in <Math mode="inline" tex="V." text="V" xml:id="S2.Thmthm6.p1.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>

            </Math></text></p>

      <para xml:id="S2.Thmthm6.p2">
        <enumerate xml:id="S2.I3">
          <item xml:id="S2.I3.ix20">

              <p><text font="italic">Then
</text><!--  %**** String Line 700 **** --></p>
              <equation labels="LABEL:eq:II.6.10" xml:id="S2.E8">

                      <XMWrap>

                              <XMRef idref="S2.E8.m1.1"/>

          <item xml:id="S2.I3.ix21">
            <tags>
              <tag>b)</tag>
              <tag role="typerefnum">item b)</tag>
            </tags>
            <para xml:id="S2.I3.ix21.p1">
              <p><text font="italic">If </text><Math mode="inline" tex="q(x+y)" text="q * (x + y)" xml:id="S2.I3.ix21.p1.m1">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S2.I3.ix21.p1.m1.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S2.I3.ix21.p1.m1.1">
                            <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMath>
                </Math><text font="italic"> is </text><text font="bold italic">not</text><text font="italic"> </text><Math mode="inline" tex="\nu" text="nu" xml:id="S2.I3.ix21.p1.m2">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
                  </XMath>
                </Math><text font="italic">-equivalent to
</text><Math mode="inline" tex="q(x)+q(y)" text="q * x + q * y" xml:id="S2.I3.ix21.p1.m3">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S2.I3.ix21.p1.m3.1"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.I3.ix21.p1.m3.1">x</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S2.I3.ix21.p1.m3.2"/>

                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMath>
                </Math><text font="italic"> and also </text><Math mode="inline" tex="{\operatorname{CS}}(x,w)+{\operatorname{CS}}(y,w)\neq 0," text="CS@(x, w) + CS@(y, w) not-equals 0" xml:id="S2.I3.ix21.p1.m4">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S2.I3.ix21.p1.m4.7"/>

                            <XMDual>

              <equation labels="LABEL:eq:II.6.12" xml:id="S2.E10">
                <tags>
                  <tag>(2.10)</tag>
                  <tag role="refnum">2.10</tag>
                </tags>
                <Math mode="display" tex="{\operatorname{CS}}(x+y,w){\ {=}\ }{\operatorname{CS}}(x,w)+{\operatorname{CS}%&#10;}(y,w)." text="CS@(x + y, w) = CS@(x, w) + CS@(y, w)" xml:id="S2.E10.m1">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S2.E10.m1.9"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S2.E10.m1.9">
                          <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP" rpadding="5.0pt">=</XMTok>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMRef idref="S2.E10.m1.1"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S2.E10.m1.9.1"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S2.E10.m1.2"/>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post" xml:id="S2.E10.m1.1">CS</XMTok>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                <XMApp xml:id="S2.E10.m1.9.1">
                                  <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.E10.m1.2">w</XMTok>
                                <XMTok role="CLOSE" rpadding="5.0pt" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMRef idref="S2.E10.m1.3"/>
                                <XMRef idref="S2.E10.m1.4"/>
                                <XMRef idref="S2.E10.m1.5"/>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post" xml:id="S2.E10.m1.3">CS</XMTok>
                                <XMWrap>
                                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.E10.m1.4">x</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.E10.m1.5">w</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                </XMWrap>
                              </XMApp>
                            </XMDual>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMRef idref="S2.E10.m1.6"/>
                                <XMRef idref="S2.E10.m1.7"/>
                                <XMRef idref="S2.E10.m1.8"/>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post" xml:id="S2.E10.m1.6">CS</XMTok>
                                <XMWrap>
                                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.E10.m1.7">y</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.E10.m1.8">w</XMTok>

                                </XMWrap>
                              </XMApp>
                            </XMDual>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMath>
                </Math>
              </equation>
<!--  %**** String Line 725 **** -->            </para>
          </item>
        </enumerate>
      </para>
    </theorem>
    <proof>
      <title class="ltx_runin" font="italic">Proof.</title>
      <para xml:id="S2.p10">
        <p>Let <Math mode="inline" tex="c:={\operatorname{CS}}(x,w)," text="c assign CS@(x, w)" xml:id="S2.p10.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S2.p10.m1.4"/>

                  <XMApp xml:id="S2.p10.m1.4">

                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMRef idref="S2.p10.m1.1"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S2.p10.m1.2"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S2.p10.m1.3"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post" xml:id="S2.p10.m1.1">CS</XMTok>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.p10.m1.2">x</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.p10.m1.3">w</XMTok>

                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> <Math mode="inline" tex="d:={\operatorname{CS}}(y,w)." text="d assign CS@(y, w)" xml:id="S2.p10.m2">
            <XMath>

          </Math> Thus</p>

        <p>Adding these two relations and using that
<Math mode="inline" tex="({\lambda}+\mu)^{2}={\lambda}^{2}+\mu^{2}" text="(lambda + mu) ^ 2 = lambda ^ 2 + mu ^ 2" xml:id="S2.p10.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S2.p10.m3.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S2.p10.m3.1">
                        <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> for <Math mode="inline" tex="{\lambda},\mu\in R," text="list@(lambda, mu) element-of R" xml:id="S2.p10.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S2.p10.m4.3"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S2.p10.m4.3">
                    <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S2.p10.m4.1"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S2.p10.m4.2"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.p10.m4.1">λ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.p10.m4.2">μ</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> we obtain</p>

        <p>Putting
<Math mode="inline" tex="a:=q(x)," text="a assign q * x" xml:id="S2.p10.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S2.p10.m5.2"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S2.p10.m5.2">
                    <XMTok meaning="assign" role="RELOP">:=</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S2.p10.m5.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.p10.m5.1">x</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> <Math mode="inline" tex="b:=q(y)," text="b assign q * y" xml:id="S2.p10.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S2.p10.m6.2"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S2.p10.m6.2">
                    <XMTok meaning="assign" role="RELOP">:=</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S2.p10.m6.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S2.p10.m6.1">y</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> we trivially have</p>
        <equation xml:id="S2.Ex4">
          <Math mode="display" tex="ac+bd\leq_{\nu}(a+b)(c+d)," text="a * c + b * d less= _ nu (a + b) * (c + d)" xml:id="S2.Ex4.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S2.Ex4.m1.1"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S2.Ex4.m1.1">
                    <XMApp meaning="less-than-or-equals" role="RELOP">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S2.Ex4.m1.1.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S2.Ex4.m1.1.1">
                            <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S2.Ex4.m1.1.2"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S2.Ex4.m1.1.2">
                            <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>and further</p>
        <equation xml:id="S2.Ex5">
          <Math mode="display" tex="a+b\leq_{\nu}q(x)+q(y)+b(x,y)=q(x+y)." text="a + b less= _ nu q * x + q * y + b * open-interval@(x, y) = q * (x + y)" xml:id="S2.Ex5.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>

                        </XMDual>

                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>

                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>

                          </XMApp>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S2.Ex5.m1.5.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

                            <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>

                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>

                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>We conclude that</p>
        <equation xml:id="S2.Ex6">
          <Math mode="display" tex="b(x+y,w)^{2}\leq_{\nu}(a+b)(c+d)q(w)\leq_{\nu}(c+d)q(x+y)q(w)." text="b * (open-interval@(x + y, w)) ^ 2 less= _ nu (a + b) * (c + d) * q * w less= _ nu (c + d) * q * (x + y) * q * w" xml:id="S2.Ex6.m1">

        </equation>
        <p>This tells us that <Math mode="inline" tex="{\operatorname{CS}}(x+y,w)\leq c+d," text="CS@(x + y, w) less= c + d" xml:id="S2.p10.m7">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S2.p10.m7.3"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S2.p10.m7.3">

                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMRef idref="S2.p10.m7.1"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S2.p10.m7.3.1"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S2.p10.m7.2"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post" xml:id="S2.p10.m7.1">CS</XMTok>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S2.p10.m7.3.1">
                            <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>

                          </XMApp>

                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>

                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> which is claim a) of the
theorem. Moreover, if <Math mode="inline" tex="a+b&lt;_{\nu}q(x+y)" text="a + b less _ nu q * (x + y)" xml:id="S2.p10.m8">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMApp meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>

                </XMApp>

                    <XMRef idref="S2.p10.m8.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S2.p10.m8.1">
                        <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>

                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="c+d\neq 0," text="c + d not-equals 0" xml:id="S2.p10.m9">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S2.p10.m9.1"/>

                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>

              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> then</p>
        <equation xml:id="S2.Ex7">
          <Math mode="display" tex="b(x+y,w)^{2}&lt;_{\nu}(c+d)q(x+y)q(w)," text="b * (open-interval@(x + y, w)) ^ 2 less _ nu (c + d) * q * (x + y) * q * w" xml:id="S2.Ex7.m1">

                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

                            <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
