            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>which is claim b) of the theorem.</p>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="S2.p11">
        <p>Henceforth we assume that <Math mode="inline" tex="q(x+y)\cong_{\nu}a+b" text="q * (x + y) approximately-equals _ nu a + b" xml:id="S2.p11.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMApp meaning="approximately-equals" role="RELOP">
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok meaning="approximately-equals" name="cong" role="RELOP">≅</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S2.p11.m1.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S2.p11.m1.1">
                        <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and now have to
prove equation (<ref labelref="LABEL:eq:II.6.12"/>). By (<ref labelref="LABEL:eq:II.6.13"/>) above the equation
means that
<!--  %**** String Line 750 **** --></p>
        <equation xml:id="S2.Ex8">
          <Math mode="display" tex="ac+bd\cong_{\nu}(a+b)(c+d)." text="a * c + b * d approximately-equals _ nu (a + b) * (c + d)" xml:id="S2.Ex8.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S2.Ex8.m1.1"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S2.Ex8.m1.1">
                    <XMApp meaning="approximately-equals" role="RELOP">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok meaning="approximately-equals" name="cong" role="RELOP">≅</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S2.Ex8.m1.1.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S2.Ex8.m1.1.1">
                            <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S2.Ex8.m1.1.2"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S2.Ex8.m1.1.2">
                            <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>We know by Lemma <ref labelref="LABEL:lem:II.6.9"/> that this holds if <Math mode="inline" tex="ad\cong_{\nu}bc," text="a * d approximately-equals _ nu b * c" xml:id="S2.p11.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S2.p11.m2.1"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S2.p11.m2.1">
                    <XMApp meaning="approximately-equals" role="RELOP">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok meaning="approximately-equals" name="cong" role="RELOP">≅</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
and also if <Math mode="inline" tex="a\cong_{\nu}c" text="a approximately-equals _ nu c" xml:id="S2.p11.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMApp meaning="approximately-equals" role="RELOP">
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok meaning="approximately-equals" name="cong" role="RELOP">≅</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> or <Math mode="inline" tex="b\cong_{\nu}d." text="b approximately-equals _ nu d" xml:id="S2.p11.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S2.p11.m4.1"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S2.p11.m4.1">
                    <XMApp meaning="approximately-equals" role="RELOP">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok meaning="approximately-equals" name="cong" role="RELOP">≅</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> {We only need the
statement (<ref labelref="LABEL:eq:II.6.9"/>) in the lemma, leaving the more
interesting assertion (<ref labelref="LABEL:eq:II.6.8"/>) for later use.} This proves part c) of
the theorem.∎</p>
      </para>
    </proof>
  </section>
  <section inlist="toc" labels="LABEL:sec:II.7" xml:id="S3">

    </tags>
    <title><tag close=". ">3</tag>A table of <Math mode="inline" tex="q" text="q" xml:id="S3.m1">
        <XMath>
          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
        </XMath>
      </Math>-values, and CS-ratios of pairs of vectors</title>
    <toctitle><tag close=" ">3</tag>A table of <Math mode="inline" tex="q" text="q" xml:id="S3.m2">
        <XMath>
          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
        </XMath>
      </Math>-values, and CS-ratios of pairs of vectors</toctitle>
    <para xml:id="S3.p1">
      <p>Throughout this section <Math mode="inline" tex="V" text="V" xml:id="S3.p1.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is a module over a tangible supersemifield <Math mode="inline" tex="R" text="R" xml:id="S3.p1.m2">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, and <Math mode="inline" tex="(q,b)" text="open-interval@(q, b)" xml:id="S3.p1.m3">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                <XMRef idref="S3.p1.m3.1"/>
                <XMRef idref="S3.p1.m3.2"/>
              </XMApp>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p1.m3.1">q</XMTok>
                <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p1.m3.2">b</XMTok>
                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is a quadratic pair on <Math mode="inline" tex="V" text="V" xml:id="S3.p1.m4">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>. We fix a pair of vectors <Math mode="inline" tex="(x,y)\in V\times V" text="open-interval@(x, y) element-of V * V" xml:id="S3.p1.m5">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p1.m5.1"/>

                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p1.m5.1">x</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p1.m5.2">y</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">×</XMTok>

                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> and use the abbreviations</p>
      <equation labels="LABEL:eq:II.7.1" xml:id="S3.E1">

        </Math>
      </equation>
      <p>Our first goal is to compile a table of values of the function <Math mode="inline" tex="R\times R\to R" text="R * R to R" xml:id="S3.p1.m6">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok name="to" role="ARROW">→</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">×</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, <Math mode="inline" tex="({\lambda},\mu)\mapsto q({\lambda}x+\mu y)" text="open-interval@(lambda, mu) maps-to q * (lambda * x + mu * y)" xml:id="S3.p1.m7">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="maps-to" name="mapsto" role="ARROW">↦</XMTok>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p1.m7.1"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p1.m7.2"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p1.m7.1">λ</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p1.m7.2">μ</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p1.m7.3"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S3.p1.m7.3">
                      <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, using the parameters <Math mode="inline" tex="{\alpha}_{1},{\alpha}_{2},{\alpha}." text="list@(alpha _ 1, alpha _ 2, alpha)" xml:id="S3.p1.m8">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>

                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>

                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>

                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>

                  </XMWrap>

                <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math> We then will use the table (Propositions <ref labelref="LABEL:prop:II.7.4"/> and <ref labelref="LABEL:prop:II.7.7"/>) for various purposes here and in the sequels of this paper.</p>
    </para>
    <para xml:id="S3.p2">
      <p>For establishing the table we may replace <Math mode="inline" tex="V" text="V" xml:id="S3.p2.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> by the free module <Math mode="inline" tex="R{\varepsilon}_{1}+R{\varepsilon}_{2}" text="R * varepsilon _ 1 + R * varepsilon _ 2" xml:id="S3.p2.m2">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> with base <Math mode="inline" tex="{\varepsilon}_{1},{\varepsilon}_{2}" text="list@(varepsilon _ 1, varepsilon _ 2)" xml:id="S3.p2.m3">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="list"/>

                <XMRef idref="S3.p2.m3.2"/>
              </XMApp>
              <XMWrap>

                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>

            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, the vector pair <Math mode="inline" tex="(x,y)" text="open-interval@(x, y)" xml:id="S3.p2.m4">
          <XMath>

                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>

                </XMApp>
                <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                <XMApp xml:id="S3.p2.m5.2">
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>

              </XMWrap>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, and the quadratic pair <Math mode="inline" tex="(q,b)" text="open-interval@(q, b)" xml:id="S3.p2.m6">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                <XMRef idref="S3.p2.m6.1"/>
                <XMRef idref="S3.p2.m6.2"/>
              </XMApp>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p2.m6.1">q</XMTok>
                <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p2.m6.2">b</XMTok>
                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math> by the quadratic pair <Math mode="inline" tex="({\tilde{q}},{\tilde{b}})" text="open-interval@(tilde@(q), tilde@(b))" xml:id="S3.p2.m7">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                <XMRef idref="S3.p2.m7.1"/>
                <XMRef idref="S3.p2.m7.2"/>
              </XMApp>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                <XMApp xml:id="S3.p2.m7.1">
                  <XMTok name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                <XMApp xml:id="S3.p2.m7.2">
                  <XMTok name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math> on <Math mode="inline" tex="R{\varepsilon}_{1}+R{\varepsilon}_{2}" text="R * varepsilon _ 1 + R * varepsilon _ 2" xml:id="S3.p2.m8">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, obtained by composing <Math mode="inline" tex="(q,b)" text="open-interval@(q, b)" xml:id="S3.p2.m9">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                <XMRef idref="S3.p2.m9.1"/>
                <XMRef idref="S3.p2.m9.2"/>
              </XMApp>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p2.m9.1">q</XMTok>
                <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p2.m9.2">b</XMTok>
                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math> with the bilinear map</p>
      <equation xml:id="S3.Ex1">
        <Math mode="display" tex="\chi:R{\varepsilon}_{1}+R{\varepsilon}_{2}{\ {\to}\ }V" text="chi colon R * varepsilon _ 1 + R * varepsilon _ 2 to V" xml:id="S3.Ex1.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok name="colon" role="METARELOP">:</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="chi" role="UNKNOWN">χ</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok name="to" role="ARROW" rpadding="5.0pt">→</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                    <XMApp rpadding="5.0pt">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>
      </equation>
      <p>with <Math mode="inline" tex="\chi({\varepsilon}_{1})=x" text="chi * varepsilon _ 1 = x" xml:id="S3.p2.m10">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="chi" role="UNKNOWN">χ</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p2.m10.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S3.p2.m10.1">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, <Math mode="inline" tex="\chi({\varepsilon}_{2})=y" text="chi * varepsilon _ 2 = y" xml:id="S3.p2.m11">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="chi" role="UNKNOWN">χ</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p2.m11.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S3.p2.m11.1">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, as described in (<ref labelref="LABEL:eq:II.5.2"/>)–(<ref labelref="LABEL:eq:II.5.4"/>). Thus we may assume that <Math mode="inline" tex="V" text="V" xml:id="S3.p2.m12">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is free with base <Math mode="inline" tex="x,y" text="list@(x, y)" xml:id="S3.p2.m13">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                <XMRef idref="S3.p2.m13.1"/>
                <XMRef idref="S3.p2.m13.2"/>
              </XMApp>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p2.m13.1">x</XMTok>
                <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p2.m13.2">y</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math> and</p>
      <equation xml:id="S3.Ex2">
        <Math mode="display" tex="q=\begin{bmatrix}{\alpha}_{1}&amp;{\alpha}\\&#10;&amp;{\alpha}_{2}\end{bmatrix}," text="q = matrix[[alpha _ 1, alpha], [absent, alpha _ 2]]" xml:id="S3.Ex2.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMRef idref="S3.Ex2.m1.2"/>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMApp xml:id="S3.Ex2.m1.2">
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.Ex2.m1.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="true">[</XMTok>
                      <XMArray meaning="matrix" xml:id="S3.Ex2.m1.1">
                        <XMRow>
                          <XMCell align="center">
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post7"/>
                              <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMCell>
                          <XMCell align="center">
                            <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                          </XMCell>
                        </XMRow>
                        <XMRow>
                          <XMCell align="center">
                            <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                          </XMCell>
                          <XMCell align="center">
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post7"/>
                              <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMCell>
                        </XMRow>
                      </XMArray>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="true">]</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math>
      </equation>
      <p>whenever we feel that this is convenient.</p>
    </para>
    <para xml:id="S3.p3">
      <p>We do not assume this now, but we extend <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="QF1" separator="," yyseparator=","/>, Convention 7.10]</cite> for the parameters <Math mode="inline" tex="{\alpha}_{1},{\alpha}_{2},{\alpha}" text="list@(alpha _ 1, alpha _ 2, alpha)" xml:id="S3.p3.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                <XMRef idref="S3.p3.m1.2"/>
                <XMRef idref="S3.p3.m1.3"/>
                <XMRef idref="S3.p3.m1.1"/>
              </XMApp>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMApp xml:id="S3.p3.m1.2">
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                <XMApp xml:id="S3.p3.m1.3">
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p3.m1.1">α</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math> to the present situation in case that <Math mode="inline" tex="{\alpha}_{1}\neq 0" text="alpha _ 1 not-equals 0" xml:id="S3.p3.m2">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="not-equals" name="neq" role="RELOP">≠</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="{\alpha}_{2}\neq 0" text="alpha _ 2 not-equals 0" xml:id="S3.p3.m3">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="not-equals" name="neq" role="RELOP">≠</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>. Thus we have an element <Math mode="inline" tex="{\xi}\in{\mathcal{T}}^{1/2}" text="xi element-of T ^ (1 / 2)" xml:id="S3.p3.m4">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="xi" role="UNKNOWN">ξ</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="divide" role="MULOP">/</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> with <Math mode="inline" tex="{\alpha}_{1}{\xi}\cong_{\nu}{\alpha}_{2}," text="alpha _ 1 * xi approximately-equals _ nu alpha _ 2" xml:id="S3.p3.m5">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMRef idref="S3.p3.m5.1"/>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMApp xml:id="S3.p3.m5.1">
                  <XMApp meaning="approximately-equals" role="RELOP">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok meaning="approximately-equals" name="cong" role="RELOP">≅</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="xi" role="UNKNOWN">ξ</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="{\xi}\in{\mathcal{T}}" text="xi element-of T" xml:id="S3.p3.m6">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="xi" role="UNKNOWN">ξ</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> if <Math mode="inline" tex="{\alpha}_{1}{\alpha}_{2}" text="alpha _ 1 * alpha _ 2" xml:id="S3.p3.m7">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is a <Math mode="inline" tex="\nu" text="nu" xml:id="S3.p3.m8">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>-square. In the case that <Math mode="inline" tex="R" text="R" xml:id="S3.p3.m9">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is discrete and <Math mode="inline" tex="{\alpha}_{1}{\alpha}_{2}" text="alpha _ 1 * alpha _ 2" xml:id="S3.p3.m10">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is not a <Math mode="inline" tex="\nu" text="nu" xml:id="S3.p3.m11">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>-square, we furthermore have elements <Math mode="inline" tex="{\sigma},\tau" text="list@(sigma, tau)" xml:id="S3.p3.m12">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                <XMRef idref="S3.p3.m12.1"/>
                <XMRef idref="S3.p3.m12.2"/>
              </XMApp>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p3.m12.1">σ</XMTok>
                <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="tau" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p3.m12.2">τ</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math> in <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathcal{T}}" text="T" xml:id="S3.p3.m13">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, such that <Math mode="inline" tex="e\tau&lt;e{\sigma}" text="e * tau less e * sigma" xml:id="S3.p3.m14">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">&lt;</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="tau" role="UNKNOWN">τ</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN">σ</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="e\tau,e{\sigma}" text="list@(e * tau, e * sigma)" xml:id="S3.p3.m15">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                <XMRef idref="S3.p3.m15.1"/>
                <XMRef idref="S3.p3.m15.2"/>
              </XMApp>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMApp xml:id="S3.p3.m15.1">
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="tau" role="UNKNOWN">τ</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                <XMApp xml:id="S3.p3.m15.2">
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN">σ</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math> are the elements of <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathcal{G}}" text="G" xml:id="S3.p3.m16">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> nearest to <Math mode="inline" tex="e{\xi}" text="e * xi" xml:id="S3.p3.m17">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="xi" role="UNKNOWN">ξ</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> in the totally ordered set <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathcal{G}}^{1/2}," text="G ^ (1 / 2)" xml:id="S3.p3.m18">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMRef idref="S3.p3.m18.1"/>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMApp xml:id="S3.p3.m18.1">
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="divide" role="MULOP">/</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math> i.e. <Math mode="inline" tex="\tau&lt;_{\nu}{\xi}&lt;_{\nu}{\sigma}" text="tau less _ nu xi less _ nu sigma" xml:id="S3.p3.m19">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="tau" role="UNKNOWN">τ</XMTok>
              <XMApp meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">&lt;</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="xi" role="UNKNOWN">ξ</XMTok>
              <XMApp meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">&lt;</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN">σ</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="\tau\cong_{\nu}\pi{\sigma}." text="tau approximately-equals _ nu pi * sigma" xml:id="S3.p3.m20">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMRef idref="S3.p3.m20.1"/>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMApp xml:id="S3.p3.m20.1">
                  <XMApp meaning="approximately-equals" role="RELOP">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok meaning="approximately-equals" name="cong" role="RELOP">≅</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="tau" role="UNKNOWN">τ</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN">σ</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math></p>
    </para>
    <para xml:id="S3.p4">
      <p>We enrich the setting of <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="QF1" separator="," yyseparator=","/>, Convention 7.10]</cite> as follows.</p>
    </para>
    <theorem class="ltx_theorem_notation" inlist="thm theorem:notation" labels="LABEL:notat:II.7.1" xml:id="S3.Thmthm1">
      <tags>
        <tag>Notation 1</tag>
        <tag role="refnum">1</tag>
        <tag role="typerefnum">Notation 1</tag>
      </tags>
      <title class="ltx_runin"><tag><text font="bold">Notation 1</text></tag></title>
      <para xml:id="S3.Thmthm1.p1">
        <p><text font="italic">Assume that <Math mode="inline" tex="{\alpha}_{1}\neq 0" text="alpha _ 1 not-equals 0" xml:id="S3.Thmthm1.p1.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="not-equals" name="neq" role="RELOP">≠</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, <Math mode="inline" tex="{\alpha}_{2}\neq 0" text="alpha _ 2 not-equals 0" xml:id="S3.Thmthm1.p1.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="not-equals" name="neq" role="RELOP">≠</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, <Math mode="inline" tex="{\alpha}\neq 0" text="alpha not-equals 0" xml:id="S3.Thmthm1.p1.m3">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="not-equals" name="neq" role="RELOP">≠</XMTok>
                  <XMTok name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>.
We choose <Math mode="inline" tex="{\zeta},\eta\in{\mathcal{T}}" text="list@(zeta, eta) element-of T" xml:id="S3.Thmthm1.p1.m4">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S3.Thmthm1.p1.m4.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S3.Thmthm1.p1.m4.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok name="zeta" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.Thmthm1.p1.m4.1">ζ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok name="eta" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.Thmthm1.p1.m4.2">η</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMTok font="caligraphic upright" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> with</text></p>
        <equation labels="LABEL:eq:II.7.2" xml:id="S3.E2">
          <tags>
            <tag>(3.2)</tag>
            <tag role="refnum">3.2</tag>
          </tags>
          <Math mode="display" tex="{\alpha}\cong_{\nu}{\zeta}{\alpha}_{1},\qquad{\alpha}_{2}\cong_{\nu}\eta{%&#10;\alpha}," text="formulae@(alpha approximately-equals _ nu zeta * alpha _ 1, alpha _ 2 approximately-equals _ nu eta * alpha)" xml:id="S3.E2.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S3.E2.m1.1"/>

                        </XMApp>

                        <XMApp>

          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p><text font="italic">and then have</text></p>
        <equation labels="LABEL:eq:II.7.3" xml:id="S3.E3">

        </equation>
        <p><text font="italic">In the important special case that all three parameters <Math mode="inline" tex="{\alpha}_{1},{\alpha}_{2},{\alpha}" text="list@(alpha _ 1, alpha _ 2, alpha)" xml:id="S3.Thmthm1.p1.m5">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.Thmthm1.p1.m5.2"/>

                    <XMRef idref="S3.Thmthm1.p1.m5.1"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S3.Thmthm1.p1.m5.2">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S3.Thmthm1.p1.m5.3">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.Thmthm1.p1.m5.1">α</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math> are tangible, we take <Math mode="inline" tex="{\zeta}={\alpha}{\alpha}_{1}^{-1}" text="zeta = alpha * (alpha _ 1) ^ (- 1)" xml:id="S3.Thmthm1.p1.m6">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMTok name="zeta" role="UNKNOWN">ζ</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>

                    <XMTok name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, <Math mode="inline" tex="\eta={\alpha}{\alpha}_{2}^{-1}" text="eta = alpha * (alpha _ 2) ^ (- 1)" xml:id="S3.Thmthm1.p1.m7">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMTok name="eta" role="UNKNOWN">η</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>

                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> and have</text></p>

    <theorem class="ltx_theorem_remark" inlist="thm theorem:remark" labels="LABEL:rmk:II.7.2" xml:id="S3.Thmthm2">
      <tags>
        <tag>Remark 2</tag>
        <tag role="refnum">2</tag>
        <tag role="typerefnum">Remark 2</tag>
      </tags>
      <title class="ltx_runin"><tag><text font="bold">Remark 2</text></tag></title>
      <para xml:id="S3.Thmthm2.p1">
        <p><text font="italic">Clearly <Math mode="inline" tex="{\alpha}^{2}{\cong_{\nu}}{\zeta}\eta^{-1}{\alpha}_{1}{\alpha}_{2}" text="alpha ^ 2 approximately-equals _ nu zeta * eta ^ (- 1) * alpha _ 1 * alpha _ 2" xml:id="S3.Thmthm2.p1.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMApp meaning="approximately-equals" role="RELOP">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                    <XMTok font="upright" meaning="approximately-equals" name="cong" role="RELOP">≅</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok name="zeta" role="UNKNOWN">ζ</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok name="eta" role="UNKNOWN">η</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>. Thus</text></p>
        <equation labels="LABEL:eq:II.7.4" xml:id="S3.E4">
          <tags>
            <tag>(3.4)</tag>
            <tag role="refnum">3.4</tag>
          </tags>
          <Math mode="display" tex="{\alpha}_{1}{\alpha}_{2}{&lt;_{\nu}}{\alpha}^{2}{\quad{\iff}\quad}\eta{&lt;_{\nu}}{%&#10;\zeta}," text="formulae@(alpha _ 1 * alpha _ 2 less _ nu list@(alpha ^ 2, iff), eta less _ nu zeta)" xml:id="S3.E4.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S3.E4.m1.2"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMDual xml:id="S3.E4.m1.2">
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="formulae"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S3.E4.m1.2.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S3.E4.m1.2.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S3.E4.m1.2.1">
                        <XMApp meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                          <XMTok meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">&lt;</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S3.E4.m1.2.1.1"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S3.E4.m1.1"/>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMApp xml:id="S3.E4.m1.2.1.1">
                              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                              <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok font="italic" name="quad" role="PUNCT"> </XMTok>
                            <XMTok meaning="iff" role="METARELOP" xml:id="S3.E4.m1.1">⇔</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="quad" role="PUNCT"> </XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S3.E4.m1.2.2">
                        <XMApp meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                          <XMTok meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">&lt;</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="eta" role="UNKNOWN">η</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="zeta" role="UNKNOWN">ζ</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p><text font="italic">and then <Math mode="inline" tex="\eta{&lt;_{\nu}}{\xi}{&lt;_{\nu}}{\zeta}." text="eta less _ nu xi less _ nu zeta" xml:id="S3.Thmthm2.p1.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.Thmthm2.p1.m2.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S3.Thmthm2.p1.m2.1">
                      <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                      <XMTok name="eta" role="UNKNOWN">η</XMTok>
                      <XMApp meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                        <XMTok font="upright" meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">&lt;</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok name="xi" role="UNKNOWN">ξ</XMTok>
                      <XMApp meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                        <XMTok font="upright" meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">&lt;</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok name="zeta" role="UNKNOWN">ζ</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math></text></p>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="S3.Thmthm2.p2">
        <p><text font="italic">If in addition <Math mode="inline" tex="R" text="R" xml:id="S3.Thmthm2.p2.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> is discrete and <Math mode="inline" tex="{\xi}\notin{\mathcal{T}}" text="xi not-element-of T" xml:id="S3.Thmthm2.p2.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="not-element-of" name="notin" role="RELOP">∉</XMTok>

                  <XMTok font="caligraphic upright" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, then <Math mode="inline" tex="{\alpha}_{1}{\alpha}_{2}{&lt;_{\nu}}{\alpha}^{2}" text="alpha _ 1 * alpha _ 2 less _ nu alpha ^ 2" xml:id="S3.Thmthm2.p2.m3">

                  <XMApp meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">

              </XMath>
            </Math> implies that</text></p>

    <theorem class="ltx_theorem_convention" inlist="thm theorem:convention" labels="LABEL:conv:II.7.3" xml:id="S3.Thmthm3">
      <tags>
        <tag>Convention 3</tag>
        <tag role="refnum">3</tag>
        <tag role="typerefnum">Convention 3</tag>
      </tags>
      <title class="ltx_runin"><tag><text font="bold">Convention 3</text></tag></title>
      <para xml:id="S3.Thmthm3.p1">
        <p><text font="italic">Assuming again that <Math mode="inline" tex="{\alpha}_{1}\neq 0" text="alpha _ 1 not-equals 0" xml:id="S3.Thmthm3.p1.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="not-equals" name="neq" role="RELOP">≠</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, <Math mode="inline" tex="{\alpha}_{2}\neq 0" text="alpha _ 2 not-equals 0" xml:id="S3.Thmthm3.p1.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="not-equals" name="neq" role="RELOP">≠</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, <Math mode="inline" tex="{\alpha}\neq 0" text="alpha not-equals 0" xml:id="S3.Thmthm3.p1.m3">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="not-equals" name="neq" role="RELOP">≠</XMTok>
                  <XMTok name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, we distinguish the following subcases of Cases I-III appearing in <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="QF1" separator="," yyseparator=","/>, Convention 7.10]</cite>.</text></p>
        <description xml:id="S3.I1">
          <item xml:id="S3.I1.ix1">

                  </XMath>
                </Math><text font="italic">-square (i.e. </text><Math mode="inline" tex="{\xi}\in{\mathcal{T}}" text="xi element-of T" xml:id="S3.I1.ix1.p1.m3">
                  <XMath>

                      <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>

                      <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMath>
                </Math><text font="italic">).</text></p>
              <description xml:id="S3.I1.I1">

                  <para xml:id="S3.I1.ix1.ix2.p1">
                    <p><Math mode="inline" tex="{\alpha}^{2}{\leq_{\nu}}{\alpha}_{1}{\alpha}_{2}." text="alpha ^ 2 less= _ nu alpha _ 1 * alpha _ 2" xml:id="S3.I1.ix1.ix2.p1.m1">

                                  </XMApp>

                                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post5"/>

                                  </XMApp>
                                </XMApp>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                        </XMath>
                      </Math><text font="italic"></text></p>
                  </para>
                </item>
              </description>
            </para>
          </item>
          <item xml:id="S3.I1.ix2">
            <tags>
              <tag><text font="bold">Case II: </text></tag>

            </tags>

              <p><Math mode="inline" tex="R" text="R" xml:id="S3.I1.ix2.p1.m1">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                  </XMath>
                </Math><text font="italic"> is dense, and </text><Math mode="inline" tex="{\alpha}_{1}{\alpha}_{2}" text="alpha _ 1 * alpha _ 2" xml:id="S3.I1.ix2.p1.m2">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>

    <theorem class="ltx_theorem_prop" inlist="thm theorem:prop" labels="LABEL:prop:II.7.4" xml:id="S3.Thmthm4">
      <tags>
        <tag>Proposition 4</tag>
        <tag role="refnum">4</tag>
        <tag role="typerefnum">Proposition 4</tag>
      </tags>
      <title class="ltx_runin"><tag><text font="bold">Proposition 4</text></tag></title>
      <para xml:id="S3.Thmthm4.p1">
        <p><text font="italic">Assume that <Math mode="inline" tex="{\alpha}_{1},{\alpha}_{2},{\alpha}" text="list@(alpha _ 1, alpha _ 2, alpha)" xml:id="S3.Thmthm4.p1.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.Thmthm4.p1.m1.2"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.Thmthm4.p1.m1.3"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.Thmthm4.p1.m1.1"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S3.Thmthm4.p1.m1.2">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S3.Thmthm4.p1.m1.3">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.Thmthm4.p1.m1.1">α</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math> are nonzero. Let <Math mode="inline" tex="{\lambda},\mu\in R" text="list@(lambda, mu) element-of R" xml:id="S3.Thmthm4.p1.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S3.Thmthm4.p1.m2.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S3.Thmthm4.p1.m2.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.Thmthm4.p1.m2.1">λ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.Thmthm4.p1.m2.2">μ</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, not both zero.</text></p>
        <enumerate xml:id="S3.I2">

                                    <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                                  </XMApp>
                                </XMApp>
                              </XMCell>
                              <XMCell/>

                                  <XMRef idref="S3.E8.m1.2"/>

                                      </XMApp>
