          <item xml:id="S4.I2.ix14">
            <tags>
              <tag><text font="bold">Note: </text></tag>
              <tag role="typerefnum">item Note</tag>
            </tags>
            <para xml:id="S4.I2.ix14.p1">
              <p><text font="italic">In Cases II and III the nature of the pair </text><Math mode="inline" tex="({\varepsilon}_{1},{\varepsilon}_{2})" text="open-interval@(varepsilon _ 1, varepsilon _ 2)" xml:id="S4.I2.ix14.p1.m1">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.I2.ix14.p1.m1.1"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.I2.ix14.p1.m1.2"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S4.I2.ix14.p1.m1.1">
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S4.I2.ix14.p1.m1.2">
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMath>
                </Math><text font="italic"> (excessive, quasilinear, weakly CS, …) remains undetermined by the values </text><Math mode="inline" tex="v(a_{ij})." text="v * a _ (i * j)" xml:id="S4.I2.ix14.p1.m2">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.I2.ix14.p1.m2.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S4.I2.ix14.p1.m2.1">
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMRef idref="S4.I2.ix14.p1.m2.1.1"/>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                              <XMApp xml:id="S4.I2.ix14.p1.m2.1.1">
                                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                                </XMApp>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMath>
                </Math><text font="italic"> This may change if we have specified information about the value </text><Math mode="inline" tex="v" text="v" xml:id="S4.I2.ix14.p1.m3">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                  </XMath>
                </Math><text font="italic"> and </text><Math mode="inline" tex="{\alpha}" text="alpha" xml:id="S4.I2.ix14.p1.m4">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                  </XMath>
                </Math><text font="italic"> and </text><Math mode="inline" tex="{\beta}." text="beta" xml:id="S4.I2.ix14.p1.m5">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.I2.ix14.p1.m5.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.I2.ix14.p1.m5.1">β</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMath>
                </Math><text font="italic"> For example, if </text><Math mode="inline" tex="v" text="v" xml:id="S4.I2.ix14.p1.m6">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                  </XMath>
                </Math><text font="italic"> is compatible with a total ordering </text><Math mode="inline" tex="\leq" text="less=" xml:id="S4.I2.ix14.p1.m7">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                  </XMath>
                </Math><text font="italic"> of the field </text><Math mode="inline" tex="R" text="R" xml:id="S4.I2.ix14.p1.m8">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                  </XMath>
                </Math><text font="italic">, cf. </text><cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite"><text font="italic">[</text><bibref bibrefs="lam" separator="," yyseparator=","/><text font="italic">]</text></cite><text font="italic">, and </text><Math mode="inline" tex="{\alpha}&gt;0" text="alpha &gt; 0" xml:id="S4.I2.ix14.p1.m9">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="greater-than" role="RELOP">&gt;</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                      <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMath>
                </Math><text font="italic">, </text><Math mode="inline" tex="{\beta}&gt;0" text="beta &gt; 0" xml:id="S4.I2.ix14.p1.m10">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="greater-than" role="RELOP">&gt;</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN">β</XMTok>
                      <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMath>
                </Math><text font="italic">, then</text></p>
              <equation xml:id="S4.Ex27">
                <Math mode="display" tex="v(a_{11}^{2}{\alpha}+a_{12}^{2}{\beta})=\max\{v(a_{11}^{2}{\alpha}),v(a_{12}^{%&#10;2}{\beta})\}" text="v * ((a _ 11) ^ 2 * alpha + (a _ 12) ^ 2 * beta) = maximum@(v * (a _ 11) ^ 2 * alpha, v * (a _ 12) ^ 2 * beta)" xml:id="S4.Ex27.m1">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S4.Ex27.m1.2"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex27.m1.2">
                              <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                                  <XMApp>
                                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="11" role="NUMBER">11</XMTok>
                                  </XMApp>
                                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                                  <XMApp>
                                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="12" role="NUMBER">12</XMTok>
                                  </XMApp>
                                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMTok font="italic" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN">β</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMRef idref="S4.Ex27.m1.1"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S4.Ex27.m1.3"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S4.Ex27.m1.4"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="maximum" role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="mid" xml:id="S4.Ex27.m1.1">max</XMTok>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                            <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex27.m1.3">
                              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                              <XMDual>
                                <XMRef idref="S4.Ex27.m1.3.1"/>
                                <XMWrap>
                                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                  <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex27.m1.3.1">
                                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                    <XMApp>
                                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                                      <XMApp>
                                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="11" role="NUMBER">11</XMTok>
                                      </XMApp>
                                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                                    </XMApp>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                                  </XMApp>
                                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                </XMWrap>
                              </XMDual>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                            <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex27.m1.4">
                              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                              <XMDual>
                                <XMRef idref="S4.Ex27.m1.4.1"/>
                                <XMWrap>
                                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                  <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex27.m1.4.1">
                                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                    <XMApp>
                                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                                      <XMApp>
                                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="12" role="NUMBER">12</XMTok>
                                      </XMApp>
                                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                                    </XMApp>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN">β</XMTok>
                                  </XMApp>
                                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                </XMWrap>
                              </XMDual>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMath>
                </Math>
              </equation>
              <p><text font="italic">and we can say more. It may well happen that </text><Math mode="inline" tex="{\tilde{q}}" text="tilde@(q)" xml:id="S4.I2.ix14.p1.m11">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMath>
                </Math><text font="italic"> is not quasilinear. (We do not go into details.)</text></p>
            </para>
            <para xml:id="S4.I2.ix14.p2">
              <p><text font="italic">Notice that Cases II and III can only occur if </text><Math mode="inline" tex="v({\alpha})," text="v * alpha" xml:id="S4.I2.ix14.p2.m1">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.I2.ix14.p2.m1.2"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S4.I2.ix14.p2.m1.2">
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMRef idref="S4.I2.ix14.p2.m1.1"/>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.I2.ix14.p2.m1.1">α</XMTok>
                              <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMath>
                </Math><text font="italic"> </text><Math mode="inline" tex="v({\beta})" text="v * beta" xml:id="S4.I2.ix14.p2.m2">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.I2.ix14.p2.m2.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.I2.ix14.p2.m2.1">β</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMath>
                </Math><text font="italic"> are square equivalent (cf. </text><cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite"><text font="italic">[</text><bibref bibrefs="QF1" separator="," yyseparator=","/><text font="italic">, Definition 7.1]</text></cite><text font="italic">).</text></p>
            </para>

            <para xml:id="S4.I2.ix15.p2">
              <p><text font="italic">Now we read off from (</text><ref font="italic" labelref="LABEL:eq:II.8.5"/><text font="italic">) that</text></p>
              <equation xml:id="S4.Ex28">
                <Math mode="display" tex="{\tilde{q}}=\begin{bmatrix}{\varphi}(a_{11}^{2}{\alpha})&amp;{\varphi}(a_{11}a_{21%&#10;}{\alpha}+a_{12}a_{22}{\beta})\\&#10;&amp;{\varphi}(a_{22}^{2}{\beta})\end{bmatrix}." text="tilde@(q) = matrix[[varphi * (a _ 11) ^ 2 * alpha, varphi * (a _ 11 * a _ 21 * alpha + a _ 12 * a _ 22 * beta)], [absent, varphi * (a _ 22) ^ 2 * beta]]" xml:id="S4.Ex28.m1">

                              </XMArray>
                              <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="true">]</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMath>
                </Math>
              </equation>
            </para>
            <para xml:id="S4.I2.ix15.p3">
              <p><text font="italic">We have </text><Math mode="inline" tex="a_{11}\neq 0," text="a _ 11 not-equals 0" xml:id="S4.I2.ix15.p3.m1">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.I2.ix15.p3.m1.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S4.I2.ix15.p3.m1.1">
                          <XMTok meaning="not-equals" name="neq" role="RELOP">≠</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="11" role="NUMBER">11</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMath>
                </Math><text font="italic"> </text><Math mode="inline" tex="a_{22}\neq 0." text="a _ 22 not-equals 0" xml:id="S4.I2.ix15.p3.m2">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.I2.ix15.p3.m2.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S4.I2.ix15.p3.m2.1">
                          <XMTok meaning="not-equals" name="neq" role="RELOP">≠</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="22" role="NUMBER">22</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMath>
                </Math><text font="italic"> Thus the CS-ratio </text><Math mode="inline" tex="{\operatorname{CS}}({\varepsilon}_{1},{\varepsilon}_{2})" text="CS@(varepsilon _ 1, varepsilon _ 2)" xml:id="S4.I2.ix15.p3.m3">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.I2.ix15.p3.m3.1"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.I2.ix15.p3.m3.2"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.I2.ix15.p3.m3.3"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post" xml:id="S4.I2.ix15.p3.m3.1">CS</XMTok>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S4.I2.ix15.p3.m3.2">
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S4.I2.ix15.p3.m3.3">
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMath>
                </Math><text font="italic"> exists and</text></p>

                                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="11" role="NUMBER">11</XMTok>

                                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                                      </XMApp>
                                      <XMApp>
                                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post11"/>
                                        <XMApp>
                                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post11"/>
                                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>

                                        </XMApp>
                                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                                      </XMApp>

                                    </XMApp>

                                  </XMWrap>

                          </XMApp>

                      </XMath>
                    </Math>

              <p><text font="italic">Thus the pair </text><Math mode="inline" tex="({\varepsilon}_{1},{\varepsilon}_{2})" text="open-interval@(varepsilon _ 1, varepsilon _ 2)" xml:id="S4.I2.ix15.p3.m4">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.I2.ix15.p3.m4.1"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.I2.ix15.p3.m4.2"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S4.I2.ix15.p3.m4.1">
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S4.I2.ix15.p3.m4.2">
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMath>
                </Math><text font="italic"> is CS (cf. Definition </text><ref font="italic" labelref="LABEL:def:II.5.10"/><text font="italic">) and</text></p>
              <equation xml:id="S4.Ex32">
                <Math mode="display" tex="{\tilde{q}}=[{\varphi}(a_{11}^{2}{\alpha}),{\varphi}(a_{22}^{2}{\beta})]=[{%&#10;\varphi}({\alpha}),{\varphi}({\beta})]." text="tilde@(q) = closed-interval@(varphi * (a _ 11) ^ 2 * alpha, varphi * (a _ 22) ^ 2 * beta) = closed-interval@(varphi * alpha, varphi * beta)" xml:id="S4.Ex32.m1">

              <p><text font="italic">Finally, if</text></p>
              <equation xml:id="S4.Ex35">
                <Math mode="display" tex="v(a_{11}^{2}{\alpha})&lt;v(a_{12}^{2}{\beta}),\qquad v(a_{21}^{2}{\alpha})&gt;v(a_{2%&#10;2}^{2}{\beta})," text="formulae@(v * (a _ 11) ^ 2 * alpha less v * (a _ 12) ^ 2 * beta, v * (a _ 21) ^ 2 * alpha &gt; v * (a _ 22) ^ 2 * beta)" xml:id="S4.Ex35.m1">

                            <XMRef idref="S4.Ex35.m1.1.2"/>

                                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                                <XMDual>
                                  <XMRef idref="S4.Ex35.m1.1.1.1"/>
                                  <XMWrap>
                                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                    <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex35.m1.1.1.1">
                                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                      <XMApp>
                                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                                        <XMApp>
                                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="11" role="NUMBER">11</XMTok>
                                        </XMApp>
                                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                                      </XMApp>
                                      <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                                    </XMApp>
                                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                  </XMWrap>
                                </XMDual>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                                <XMDual>
                                  <XMRef idref="S4.Ex35.m1.1.1.2"/>
                                  <XMWrap>
                                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                    <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex35.m1.1.1.2">
                                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                      <XMApp>
                                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                                        <XMApp>
                                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="12" role="NUMBER">12</XMTok>
                                        </XMApp>
                                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                                      </XMApp>
                                      <XMTok font="italic" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN">β</XMTok>
                                    </XMApp>
                                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                  </XMWrap>
                                </XMDual>
                              </XMApp>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="PUNCT" rpadding="20.0pt">,</XMTok>
                            <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex35.m1.1.2">
                              <XMTok meaning="greater-than" role="RELOP">&gt;</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                                <XMDual>
                                  <XMRef idref="S4.Ex35.m1.1.2.1"/>
                                  <XMWrap>
                                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                    <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex35.m1.1.2.1">
                                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                      <XMApp>
                                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                                        <XMApp>
                                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="21" role="NUMBER">21</XMTok>
                                        </XMApp>
                                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                                      </XMApp>
                                      <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                                    </XMApp>
                                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                  </XMWrap>
                                </XMDual>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                                <XMDual>
                                  <XMRef idref="S4.Ex35.m1.1.2.2"/>
                                  <XMWrap>
                                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                    <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex35.m1.1.2.2">
                                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                      <XMApp>
                                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                                        <XMApp>
                                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="22" role="NUMBER">22</XMTok>
                                        </XMApp>
                                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                                      </XMApp>
                                      <XMTok font="italic" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN">β</XMTok>
                                    </XMApp>
                                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                  </XMWrap>
                                </XMDual>
                              </XMApp>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                        <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMath>
                </Math>
              </equation>
              <p><text font="italic">then interchanging </text><Math mode="inline" tex="v_{1},v_{2}" text="list@(v _ 1, v _ 2)" xml:id="S4.I2.ix16.p3.m1">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.I2.ix16.p3.m1.1"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.I2.ix16.p3.m1.2"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S4.I2.ix16.p3.m1.1">
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S4.I2.ix16.p3.m1.2">
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMath>
                </Math><text font="italic"> we come back to Case IV.</text></p>
            </para>
          </item>
        </description>
        <p><text font="italic">Thus Cases I–IV exhaust all possibilities up to interchanging <Math mode="inline" tex="v_{1},v_{2}" text="list@(v _ 1, v _ 2)" xml:id="ThmexampleBx1.p5.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="ThmexampleBx1.p5.m1.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="ThmexampleBx1.p5.m1.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMApp xml:id="ThmexampleBx1.p5.m1.1">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="ThmexampleBx1.p5.m1.2">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math> and/or <Math mode="inline" tex="v_{1}^{\prime},v_{2}^{\prime}." text="list@((v _ 1) ^ prime, (v _ 2) ^ prime)" xml:id="ThmexampleBx1.p5.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="ThmexampleBx1.p5.m2.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMDual xml:id="ThmexampleBx1.p5.m2.1">
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                        <XMRef idref="ThmexampleBx1.p5.m2.1.1"/>
                        <XMRef idref="ThmexampleBx1.p5.m2.1.2"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMApp xml:id="ThmexampleBx1.p5.m2.1.1">
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="ThmexampleBx1.p5.m2.1.2">
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math></text></p>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="ThmexampleBx1.p6">
        <p><text font="italic">This completes Example B.</text></p>
      </para>
    </theorem>
    <para xml:id="S4.p5">
      <p>If the values <Math mode="inline" tex="v({\alpha}),v({\beta})" text="list@(v * alpha, v * beta)" xml:id="S4.p5.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                <XMRef idref="S4.p5.m1.3"/>
                <XMRef idref="S4.p5.m1.4"/>
              </XMApp>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMApp xml:id="S4.p5.m1.3">
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.p5.m1.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p5.m1.1">α</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                <XMApp xml:id="S4.p5.m1.4">
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.p5.m1.2"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p5.m1.2">β</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math> are <text font="italic">not</text> square equivalent, then Case IV in Example B does not occur, as observed above. Thus we may state</p>
    </para>
    <theorem class="ltx_theorem_prop" inlist="thm theorem:prop" labels="LABEL:prop:II.8.1" xml:id="S4.Thmthm1">
      <tags>
        <tag>Proposition 1</tag>
        <tag role="refnum">1</tag>
        <tag role="typerefnum">Proposition 1</tag>
      </tags>
      <title class="ltx_runin"><tag><text font="bold">Proposition 1</text></tag></title>
      <para xml:id="S4.Thmthm1.p1">
        <p><text font="italic">Assume that <Math mode="inline" tex="R" text="R" xml:id="S4.Thmthm1.p1.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> is a field, and that <Math mode="inline" tex="{\varphi}:R\to U" text="varphi colon R to U" xml:id="S4.Thmthm1.p1.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" name="colon" role="METARELOP">:</XMTok>
                  <XMTok name="varphi" role="UNKNOWN">φ</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" name="to" role="ARROW">→</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">U</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> is a tangibly additive supervaluation which is not ghost, and hence is very strong. Let <Math mode="inline" tex="q=[{\alpha},{\beta}]" text="q = closed-interval@(alpha, beta)" xml:id="S4.Thmthm1.p1.m3">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="closed-interval"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.Thmthm1.p1.m3.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.Thmthm1.p1.m3.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">[</XMTok>
                      <XMTok name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Thmthm1.p1.m3.1">α</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok name="beta" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Thmthm1.p1.m3.2">β</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">]</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> be a binary diagonal form over <Math mode="inline" tex="R" text="R" xml:id="S4.Thmthm1.p1.m4">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> with <Math mode="inline" tex="v({\alpha}),v({\beta})" text="list@(v * alpha, v * beta)" xml:id="S4.Thmthm1.p1.m5">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.Thmthm1.p1.m5.3"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.Thmthm1.p1.m5.4"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S4.Thmthm1.p1.m5.3">
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.Thmthm1.p1.m5.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Thmthm1.p1.m5.1">α</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S4.Thmthm1.p1.m5.4">
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.Thmthm1.p1.m5.2"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok name="beta" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Thmthm1.p1.m5.2">β</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math> not square equivalent <Math mode="inline" tex="(v:=e{\varphi})." text="v assign e * varphi" xml:id="S4.Thmthm1.p1.m6">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S4.Thmthm1.p1.m6.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMDual xml:id="S4.Thmthm1.p1.m6.1">
                      <XMRef idref="S4.Thmthm1.p1.m6.1.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S4.Thmthm1.p1.m6.1.1">
                          <XMTok font="upright" meaning="assign" role="RELOP">:=</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                            <XMTok name="varphi" role="UNKNOWN">φ</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math> Then all stropicalizations of <Math mode="inline" tex="q" text="q" xml:id="S4.Thmthm1.p1.m7">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> by <Math mode="inline" tex="{\varphi}" text="varphi" xml:id="S4.Thmthm1.p1.m8">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok name="varphi" role="UNKNOWN">φ</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> are quasilinear.</text></p>
      </para>
    </theorem>
    <theorem class="ltx_theorem_remark" inlist="thm theorem:remark" labels="LABEL:rem:II.8.2" xml:id="S4.Thmthm2">
      <tags>
        <tag>Remark 2</tag>
        <tag role="refnum">2</tag>
        <tag role="typerefnum">Remark 2</tag>
      </tags>
      <title class="ltx_runin"><tag><text font="bold">Remark 2</text></tag></title>
      <para xml:id="S4.Thmthm2.p1">
        <p><text font="italic">This proposition does not contradict Example A. Assume that <Math mode="inline" tex="{\operatorname{char}}R\neq 2." text="char@(R) not-equals 2" xml:id="S4.Thmthm2.p1.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S4.Thmthm2.p1.m1.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S4.Thmthm2.p1.m1.1">
                      <XMTok font="upright" meaning="not-equals" name="neq" role="RELOP">≠</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">char</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="upright" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math> If <Math mode="inline" tex="q=\left[\begin{smallmatrix}0&amp;1\\&#10;&amp;0\end{smallmatrix}\right]" text="q = delimited-[]@(Array[[0, 1], [absent, 0]])" xml:id="S4.Thmthm2.p1.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="delimited-[]"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.Thmthm2.p1.m2.1"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="true">[</XMTok>
                      <XMArray xml:id="S4.Thmthm2.p1.m2.1">
                        <XMRow>
                          <XMCell align="center">
                            <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                          </XMCell>
                          <XMCell align="center">
                            <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                          </XMCell>
                        </XMRow>
                        <XMRow>
                          <XMCell align="center">
                            <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                          </XMCell>
                          <XMCell align="center">
                            <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                          </XMCell>
                        </XMRow>
                      </XMArray>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="true">]</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="q^{\prime}=[{\alpha},{\beta}]" text="q ^ prime = closed-interval@(alpha, beta)" xml:id="S4.Thmthm2.p1.m3">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="closed-interval"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.Thmthm2.p1.m3.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.Thmthm2.p1.m3.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">[</XMTok>
                      <XMTok name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Thmthm2.p1.m3.1">α</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok name="beta" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Thmthm2.p1.m3.2">β</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">]</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> are forms over <Math mode="inline" tex="R" text="R" xml:id="S4.Thmthm2.p1.m4">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> with <Math mode="inline" tex="{\alpha}\neq 0," text="alpha not-equals 0" xml:id="S4.Thmthm2.p1.m5">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S4.Thmthm2.p1.m5.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S4.Thmthm2.p1.m5.1">
                      <XMTok font="upright" meaning="not-equals" name="neq" role="RELOP">≠</XMTok>
                      <XMTok name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="upright" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math> <Math mode="inline" tex="{\beta}\neq 0," text="beta not-equals 0" xml:id="S4.Thmthm2.p1.m6">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S4.Thmthm2.p1.m6.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S4.Thmthm2.p1.m6.1">
                      <XMTok font="upright" meaning="not-equals" name="neq" role="RELOP">≠</XMTok>
                      <XMTok name="beta" role="UNKNOWN">β</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="upright" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="q\cong q^{\prime}," text="q approximately-equals q ^ prime" xml:id="S4.Thmthm2.p1.m7">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S4.Thmthm2.p1.m7.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S4.Thmthm2.p1.m7.1">
                      <XMTok font="upright" meaning="approximately-equals" name="cong" role="RELOP">≅</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math> then <Math mode="inline" tex="{\beta}=-{\lambda}^{2}{\alpha}" text="beta = - lambda ^ 2 * alpha" xml:id="S4.Thmthm2.p1.m8">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMTok name="beta" role="UNKNOWN">β</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> for some <Math mode="inline" tex="{\lambda}\in R^{*}," text="lambda element-of R ^ *" xml:id="S4.Thmthm2.p1.m9">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S4.Thmthm2.p1.m9.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S4.Thmthm2.p1.m9.1">
                      <XMTok font="upright" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                      <XMTok name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math> and hence <Math mode="inline" tex="v({\alpha})" text="v * alpha" xml:id="S4.Thmthm2.p1.m10">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.Thmthm2.p1.m10.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Thmthm2.p1.m10.1">α</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="v({\beta})" text="v * beta" xml:id="S4.Thmthm2.p1.m11">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.Thmthm2.p1.m11.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok name="beta" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Thmthm2.p1.m11.1">β</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> are square equivalent.</text></p>
      </para>
    </theorem>
  </section>
  <section inlist="toc" labels="LABEL:sec:I.6" xml:id="S5">
    <tags>
      <tag>5</tag>
      <tag role="refnum">5</tag>
      <tag role="typerefnum">§5</tag>
    </tags>
    <title><tag close=". ">5</tag>The minimal ordering on a free <Math mode="inline" tex="R" text="R" xml:id="S5.m1">
        <XMath>
          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
        </XMath>
      </Math>-module</title>
    <toctitle><tag close=" ">5</tag>The minimal ordering on a free <Math mode="inline" tex="R" text="R" xml:id="S5.m2">
        <XMath>
          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
        </XMath>
      </Math>-module</toctitle>
    <para xml:id="S5.p1">
      <p>In this section <Math mode="inline" tex="R" text="R" xml:id="S5.p1.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is a supertropical semiring. If <Math mode="inline" tex="V" text="V" xml:id="S5.p1.m2">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is any module over <Math mode="inline" tex="R" text="R" xml:id="S5.p1.m3">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, we define on <Math mode="inline" tex="V" text="V" xml:id="S5.p1.m4">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> a binary relation <Math mode="inline" tex="\leq_{V}" text="less= _ V" xml:id="S5.p1.m5">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp meaning="less-than-or-equals" role="RELOP">
              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
              <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> as follows: <break/>For any <Math mode="inline" tex="x,y\in U" text="list@(x, y) element-of U" xml:id="S5.p1.m6">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S5.p1.m6.1"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S5.p1.m6.2"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.p1.m6.1">x</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.p1.m6.2">y</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">U</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>,
<!--  %**** String Line 1300 **** --></p>
      <equation labels="LABEL:eq:I.6.1" xml:id="S5.E1">
        <tags>
          <tag>(5.1)</tag>
          <tag role="refnum">5.1</tag>
        </tags>
        <Math mode="display" tex="x\leq_{V}y{\quad{\rightleftharpoons}\quad}\exists z\in V:x+z=y." text="formulae@(x less= _ V list@(y, rightleftharpoons), exists@(z) element-of V) colon x + z = y" xml:id="S5.E1.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMRef idref="S5.E1.m1.3"/>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMApp xml:id="S5.E1.m1.3">
                  <XMTok name="colon" role="METARELOP">:</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="formulae"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.E1.m1.3.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.E1.m1.3.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S5.E1.m1.3.1">
                        <XMApp meaning="less-than-or-equals" role="RELOP">
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                          <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S5.E1.m1.1"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S5.E1.m1.2"/>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.E1.m1.1">y</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" name="quad" role="PUNCT"> </XMTok>
                            <XMTok name="rightleftharpoons" role="METARELOP" xml:id="S5.E1.m1.2">⇌</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="quad" role="PUNCT"> </XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S5.E1.m1.3.2">
                        <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="exists" role="BIGOP">∃</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math>
      </equation>
    </para>
    <para xml:id="S5.p2">
      <p>This relation is clearly reflexive <Math mode="inline" tex="(x\leq x)" text="x less= x" xml:id="S5.p2.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMRef idref="S5.p2.m1.1"/>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                <XMApp xml:id="S5.p2.m1.1">
                  <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math> and transitive <Math mode="inline" tex="(x\leq y,y\leq z\Rightarrow x\leq z)." text="formulae@(x less= y, y less= z Rightarrow x less= z)" xml:id="S5.p2.m2">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMRef idref="S5.p2.m2.1"/>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMDual xml:id="S5.p2.m2.1">
                  <XMRef idref="S5.p2.m2.1.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMDual xml:id="S5.p2.m2.1.1">
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="formulae"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S5.p2.m2.1.1.1"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S5.p2.m2.1.1.2"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S5.p2.m2.1.1.1">
                          <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S5.p2.m2.1.1.2">
                          <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                          <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                          <XMTok name="Rightarrow" role="ARROW">⇒</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                          <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math> It is also antisymmetric, <text font="italic">hence is a partial ordering on the set</text> <Math mode="inline" tex="V." text="V" xml:id="S5.p2.m3">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMRef idref="S5.p2.m3.1"/>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.p2.m3.1">V</XMTok>
                <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math> Indeed, assume that <Math mode="inline" tex="x+z=y" text="x + z = y" xml:id="S5.p2.m4">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="y+w=x." text="y + w = x" xml:id="S5.p2.m5">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMRef idref="S5.p2.m5.1"/>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMApp xml:id="S5.p2.m5.1">
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math> This implies <Math mode="inline" tex="x+z+w=x," text="x + z + w = x" xml:id="S5.p2.m6">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMRef idref="S5.p2.m6.1"/>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMApp xml:id="S5.p2.m6.1">
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math> <Math mode="inline" tex="y+z+w=y," text="y + z + w = y" xml:id="S5.p2.m7">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMRef idref="S5.p2.m7.1"/>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMApp xml:id="S5.p2.m7.1">
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math> and then</p>
      <equation xml:id="S5.Ex1">
        <Math mode="display" tex="x+e(z+w)=x,\quad y+e(z+w)=y." text="formulae@(x + e * (z + w) = x, y + e * (z + w) = y)" xml:id="S5.Ex1.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMRef idref="S5.Ex1.m1.1"/>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMDual xml:id="S5.Ex1.m1.1">
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="formulae"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.Ex1.m1.1.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.Ex1.m1.1.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S5.Ex1.m1.1.1">
                      <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMRef idref="S5.Ex1.m1.1.1.1"/>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                              <XMApp xml:id="S5.Ex1.m1.1.1.1">
                                <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT" rpadding="10.0pt">,</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S5.Ex1.m1.1.2">
                      <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMRef idref="S5.Ex1.m1.1.2.1"/>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                              <XMApp xml:id="S5.Ex1.m1.1.2.1">
                                <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math>
      </equation>
      <p>Adding <Math mode="inline" tex="z" text="z" xml:id="S5.p2.m8">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> at both sides of the first equation, and using that <Math mode="inline" tex="z+ez=ez" text="z + e * z = e * z" xml:id="S5.p2.m9">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, we obtain</p>
      <equation xml:id="S5.Ex2">
        <Math mode="display" tex="y=x+e(z+w)=x," text="y = x + e * (z + w) = x" xml:id="S5.Ex2.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMRef idref="S5.Ex2.m1.1"/>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMApp xml:id="S5.Ex2.m1.1">
                  <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S5.Ex2.m1.1.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S5.Ex2.m1.1.1">
                            <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math>
      </equation>
      <p>as desired.</p>
    </para>
    <para xml:id="S5.p3">
      <p>Clearly, our partial ordering <Math mode="inline" tex="\leq_{V}" text="less= _ V" xml:id="S5.p3.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp meaning="less-than-or-equals" role="RELOP">
              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
              <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> satisfies the rules <Math mode="inline" tex="(x,y,z\in V)" text="list@(x, y, z) element-of V" xml:id="S5.p3.m2">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMRef idref="S5.p3.m2.4"/>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                <XMApp xml:id="S5.p3.m2.4">
                  <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.p3.m2.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.p3.m2.2"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.p3.m2.3"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.p3.m2.1">x</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.p3.m2.2">y</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.p3.m2.3">z</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math></p>
      <equationgroup class="ltx_eqn_gather" xml:id="A0.EGx4">
        <equation labels="LABEL:eq:I.6.2" xml:id="S5.E2">
          <tags>
            <tag>(5.2)</tag>

                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S5.E2.m1.1">
