                    <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <equation labels="LABEL:eq:I.6.3" xml:id="S5.E3">
          <tags>
            <tag>(5.3)</tag>
            <tag role="refnum">5.3</tag>
          </tags>
          <Math mode="display" tex="\displaystyle x\leq y{\quad{\Rightarrow}\quad}x+z\leq y+z." text="formulae@(x less= list@(y, Rightarrow), x + z less= y + z)" xml:id="S5.E3.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S5.E3.m1.3"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMDual xml:id="S5.E3.m1.3">
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="formulae"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.E3.m1.3.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.E3.m1.3.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S5.E3.m1.3.1">
                        <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S5.E3.m1.1"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S5.E3.m1.2"/>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.E3.m1.1">y</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" name="quad" role="PUNCT"> </XMTok>
                            <XMTok name="Rightarrow" role="ARROW" xml:id="S5.E3.m1.2">⇒</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="quad" role="PUNCT"> </XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S5.E3.m1.3.2">
                        <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
      </equationgroup>
      <p>(Thus, <Math mode="inline" tex="x\leq y," text="x less= y" xml:id="S5.p3.m3">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMRef idref="S5.p3.m3.1"/>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMApp xml:id="S5.p3.m3.1">
                  <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math> <Math mode="inline" tex="x^{\prime}\leq y^{\prime}\Rightarrow x+x^{\prime}\leq y+y^{\prime}.)" xml:id="S5.p3.m4">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
              <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
            <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
              <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
            <XMTok name="Rightarrow" role="ARROW">⇒</XMTok>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
            <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
              <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
            <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
            <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
              <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
            <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>
It is now obvious that any partial ordering <Math mode="inline" tex="\leq^{\prime}" text="less= ^ prime" xml:id="S5.p3.m5">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp meaning="less-than-or-equals" role="RELOP">
              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
              <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
              <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> on  <Math mode="inline" tex="V" text="V" xml:id="S5.p3.m6">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> with the properties (<ref labelref="LABEL:eq:I.6.2"/>), (<ref labelref="LABEL:eq:I.6.3"/>), is a refinement of <Math mode="inline" tex="\leq_{V}:" text="absent less= _ V colon" xml:id="S5.p3.m7">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMApp meaning="less-than-or-equals" role="RELOP">
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
              <XMTok name="colon" role="METARELOP">:</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> If <Math mode="inline" tex="x\leq_{V}y," text="x less= _ V y" xml:id="S5.p3.m8">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMRef idref="S5.p3.m8.1"/>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMApp xml:id="S5.p3.m8.1">
                  <XMApp meaning="less-than-or-equals" role="RELOP">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math> then <Math mode="inline" tex="x\leq^{\prime}y." text="x less= ^ prime y" xml:id="S5.p3.m9">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMRef idref="S5.p3.m9.1"/>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMApp xml:id="S5.p3.m9.1">
                  <XMApp meaning="less-than-or-equals" role="RELOP">
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math></p>
    </para>
    <theorem class="ltx_theorem_defn" inlist="thm theorem:defn" labels="LABEL:defn:I.6.1" xml:id="S5.Thmthm1">
      <tags>
        <tag>Definition 1</tag>
        <tag role="refnum">1</tag>
        <tag role="typerefnum">Definition 1</tag>
      </tags>
      <title class="ltx_runin"><tag><text font="bold">Definition 1</text></tag></title>
      <para xml:id="S5.Thmthm1.p1">
        <p><text font="italic">We call <Math mode="inline" tex="\leq_{V}" text="less= _ V" xml:id="S5.Thmthm1.p1.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp meaning="less-than-or-equals" role="RELOP">
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> the <text font="bold">minimal ordering</text> on the <Math mode="inline" tex="R" text="R" xml:id="S5.Thmthm1.p1.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math>-module <Math mode="inline" tex="V." text="V" xml:id="S5.Thmthm1.p1.m3">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S5.Thmthm1.p1.m3.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.Thmthm1.p1.m3.1">V</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math> <note mark="8" role="footnote" xml:id="footnote8"><tags>
                <tag><text font="upright">8</text></tag>
                <tag role="refnum"><text font="upright">8</text></tag>
                <tag role="typerefnum"><text font="upright">footnote 8</text></tag>
              </tags><text font="upright">In the special case </text><Math mode="inline" tex="V=R" text="V = R" xml:id="footnote8.m1">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math><text font="upright"> the minimal ordering has been discussed already in </text><cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite"><text font="upright">[</text><bibref bibrefs="QF1" separator="," yyseparator=","/><text font="upright">,  §5]</text></cite><text font="upright">, including an explanation of the term “minimal”.</text></note></text></p>
      </para>
    </theorem>
    <theorem class="ltx_theorem_notation" inlist="thm theorem:notation" labels="LABEL:notat:I.6.2" xml:id="S5.Thmthm2">
      <tags>
        <tag>Notation 2</tag>
        <tag role="refnum">2</tag>
        <tag role="typerefnum">Notation 2</tag>
      </tags>
      <title class="ltx_runin"><tag><text font="bold">Notation 2</text></tag></title>
      <para xml:id="S5.Thmthm2.p1">
        <p><text font="italic">As long as no other orderings of <Math mode="inline" tex="V" text="V" xml:id="S5.Thmthm2.p1.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> come into play, we usually write <Math mode="inline" tex="x\leq y" text="x less= y" xml:id="S5.Thmthm2.p1.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> instead of <Math mode="inline" tex="x\leq_{V}y." text="x less= _ V y" xml:id="S5.Thmthm2.p1.m3">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S5.Thmthm2.p1.m3.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S5.Thmthm2.p1.m3.1">
                      <XMApp meaning="less-than-or-equals" role="RELOP">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="upright" meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math> But notice that if <Math mode="inline" tex="W" text="W" xml:id="S5.Thmthm2.p1.m4">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">W</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> is a submodule of <Math mode="inline" tex="V," text="V" xml:id="S5.Thmthm2.p1.m5">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S5.Thmthm2.p1.m5.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.Thmthm2.p1.m5.1">V</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math> it may happen for <Math mode="inline" tex="x,y\in W" text="list@(x, y) element-of W" xml:id="S5.Thmthm2.p1.m6">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.Thmthm2.p1.m6.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.Thmthm2.p1.m6.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.Thmthm2.p1.m6.1">x</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.Thmthm2.p1.m6.2">y</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">W</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> that <Math mode="inline" tex="x\leq_{V}y" text="x less= _ V y" xml:id="S5.Thmthm2.p1.m7">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMApp meaning="less-than-or-equals" role="RELOP">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="upright" meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> but not <Math mode="inline" tex="x\leq_{W}y." text="x less= _ W y" xml:id="S5.Thmthm2.p1.m8">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S5.Thmthm2.p1.m8.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S5.Thmthm2.p1.m8.1">
                      <XMApp meaning="less-than-or-equals" role="RELOP">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="upright" meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">W</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math></text></p>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="S5.Thmthm2.p2">
        <p><text font="italic">As usual, <Math mode="inline" tex="x&lt;y" text="x less y" xml:id="S5.Thmthm2.p2.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">&lt;</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> means that <Math mode="inline" tex="x\leq y" text="x less= y" xml:id="S5.Thmthm2.p2.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="x\neq y." text="x not-equals y" xml:id="S5.Thmthm2.p2.m3">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S5.Thmthm2.p2.m3.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S5.Thmthm2.p2.m3.1">
                      <XMTok font="upright" meaning="not-equals" name="neq" role="RELOP">≠</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math></text></p>
      </para>
    </theorem>
<!--  %**** String Line 1325 **** -->    <para xml:id="S5.p4">
      <p>In particular, <Math mode="inline" tex="R" text="R" xml:id="S5.p4.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> itself carries the minimal ordering <Math mode="inline" tex="\leq_{R}." text="less= _ R" xml:id="S5.p4.m2">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMRef idref="S5.p4.m2.1"/>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMApp meaning="less-than-or-equals" role="RELOP" xml:id="S5.p4.m2.1">
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math> It already showed up in <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="IKR1" separator="," yyseparator=","/>, Proposition 11.8]</cite> and <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="QF1" separator="," yyseparator=","/>,  §5]</cite>. Again, we usually write <Math mode="inline" tex="{\lambda}\leq\mu" text="lambda less= mu" xml:id="S5.p4.m3">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> instead of <Math mode="inline" tex="{\lambda}\leq_{R}\mu." text="lambda less= _ R mu" xml:id="S5.p4.m4">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMRef idref="S5.p4.m4.1"/>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMApp xml:id="S5.p4.m4.1">
                  <XMApp meaning="less-than-or-equals" role="RELOP">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math></p>
    </para>
    <para xml:id="S5.p5">
      <p>Scalar multiplication is compatible with these orderings on <Math mode="inline" tex="R" text="R" xml:id="S5.p5.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="V:" text="V colon absent" xml:id="S5.p5.m2">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok name="colon" role="METARELOP">:</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
              <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math></p>
      <equation labels="LABEL:eq:I.6.4" xml:id="S5.E4">
        <tags>
          <tag>(5.4)</tag>
          <tag role="refnum">5.4</tag>
        </tags>
        <Math mode="display" tex="{\lambda}\leq\mu,\ x\leq y{\quad{\Rightarrow}\quad}{\lambda}x\leq\mu y" text="formulae@(lambda less= mu, formulae@(x less= list@(y, Rightarrow), lambda * x less= mu * y))" xml:id="S5.E4.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="formulae"/>
                <XMRef idref="S5.E4.m1.3"/>
                <XMRef idref="S5.E4.m1.4"/>
              </XMApp>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMApp xml:id="S5.E4.m1.3">
                  <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok role="PUNCT" rpadding="5.0pt">,</XMTok>
                <XMDual xml:id="S5.E4.m1.4">
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="formulae"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.E4.m1.4.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.E4.m1.4.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S5.E4.m1.4.1">
                      <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S5.E4.m1.1"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S5.E4.m1.2"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.E4.m1.1">y</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" name="quad" role="PUNCT"> </XMTok>
                          <XMTok name="Rightarrow" role="ARROW" xml:id="S5.E4.m1.2">⇒</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="quad" role="PUNCT"> </XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S5.E4.m1.4.2">
                      <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math>
      </equation>
      <p>for all <Math mode="inline" tex="{\lambda},\mu\in{\mathbb{R}},\ x,y\in V." text="formulae@(list@(lambda, mu) element-of R, list@(x, y) element-of V)" xml:id="S5.p5.m3">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMRef idref="S5.p5.m3.5"/>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMDual xml:id="S5.p5.m3.5">

                  <XMWrap>

                      <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S5.p5.m3.1"/>

                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.p5.m3.1">λ</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.p5.m3.2">μ</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                      <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT" rpadding="5.0pt">,</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S5.p5.m3.5.2">
                      <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S5.p5.m3.3"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S5.p5.m3.4"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.p5.m3.3">x</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.p5.m3.4">y</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math></p>
    </para>
    <para xml:id="S5.p6">
      <p>Before moving on to details about minimal orderings, we hasten to point out that these orderings are relevant for the geometry in a supertropical quadratic space. This is apparent already from the definition of quadratic forms <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="QF1" separator="," yyseparator=","/>, Definition 0.1]</cite>.</p>
    </para>
    <theorem class="ltx_theorem_remark" inlist="thm theorem:remark" labels="LABEL:rem:I.6.3" xml:id="S5.Thmthm3">
      <tags>
        <tag>Remark 3</tag>
        <tag role="refnum">3</tag>
        <tag role="typerefnum">Remark 3</tag>
      </tags>
      <title class="ltx_runin"><tag><text font="bold">Remark 3</text></tag></title>
      <para xml:id="S5.Thmthm3.p1">
        <p><text font="italic">As before, let <Math mode="inline" tex="V" text="V" xml:id="S5.Thmthm3.p1.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> be a module over a supertropical semiring <Math mode="inline" tex="R." text="R" xml:id="S5.Thmthm3.p1.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S5.Thmthm3.p1.m2.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.Thmthm3.p1.m2.1">R</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math> If <Math mode="inline" tex="(q,b)" text="open-interval@(q, b)" xml:id="S5.Thmthm3.p1.m3">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.Thmthm3.p1.m3.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.Thmthm3.p1.m3.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.Thmthm3.p1.m3.1">q</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.Thmthm3.p1.m3.2">b</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math> is a quadratic pair on <Math mode="inline" tex="V," text="V" xml:id="S5.Thmthm3.p1.m4">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S5.Thmthm3.p1.m4.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.Thmthm3.p1.m4.1">V</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math> then for all <Math mode="inline" tex="x,y,z,w\in V" text="list@(x, y, z, w) element-of V" xml:id="S5.Thmthm3.p1.m5">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.Thmthm3.p1.m5.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.Thmthm3.p1.m5.2"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.Thmthm3.p1.m5.3"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.Thmthm3.p1.m5.4"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.Thmthm3.p1.m5.1">x</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.Thmthm3.p1.m5.2">y</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.Thmthm3.p1.m5.3">z</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.Thmthm3.p1.m5.4">w</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> the following hold:</text></p>

                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.E7.m1.1">x</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.E7.m1.2">y</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" rpadding="5.0pt" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S5.E7.m1.3.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S5.E7.m1.3.1">
                            <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
      </para>
    </theorem>
    <para xml:id="S5.p7">
      <p>The minimal ordering of <Math mode="inline" tex="R" text="R" xml:id="S5.p7.m1">

          </XMath>

          <XMath>

              <p><text font="italic">Thus </text><Math mode="inline" tex="x" text="x" xml:id="S5.I1.ix36.p1.m3">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>

                </Math><text font="italic"> and </text><Math mode="inline" tex="y" text="y" xml:id="S5.I1.ix36.p1.m4">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                  </XMath>
                </Math><text font="italic"> are incomparable iff </text><Math mode="inline" tex="y\in{\mathcal{T}}" text="y element-of T" xml:id="S5.I1.ix36.p1.m5">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMath>
                </Math><text font="italic"> and </text><Math mode="inline" tex="x\neq y," text="x not-equals y" xml:id="S5.I1.ix36.p1.m6">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.I1.ix36.p1.m6.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S5.I1.ix36.p1.m6.1">
                          <XMTok meaning="not-equals" name="neq" role="RELOP">≠</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMath>
                </Math><text font="italic"> but </text><Math mode="inline" tex="x\cong_{\nu}y." text="x approximately-equals _ nu y" xml:id="S5.I1.ix36.p1.m7">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.I1.ix36.p1.m7.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S5.I1.ix36.p1.m7.1">
                          <XMApp meaning="approximately-equals" role="RELOP">
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                            <XMTok meaning="approximately-equals" name="cong" role="RELOP">≅</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMath>
                </Math><text font="italic"></text></p>
            </para>
          </item>
        </enumerate>
      </para>
    </theorem>
    <proof>
      <title class="ltx_runin" font="italic">Proof.</title>
      <para xml:id="S5.p8">
        <p>All this can be read off from the description (<ref labelref="LABEL:eq:0.6"/>) of the sum <Math mode="inline" tex="x+y" text="x + y" xml:id="S5.p8.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> of <Math mode="inline" tex="x,y\in R" text="list@(x, y) element-of R" xml:id="S5.p8.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.p8.m2.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.p8.m2.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.p8.m2.1">x</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.p8.m2.2">y</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> in terms of the <Math mode="inline" tex="\nu" text="nu" xml:id="S5.p8.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>-dominance relation, recalled from <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="IzhakianRowen2007SuperTropical" separator="," yyseparator=","/>, §2]</cite>.<note mark="9" role="footnote" xml:id="footnote9"><tags>
              <tag>9</tag>
              <tag role="refnum">9</tag>
              <tag role="typerefnum">footnote 9</tag>
            </tags>The general assumption in <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="IzhakianRowen2007SuperTropical" separator="," yyseparator=","/>]</cite>, that the monoid <Math mode="inline" tex="(eR,\cdot\;)" text="open-interval@(e * R, cdot)" xml:id="footnote9.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                    <XMRef idref="footnote9.m1.2"/>
                    <XMRef idref="footnote9.m1.1"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="footnote9.m1.2">
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok name="cdot" role="MULOP" rpadding="2.8pt" xml:id="footnote9.m1.1">⋅</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math> is cancellative, is not needed here. It is only relevant if products <Math mode="inline" tex="xy" text="x * y" xml:id="footnote9.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> are involved.</note>
∎</p>
      </para>
    </proof>
    <para xml:id="S5.p9">
      <p>From Proposition <ref labelref="LABEL:prop:I.6.3"/> we read of that for any two elements <Math mode="inline" tex="x,y" text="list@(x, y)" xml:id="S5.p9.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                <XMRef idref="S5.p9.m1.1"/>
                <XMRef idref="S5.p9.m1.2"/>
              </XMApp>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.p9.m1.1">x</XMTok>
                <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.p9.m1.2">y</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math> of <Math mode="inline" tex="R" text="R" xml:id="S5.p9.m2">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> the maximum <Math mode="inline" tex="x\vee y:=\max_{R}\{x,y\}" text="x or y assign (maximum _ R)@(x, y)" xml:id="S5.p9.m3">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="assign" role="RELOP">:=</XMTok>
              <XMApp>

                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMRef idref="S5.p9.m3.3"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S5.p9.m3.1"/>

                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S5.p9.m3.3">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok meaning="maximum" role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">max</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.p9.m3.1">x</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.p9.m3.2">y</XMTok>

                  </XMWrap>

              </XMDual>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> exists, namely</p>

      <p>Note that</p>

      <p>while for arbitrary <Math mode="inline" tex="{\lambda}\in R" text="lambda element-of R" xml:id="S5.p9.m4">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> in general only
<Math mode="inline" tex="{\lambda}(x\vee y)\leq({\lambda}x)\vee({\lambda}y)" text="lambda * (x or y) less= lambda * x or lambda * y" xml:id="S5.p9.m5">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S5.p9.m5.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S5.p9.m5.1">
                      <XMTok meaning="or" name="vee" role="ADDOP">∨</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="or" name="vee" role="ADDOP">∨</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S5.p9.m5.2"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S5.p9.m5.2">
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S5.p9.m5.3"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S5.p9.m5.3">
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, but here we have equality if <Math mode="inline" tex="R" text="R" xml:id="S5.p9.m6">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>
is a supersemifield.</p>
    </para>
    <para xml:id="S5.p10">
      <p>Assume now that <Math mode="inline" tex="V" text="V" xml:id="S5.p10.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is a free <Math mode="inline" tex="R" text="R" xml:id="S5.p10.m2">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>-module with base <Math mode="inline" tex="({\varepsilon}_{i}{\ {|}\ }i\in I)." text="conditional@(varepsilon _ i, i) element-of I" xml:id="S5.p10.m3">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMRef idref="S5.p10.m3.1"/>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMDual xml:id="S5.p10.m3.1">
                  <XMRef idref="S5.p10.m3.1.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S5.p10.m3.1.1">
                      <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="conditional" role="MODIFIEROP" rpadding="5.0pt" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                        <XMApp rpadding="5.0pt">
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math> If <Math mode="inline" tex="x,y" text="list@(x, y)" xml:id="S5.p10.m4">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                <XMRef idref="S5.p10.m4.1"/>
                <XMRef idref="S5.p10.m4.2"/>
              </XMApp>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.p10.m4.1">x</XMTok>
                <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.p10.m4.2">y</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math> are vectors in <Math mode="inline" tex="V" text="V" xml:id="S5.p10.m5">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> with coordinates <Math mode="inline" tex="(x_{i}{\ {|}\ }i\in I)" text="conditional@(x _ i, i) element-of I" xml:id="S5.p10.m6">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMRef idref="S5.p10.m6.1"/>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                <XMApp xml:id="S5.p10.m6.1">
                  <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="conditional" role="MODIFIEROP" rpadding="5.0pt" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                    <XMApp rpadding="5.0pt">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, <Math mode="inline" tex="(y_{i}{\ {|}\ }i\in I)," text="conditional@(y _ i, i) element-of I" xml:id="S5.p10.m7">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMRef idref="S5.p10.m7.1"/>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMDual xml:id="S5.p10.m7.1">
                  <XMRef idref="S5.p10.m7.1.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S5.p10.m7.1.1">
                      <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="conditional" role="MODIFIEROP" rpadding="5.0pt" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                        <XMApp rpadding="5.0pt">
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math> i.e.,</p>
      <equation xml:id="S5.Ex3">
        <Math mode="display" tex="x=\sum_{i\in I}x_{i}{\varepsilon}_{i}\quad y=\sum_{i\in I}y_{i}{\varepsilon}_{%&#10;i}," text="formulae@(x = (sum _ (i element-of I))@(x _ i * varepsilon _ i), y = (sum _ (i element-of I))@(y _ i * varepsilon _ i))" xml:id="S5.Ex3.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMRef idref="S5.Ex3.m1.1"/>

                <XMDual xml:id="S5.Ex3.m1.1">
                  <XMApp>

                    <XMRef idref="S5.Ex3.m1.1.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S5.Ex3.m1.1.1">
                      <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid2"/>
                          <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="sum" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="mid">∑</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>

                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="quad" role="PUNCT"> </XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S5.Ex3.m1.1.2">
                      <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid2"/>
                          <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="sum" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="mid">∑</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>

                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math>
      </equation>
      <p>where <Math mode="inline" tex="x_{i}\neq 0" text="x _ i not-equals 0" xml:id="S5.p10.m8">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="not-equals" name="neq" role="RELOP">≠</XMTok>

                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>

            </XMApp>

        </Math> or <Math mode="inline" tex="y_{i}\neq 0" text="y _ i not-equals 0" xml:id="S5.p10.m9">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="not-equals" name="neq" role="RELOP">≠</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> only for finitely many <Math mode="inline" tex="i\in I," text="i element-of I" xml:id="S5.p10.m10">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMRef idref="S5.p10.m10.1"/>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMApp xml:id="S5.p10.m10.1">
                  <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math> then clearly</p>

    </para>
    <para xml:id="S5.p11">
      <p>Moreover, the maximum <Math mode="inline" tex="x\vee y=\max_{V}\{x,y\}" text="x or y = (maximum _ V)@(x, y)" xml:id="S5.p11.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>

                  <XMRef idref="S5.p11.m1.3"/>

                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>

              </XMDual>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, exists, and</p>
      <equation labels="LABEL:eq:I.6.15" xml:id="S5.E15">

      <p>It will be helpful below to argue by use of the <text font="bold">support</text> of an element
<Math mode="inline" tex="x=\sum_{i\in I}x_{i}{\varepsilon}_{i}" text="x = (sum _ (i element-of I))@(x _ i * varepsilon _ i)" xml:id="S5.p11.m2">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok mathstyle="text" meaning="sum" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="post">∑</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> of the free module <Math mode="inline" tex="V" text="V" xml:id="S5.p11.m3">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> defined as follows
<!--  %**** String Line 1400 **** --></p>
      <equation labels="LABEL:eq:I.6.16" xml:id="S5.E16">
        <tags>
          <tag>(5.16)</tag>
          <tag role="refnum">5.16</tag>
        </tags>
        <Math mode="display" tex="{\operatorname{supp}}(x):=\{i\in I{\ {|}\ }x_{i}\neq 0\}." text="supp@(x) assign conditional-set@(i element-of I, x _ i not-equals 0)" xml:id="S5.E16.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMRef idref="S5.E16.m1.3"/>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMApp xml:id="S5.E16.m1.3">
                  <XMTok meaning="assign" role="RELOP">:=</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.E16.m1.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.E16.m1.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post" xml:id="S5.E16.m1.1">supp</XMTok>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.E16.m1.2">x</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="conditional-set"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.E16.m1.3.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.E16.m1.3.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S5.E16.m1.3.1">
                        <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" rpadding="5.0pt">I</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="VERTBAR" rpadding="5.0pt" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S5.E16.m1.3.2">
                        <XMTok meaning="not-equals" name="neq" role="RELOP">≠</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math>
      </equation>
      <p>As consequence of (<ref labelref="LABEL:eq:I.6.15"/>) we have</p>
      <equation labels="LABEL:eq:I.6.17" xml:id="S5.E17">
        <tags>
          <tag>(5.17)</tag>
          <tag role="refnum">5.17</tag>
        </tags>
        <Math mode="display" tex="{\operatorname{supp}}(x\vee y)={\operatorname{supp}}(x)\cup{\operatorname{supp%&#10;}}(y)." text="supp@(x or y) = supp@(x) union supp@(y)" xml:id="S5.E17.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMRef idref="S5.E17.m1.6"/>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMApp xml:id="S5.E17.m1.6">
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.E17.m1.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.E17.m1.6.1"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post" xml:id="S5.E17.m1.1">supp</XMTok>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S5.E17.m1.6.1">
                          <XMTok meaning="or" name="vee" role="ADDOP">∨</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="union" name="cup" role="ADDOP">∪</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMRef idref="S5.E17.m1.2"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S5.E17.m1.3"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post" xml:id="S5.E17.m1.2">supp</XMTok>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.E17.m1.3">x</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMDual>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMRef idref="S5.E17.m1.4"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S5.E17.m1.5"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post" xml:id="S5.E17.m1.4">supp</XMTok>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.E17.m1.5">y</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math>
      </equation>
    </para>
    <para xml:id="S5.p12">
      <p>Notice that <Math mode="inline" tex="{\operatorname{supp}}(x)" text="supp@(x)" xml:id="S5.p12.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMApp>
                <XMRef idref="S5.p12.m1.1"/>
                <XMRef idref="S5.p12.m1.2"/>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post" xml:id="S5.p12.m1.1">supp</XMTok>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.p12.m1.2">x</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMApp>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is essentially independent of the choice of the base
<Math mode="inline" tex="({\varepsilon}_{i}\|i\in I)" text="conditional@(varepsilon _ i, i) element-of I" xml:id="S5.p12.m2">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMRef idref="S5.p12.m2.1"/>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                <XMApp xml:id="S5.p12.m2.1">
                  <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="conditional" name="||" role="MODIFIEROP">∥</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, since up to permutation every other base of <Math mode="inline" tex="V" text="V" xml:id="S5.p12.m3">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> arises by multiplying the <Math mode="inline" tex="{\varepsilon}_{i}" text="varepsilon _ i" xml:id="S5.p12.m4">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> by units of <Math mode="inline" tex="R" text="R" xml:id="S5.p12.m5">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="QF1" separator="," yyseparator=","/>, Theorem 0.9]</cite>. Notice also that <Math mode="inline" tex="{\operatorname{supp}}(x)" text="supp@(x)" xml:id="S5.p12.m6">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMApp>
                <XMRef idref="S5.p12.m6.1"/>
                <XMRef idref="S5.p12.m6.2"/>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post" xml:id="S5.p12.m6.1">supp</XMTok>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.p12.m6.2">x</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMApp>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is empty iff <Math mode="inline" tex="x=0" text="x = 0" xml:id="S5.p12.m7">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
              <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, and that <Math mode="inline" tex="y\leq x" text="y less= x" xml:id="S5.p12.m8">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> implies <Math mode="inline" tex="{\operatorname{supp}}(y)\subseteq{\operatorname{supp}}(x)" text="supp@(y) subset-of-or-equals supp@(x)" xml:id="S5.p12.m9">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="subset-of-or-equals" name="subseteq" role="RELOP">⊆</XMTok>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMRef idref="S5.p12.m9.1"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S5.p12.m9.2"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post" xml:id="S5.p12.m9.1">supp</XMTok>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.p12.m9.2">y</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMApp>
              </XMDual>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMRef idref="S5.p12.m9.3"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S5.p12.m9.4"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post" xml:id="S5.p12.m9.3">supp</XMTok>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.p12.m9.4">x</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMApp>
              </XMDual>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>.</p>
    </para>
  </section>
  <section inlist="toc" labels="LABEL:sec:II.9" xml:id="S6">

        <XMath>
          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
        </XMath>
      </Math>-minimal vectors with small support</title>
    <toctitle><tag close=" ">6</tag><Math mode="inline" tex="q" text="q" xml:id="S6.m2">
        <XMath>
          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
        </XMath>
      </Math>-minimal vectors with small support</toctitle>
    <para xml:id="S6.p1">
      <p>In this section <Math mode="inline" tex="R" text="R" xml:id="S6.p1.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is again a supertropical semiring. In all <Math mode="inline" tex="R" text="R" xml:id="S6.p1.m2">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>-modules we work with their minimal orderings.</p>
    </para>
    <theorem class="ltx_theorem_defn" inlist="thm theorem:defn" labels="LABEL:defn:II.9.1" xml:id="S6.Thmthm1">

      <para xml:id="S6.Thmthm1.p1">
        <p><text font="italic"></text></p>
        <enumerate xml:id="S6.I1">
          <item xml:id="S6.I1.ix37">

            <para xml:id="S6.I1.ix37.p1">
              <p><text font="italic">We call a map </text><Math mode="inline" tex="{\phi}:V\to W" text="phi colon V to W" xml:id="S6.I1.ix37.p1.m1">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok name="colon" role="METARELOP">:</XMTok>

                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok name="to" role="ARROW">→</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">W</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMath>
                </Math><text font="italic"> between </text><Math mode="inline" tex="R" text="R" xml:id="S6.I1.ix37.p1.m2">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                  </XMath>
                </Math><text font="italic">-modules </text><Math mode="inline" tex="V,W" text="list@(V, W)" xml:id="S6.I1.ix37.p1.m3">

                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMath>
                </Math><text font="italic"> </text><text font="bold italic">monotonic</text><text font="italic">
if for any </text><Math mode="inline" tex="x,y\in V" text="list@(x, y) element-of V" xml:id="S6.I1.ix37.p1.m4">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMApp>

                          <XMTok meaning="list"/>

                          <XMRef idref="S6.I1.ix37.p1.m4.2"/>

                      </XMDual>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>

                  </XMath>
                </Math><text font="italic"></text></p>
              <equation xml:id="S6.Ex1">
                <Math mode="display" tex="y\leq x{\quad{\Rightarrow}\quad}{\phi}(y)\leq{\phi}(x)." text="formulae@(y less= list@(x, Rightarrow), phi * y less= phi * x)" xml:id="S6.Ex1.m1">
                  <XMath>
