          <item xml:id="S6.I1.ix38">
            <tags>
              <tag>b)</tag>
              <tag role="typerefnum">item b)</tag>
            </tags>
            <para xml:id="S6.I1.ix38.p1">
              <p><text font="italic">Given a monotonic map </text><Math mode="inline" tex="{\phi}:V\to W" text="phi colon V to W" xml:id="S6.I1.ix38.p1.m1">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok name="colon" role="METARELOP">:</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="phi" role="UNKNOWN">ϕ</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok name="to" role="ARROW">→</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">W</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMath>
                </Math><text font="italic">, we call a vector </text><Math mode="inline" tex="x\in V" text="x element-of V" xml:id="S6.I1.ix38.p1.m2">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMath>
                </Math><text font="italic"> </text><Math mode="inline" tex="{\phi}" text="phi" xml:id="S6.I1.ix38.p1.m3">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="phi" role="UNKNOWN">ϕ</XMTok>
                  </XMath>
                </Math><text font="italic">-</text><text font="bold italic">minimal</text><text font="italic">,
if there </text><text font="bold italic">does
not</text><text font="italic"> exist a vector </text><Math mode="inline" tex="x^{\prime}&lt;x" text="x ^ prime less x" xml:id="S6.I1.ix38.p1.m4">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">&lt;</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMath>
                </Math><text font="italic"> in </text><Math mode="inline" tex="V" text="V" xml:id="S6.I1.ix38.p1.m5">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                  </XMath>
                </Math><text font="italic"> with </text><Math mode="inline" tex="{\phi}(x^{\prime})={\phi}(x)." text="phi * x ^ prime = phi * x" xml:id="S6.I1.ix38.p1.m6">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.I1.ix38.p1.m6.2"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S6.I1.ix38.p1.m6.2">
                          <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" name="phi" role="UNKNOWN">ϕ</XMTok>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMRef idref="S6.I1.ix38.p1.m6.2.1"/>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                <XMApp xml:id="S6.I1.ix38.p1.m6.2.1">
                                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" name="phi" role="UNKNOWN">ϕ</XMTok>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMRef idref="S6.I1.ix38.p1.m6.1"/>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.I1.ix38.p1.m6.1">x</XMTok>
                                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMath>
                </Math><text font="italic"></text></p>
            </para>
          </item>
        </enumerate>
      </para>
    </theorem>
    <theorem class="ltx_theorem_examples" inlist="thm theorem:examples" labels="LABEL:examps:II.9.2" xml:id="S6.Thmthm2">
      <tags>
        <tag>Examples 2</tag>
        <tag role="refnum">2</tag>
        <tag role="typerefnum">Examples 2</tag>
      </tags>
      <title class="ltx_runin"><tag><text font="bold">Examples 2</text></tag></title>
      <para xml:id="S6.Thmthm2.p1">
        <p><text font="italic"></text></p>
        <enumerate xml:id="S6.I2">
          <item xml:id="S6.I2.ix39">
            <tags>
              <tag>i)</tag>
              <tag role="typerefnum">item i)</tag>
            </tags>
            <para xml:id="S6.I2.ix39.p1">
              <p><text font="italic">For any </text><Math mode="inline" tex="n\in{\mathbb{N}}" text="n element-of N" xml:id="S6.I2.ix39.p1.m1">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMath>
                </Math><text font="italic"> and </text><Math mode="inline" tex="c\in R" text="c element-of R" xml:id="S6.I2.ix39.p1.m2">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMath>
                </Math><text font="italic">, the map </text><Math mode="inline" tex="R\to R," text="R to R" xml:id="S6.I2.ix39.p1.m3">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.I2.ix39.p1.m3.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S6.I2.ix39.p1.m3.1">
                          <XMTok name="to" role="ARROW">→</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMath>
                </Math><text font="italic"> </text><Math mode="inline" tex="x\mapsto cx^{n}," text="x maps-to c * x ^ n" xml:id="S6.I2.ix39.p1.m4">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.I2.ix39.p1.m4.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S6.I2.ix39.p1.m4.1">
                          <XMTok meaning="maps-to" name="mapsto" role="ARROW">↦</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMath>
                </Math><text font="italic"> is additive, and hence monotonic. More generally,
every monomial map </text><Math mode="inline" tex="R^{n}\to R," text="R ^ n to R" xml:id="S6.I2.ix39.p1.m5">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.I2.ix39.p1.m5.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S6.I2.ix39.p1.m5.1">
                          <XMTok name="to" role="ARROW">→</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMath>
                </Math><text font="italic">
</text><!--  %**** String Line 1425 **** --></p>
              <equation xml:id="S6.Ex2">
                <Math mode="display" tex="(x_{1},\dots,x_{n}){\ {\mapsto}\ }cx_{1}^{{\alpha}_{1}}\cdots x_{n}^{{\alpha}_%&#10;{n}},\qquad({\alpha}_{i}\in{\mathbb{N}}_{0})," xml:id="S6.Ex2.m1">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok name="dots" role="ID" xml:id="S6.Ex2.m1.1">…</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" rpadding="5.0pt" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                    <XMTok meaning="maps-to" name="mapsto" role="ARROW" rpadding="5.0pt">↦</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post5"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok name="cdots" role="ID">⋯</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post5"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT" rpadding="20.0pt">,</XMTok>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                        <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  </XMath>
                </Math>
              </equation>
              <p><text font="italic">is monotonic, and hence every polynomial map </text><Math mode="inline" tex="f:R^{n}\to R" text="f colon R ^ n to R" xml:id="S6.I2.ix39.p1.m6">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok name="colon" role="METARELOP">:</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">f</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok name="to" role="ARROW">→</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMath>
                </Math><text font="italic"> is monotonic.</text></p>
            </para>
          </item>
          <item xml:id="S6.I2.ix40">
            <tags>
              <tag>ii)</tag>
              <tag role="typerefnum">item ii)</tag>
            </tags>
            <para xml:id="S6.I2.ix40.p1">
              <p><text font="italic">Every quadratic form </text><Math mode="inline" tex="q:V\to R" text="q colon V to R" xml:id="S6.I2.ix40.p1.m1">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok name="colon" role="METARELOP">:</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok name="to" role="ARROW">→</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMath>
                </Math><text font="italic"> on an </text><Math mode="inline" tex="R" text="R" xml:id="S6.I2.ix40.p1.m2">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                  </XMath>
                </Math><text font="italic">-module </text><Math mode="inline" tex="V" text="V" xml:id="S6.I2.ix40.p1.m3">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                  </XMath>
                </Math><text font="italic"> is monotonic, cf.
Remark </text><ref font="italic" labelref="LABEL:rem:I.6.3"/><text font="italic">. We note the trivial fact
that an isotropic vector </text><Math mode="inline" tex="x\in V{\setminus}\{0\}" text="x element-of V set-minus set@(0)" xml:id="S6.I2.ix40.p1.m4">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="set-minus" name="setminus" role="ADDOP">∖</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="set"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S6.I2.ix40.p1.m4.1"/>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                            <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S6.I2.ix40.p1.m4.1">0</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMath>
                </Math><text font="italic"> is never </text><Math mode="inline" tex="q" text="q" xml:id="S6.I2.ix40.p1.m5">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                  </XMath>
                </Math><text font="italic">-minimal, since </text><Math mode="inline" tex="0&lt;x," text="0 less x" xml:id="S6.I2.ix40.p1.m6">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.I2.ix40.p1.m6.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S6.I2.ix40.p1.m6.1">
                          <XMTok meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">&lt;</XMTok>
                          <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMath>
                </Math><text font="italic"> but </text><Math mode="inline" tex="q(x)=q(0)=0." text="q * x = q * 0 = 0" xml:id="S6.I2.ix40.p1.m7">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.I2.ix40.p1.m7.3"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S6.I2.ix40.p1.m7.3">
                          <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMRef idref="S6.I2.ix40.p1.m7.1"/>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.I2.ix40.p1.m7.1">x</XMTok>
                                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMRef idref="S6.I2.ix40.p1.m7.2"/>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S6.I2.ix40.p1.m7.2">0</XMTok>
                                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                          <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMath>
                </Math><text font="italic"></text></p>
            </para>
          </item>
        </enumerate>
      </para>
    </theorem>
    <para xml:id="S6.p2">
      <p>Given a quadratic form <Math mode="inline" tex="q:V\to R" text="q colon V to R" xml:id="S6.p2.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok name="colon" role="METARELOP">:</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok name="to" role="ARROW">→</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, we turn to the problem of determining the <Math mode="inline" tex="q" text="q" xml:id="S6.p2.m2">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>-minimal vectors in <Math mode="inline" tex="V" text="V" xml:id="S6.p2.m3">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> in the case that the <Math mode="inline" tex="R" text="R" xml:id="S6.p2.m4">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>-module
<Math mode="inline" tex="V" text="V" xml:id="S6.p2.m5">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is free, and, if possible, at later stages also in more general situations. The following distinction of the
vectors in <Math mode="inline" tex="V" text="V" xml:id="S6.p2.m6">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> will be useful here and elsewhere.</p>
    </para>
    <theorem class="ltx_theorem_defn" inlist="thm theorem:defn" labels="LABEL:defn:II.9.3" xml:id="S6.Thmthm3">
      <tags>
        <tag>Definition 3</tag>
        <tag role="refnum">3</tag>
        <tag role="typerefnum">Definition 3</tag>
      </tags>
      <title class="ltx_runin"><tag><text font="bold">Definition 3</text></tag></title>
      <para xml:id="S6.Thmthm3.p1">
        <p><text font="italic">We call a vector <Math mode="inline" tex="x\in V{\setminus}\{0\}" text="x element-of V set-minus set@(0)" xml:id="S6.Thmthm3.p1.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" meaning="set-minus" name="setminus" role="ADDOP">∖</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="set"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.Thmthm3.p1.m1.1"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" meaning="0" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S6.Thmthm3.p1.m1.1">0</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> <Math mode="inline" tex="\bf g" text="g" xml:id="S6.Thmthm3.p1.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="bold upright" role="UNKNOWN">g</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math>-<text font="bold">isotropic</text>, if <Math mode="inline" tex="q(x)\in eR," text="q * x element-of e * R" xml:id="S6.Thmthm3.p1.m3">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S6.Thmthm3.p1.m3.2"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S6.Thmthm3.p1.m3.2">
                      <XMTok font="upright" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S6.Thmthm3.p1.m3.1"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.Thmthm3.p1.m3.1">x</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math> and we call <Math mode="inline" tex="x" text="x" xml:id="S6.Thmthm3.p1.m4">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> <Math mode="inline" tex="\bf g" text="g" xml:id="S6.Thmthm3.p1.m5">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="bold upright" role="UNKNOWN">g</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math>-<text font="bold">anisotropic</text>,
if <Math mode="inline" tex="q(x)\in{\mathcal{T}}." text="q * x element-of T" xml:id="S6.Thmthm3.p1.m6">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S6.Thmthm3.p1.m6.2"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S6.Thmthm3.p1.m6.2">
                      <XMTok font="upright" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S6.Thmthm3.p1.m6.1"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.Thmthm3.p1.m6.1">x</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="caligraphic upright" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math><note mark="10" role="footnote" xml:id="footnote10"><tags>
                <tag><text font="upright">10</text></tag>
                <tag role="refnum"><text font="upright">10</text></tag>
                <tag role="typerefnum"><text font="upright">footnote 10</text></tag>
              </tags><text font="upright">The letter “g” alludes to “ghost”.</text></note> The zero vector is regarded as both <Math mode="inline" tex="g" text="g" xml:id="S6.Thmthm3.p1.m7">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">g</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math>-isotropic
and <Math mode="inline" tex="g" text="g" xml:id="S6.Thmthm3.p1.m8">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">g</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math>-anisotropic.</text></p>
      </para>
    </theorem>
    <theorem class="ltx_theorem_prop" inlist="thm theorem:prop" labels="LABEL:prop:II.9.4" xml:id="S6.Thmthm4">
      <tags>
        <tag>Proposition 4</tag>
        <tag role="refnum">4</tag>
        <tag role="typerefnum">Proposition 4</tag>
      </tags>
      <title class="ltx_runin"><tag><text font="bold">Proposition 4</text></tag></title>
      <para xml:id="S6.Thmthm4.p1">
        <p><text font="italic">Assume that <Math mode="inline" tex="V" text="V" xml:id="S6.Thmthm4.p1.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> is free with base <Math mode="inline" tex="({\varepsilon}_{i}\|i\in I)." text="conditional@(varepsilon _ i, i) element-of I" xml:id="S6.Thmthm4.p1.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S6.Thmthm4.p1.m2.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMDual xml:id="S6.Thmthm4.p1.m2.1">
                      <XMRef idref="S6.Thmthm4.p1.m2.1.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S6.Thmthm4.p1.m2.1.1">
                          <XMTok font="upright" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok font="upright" meaning="conditional" name="||" role="MODIFIEROP">∥</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                              <XMTok name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>

                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.p4.m4.1.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S6.p4.m4.1.1">
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> then <Math mode="inline" tex="x_{k}{\varepsilon}_{k}\leq x" text="x _ k * varepsilon _ k less= x" xml:id="S6.p4.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="q(x_{k}{\varepsilon}_{k})=q(x);" text="q * x _ k * varepsilon _ k = q * x" xml:id="S6.p4.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S6.p4.m6.2"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S6.p4.m6.2">
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.p4.m6.2.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S6.p4.m6.2.1">
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                              <XMTok font="italic" name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.p4.m6.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p4.m6.1">x</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">;</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> hence <Math mode="inline" tex="x=x_{k}{\varepsilon}_{k}" text="x = x _ k * varepsilon _ k" xml:id="S6.p4.m7">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="J=\{k\}." text="J = set@(k)" xml:id="S6.p4.m8">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S6.p4.m8.2"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S6.p4.m8.2">
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">J</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="set"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.p4.m8.1"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p4.m8.1">k</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> If the <Math mode="inline" tex="\nu" text="nu" xml:id="S6.p4.m9">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>-dominant term is <Math mode="inline" tex="x_{k}x_{\ell}b({\varepsilon}_{k},{\varepsilon}_{\ell})," text="x _ k * x _ ell * b * open-interval@(varepsilon _ k, varepsilon _ ell)" xml:id="S6.p4.m10">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S6.p4.m10.1"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S6.p4.m10.1">
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="ell" role="UNKNOWN">ℓ</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>

                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S6.p4.m10.1.1">
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>

                        <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S6.p4.m10.1.2">
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="ell" role="UNKNOWN">ℓ</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> then <Math mode="inline" tex="x_{k}{\varepsilon}_{k}+x_{\ell}{\varepsilon}_{\ell}\leq x" text="x _ k * varepsilon _ k + x _ ell * varepsilon _ ell less= x" xml:id="S6.p4.m11">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="ell" role="UNKNOWN">ℓ</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="ell" role="UNKNOWN">ℓ</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and again both vectors have the same <Math mode="inline" tex="q" text="q" xml:id="S6.p4.m12">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>-values, and hence <Math mode="inline" tex="x=x_{k}{\varepsilon}_{k}+x_{\ell}{\varepsilon}_{k}," text="x = x _ k * varepsilon _ k + x _ ell * varepsilon _ k" xml:id="S6.p4.m13">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S6.p4.m13.1"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S6.p4.m13.1">
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>

                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="ell" role="UNKNOWN">ℓ</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="J=\{k,\ell\}." text="J = set@(k, ell)" xml:id="S6.p4.m14">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S6.p4.m14.3"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S6.p4.m14.3">

                      <XMApp>

                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> Indeed, then</p>
        <equation xml:id="S6.Ex4">
          <Math mode="display" tex="q(x)=x_{k}x_{\ell}b({\varepsilon}_{k},{\varepsilon}_{\ell})\leq q(x_{k}{%&#10;\varepsilon}_{k}+x_{\ell}{\varepsilon}_{\ell})\leq q(x)." text="q * x = x _ k * x _ ell * b * open-interval@(varepsilon _ k, varepsilon _ ell) less= q * (x _ k * varepsilon _ k + x _ ell * varepsilon _ ell) less= q * x" xml:id="S6.Ex4.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S6.Ex4.m1.3"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S6.Ex4.m1.3">
                    <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.Ex4.m1.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.Ex4.m1.1">x</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="ell" role="UNKNOWN">ℓ</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S6.Ex4.m1.3.1"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S6.Ex4.m1.3.2"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S6.Ex4.m1.3.1">
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S6.Ex4.m1.3.2">
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="ell" role="UNKNOWN">ℓ</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.Ex4.m1.3.3"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S6.Ex4.m1.3.3">
                            <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                <XMTok font="italic" name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>

                            </XMApp>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="ell" role="UNKNOWN">ℓ</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                <XMTok font="italic" name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>

                              </XMApp>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.Ex4.m1.2"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="S6.p5">
        <p>If <Math mode="inline" tex="q(x)\in{\mathcal{G}}" text="q * x element-of G" xml:id="S6.p5.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p5.m1.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p5.m1.1">x</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, then on the right of <Math mode="inline" tex="(\ast" xml:id="S6.p5.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
              <XMTok name="ast" role="MULOP">∗</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>) there exists either a <Math mode="inline" tex="\nu" text="nu" xml:id="S6.p5.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>-dominant term, which is ghost,
or there exist two <Math mode="inline" tex="\nu" text="nu" xml:id="S6.p5.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>-dominant terms which are tangible. In the first case, we see as above that <Math mode="inline" tex="|J|\leq 2," text="absolute-value@(J) less= 2" xml:id="S6.p5.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S6.p5.m5.2"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S6.p5.m5.2">
                    <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.p5.m5.1"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p5.m5.1">J</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                    <XMTok meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and in the second that <Math mode="inline" tex="|J|\leq 4." text="absolute-value@(J) less= 4" xml:id="S6.p5.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S6.p5.m6.2"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S6.p5.m6.2">
                    <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.p5.m6.1"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p5.m6.1">J</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                    <XMTok meaning="4" role="NUMBER">4</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
∎</p>
      </para>
    </proof>

      <para xml:id="S6.Thmthm5.p1">

    <para xml:id="S6.p7">

                  <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>

                </XMApp>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
iff <Math mode="inline" tex="{\lambda}^{\prime}{}^{2}{\alpha}_{1}&lt;{\lambda}^{2}{\alpha}_{1}." text="lambda ^ prime * ^ 2 alpha _ 1 less lambda ^ 2 * alpha _ 1" xml:id="S6.p9.m8">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S6.p9.m8.1"/>

                  <XMApp xml:id="S6.p9.m8.1">

                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="pre3"/>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>

                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>

                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>

                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>

                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> Thus <Math mode="inline" tex="x" text="x" xml:id="S6.p9.m9">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
            </XMath>

            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>-minimal. Assume now that <Math mode="inline" tex="{\alpha}_{1}\in{\mathcal{G}}." text="alpha _ 1 element-of G" xml:id="S6.p9.m11">

        <p>and a fortiori <Math mode="inline" tex="q(x^{\prime})&lt;q(x)." text="q * x ^ prime less q * x" xml:id="S6.p9.m24">
            <XMath>

                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.p9.m24.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p9.m24.1">x</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>

                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> Thus <Math mode="inline" tex="x" text="x" xml:id="S6.p9.m25">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
is <Math mode="inline" tex="q" text="q" xml:id="S6.p9.m26">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>-minimal.</p>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="S6.p10">
        <p>b): We have <Math mode="inline" tex="q(x)={\lambda}^{2}{\alpha}_{1}+\mu^{2}{\alpha}_{2}." text="q * x = lambda ^ 2 * alpha _ 1 + mu ^ 2 * alpha _ 2" xml:id="S6.p10.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S6.p10.m1.2"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S6.p10.m1.2">
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.p10.m1.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p10.m1.1">x</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> If <Math mode="inline" tex="q(x)=0," text="q * x = 0" xml:id="S6.p10.m2">

              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>-minimal (cf. Example <ref labelref="LABEL:examps:II.9.2"/>.ii).</p>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="S6.p11">
        <p>Assume now that <Math mode="inline" tex="q(x)\neq 0." text="q * x not-equals 0" xml:id="S6.p11.m1">

            </XMath>
          </Math> and thus <Math mode="inline" tex="x" text="x" xml:id="S6.p11.m15">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is not
<Math mode="inline" tex="q" text="q" xml:id="S6.p11.m16">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>-minimal. We are left with the case that both <Math mode="inline" tex="{\lambda}^{2}{\alpha}_{1}," text="lambda ^ 2 * alpha _ 1" xml:id="S6.p11.m17">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S6.p11.m17.1"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S6.p11.m17.1">
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> <Math mode="inline" tex="\mu^{2}{\alpha}_{2}" text="mu ^ 2 * alpha _ 2" xml:id="S6.p11.m18">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> are tangible. This means that
<Math mode="inline" tex="{\lambda},\mu,{\alpha}_{1},{\alpha}_{2}\in{\mathcal{T}}." text="list@(lambda, mu, alpha _ 1, alpha _ 2) element-of T" xml:id="S6.p11.m19">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S6.p11.m19.3"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S6.p11.m19.3">
                    <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.p11.m19.1"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.p11.m19.2"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.p11.m19.3.1"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.p11.m19.3.2"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p11.m19.1">λ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p11.m19.2">μ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S6.p11.m19.3.1">
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S6.p11.m19.3.2">
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                    <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math></p>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="S6.p12">
        <p>If <Math mode="inline" tex="x^{\prime}&lt;x," text="x ^ prime less x" xml:id="S6.p12.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S6.p12.m1.1"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S6.p12.m1.1">
                    <XMTok meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">&lt;</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> then either <Math mode="inline" tex="x^{\prime}\leq{\lambda}^{\prime}{\varepsilon}_{1}+\mu{\varepsilon}_{2}" text="x ^ prime less= lambda ^ prime * varepsilon _ 1 + mu * varepsilon _ 2" xml:id="S6.p12.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> or <Math mode="inline" tex="x^{\prime}\leq{\lambda}{\varepsilon}_{1}+\mu^{\prime}{\varepsilon}_{2}" text="x ^ prime less= lambda * varepsilon _ 1 + mu ^ prime * varepsilon _ 2" xml:id="S6.p12.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
with <Math mode="inline" tex="{\lambda}^{\prime}&lt;{\lambda}" text="lambda ^ prime less lambda" xml:id="S6.p12.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">&lt;</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, resp. <Math mode="inline" tex="\mu^{\prime}&lt;\mu." text="mu ^ prime less mu" xml:id="S6.p12.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S6.p12.m5.1"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S6.p12.m5.1">
                    <XMTok meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">&lt;</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> In the first case, <Math mode="inline" tex="{\lambda}^{\prime}&lt;_{\nu}{\lambda}" text="lambda ^ prime less _ nu lambda" xml:id="S6.p12.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMApp meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>

                </XMApp>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> (cf. (<ref labelref="LABEL:eq:I.6.11"/>)),
hence <Math mode="inline" tex="{\lambda}^{\prime}{}^{2}{\alpha}_{1}&lt;_{\nu}{\lambda}^{2}{\alpha}_{1}\cong_{\nu%&#10;}\mu^{2}{\alpha}_{2}," text="lambda ^ prime * ^ 2 alpha _ 1 less _ nu lambda ^ 2 * alpha _ 1 approximately-equals _ nu mu ^ 2 * alpha _ 2" xml:id="S6.p12.m7">
            <XMath>

<!--  %**** String Line 1525 **** -->        <p>In the second case, <Math mode="inline" tex="q(x^{\prime})&lt;q(x)" text="q * x ^ prime less q * x" xml:id="S6.p12.m8">
            <XMath>

                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> for the same reason. Thus <Math mode="inline" tex="x" text="x" xml:id="S6.p12.m9">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is <Math mode="inline" tex="q" text="q" xml:id="S6.p12.m10">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>-minimal.
∎</p>
      </para>
    </proof>
    <para xml:id="S6.p13">
      <p><text class="ltx_emph" font="italic">We now assume that <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathcal{G}}" text="G" xml:id="S6.p13.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="caligraphic upright" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is a cancellative monoid under multiplication and <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathcal{G}}=e{\mathcal{T}}" text="G = e * T" xml:id="S6.p13.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok font="upright" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="caligraphic upright" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="caligraphic upright" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math></text>, furthermore that <Math mode="inline" tex="(q,b)" text="open-interval@(q, b)" xml:id="S6.p13.m3">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                <XMRef idref="S6.p13.m3.1"/>
                <XMRef idref="S6.p13.m3.2"/>
              </XMApp>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p13.m3.1">q</XMTok>
                <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p13.m3.2">b</XMTok>
                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is a quadratic pair on the free binary module
<Math mode="inline" tex="V:=R{\varepsilon}_{1}+R{\varepsilon}_{2}." text="V assign R * varepsilon _ 1 + R * varepsilon _ 2" xml:id="S6.p13.m4">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMRef idref="S6.p13.m4.1"/>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMApp xml:id="S6.p13.m4.1">
                  <XMTok meaning="assign" role="RELOP">:=</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math> We search for all <Math mode="inline" tex="q" text="q" xml:id="S6.p13.m5">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>-minimal vectors in <Math mode="inline" tex="V" text="V" xml:id="S6.p13.m6">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> with full support.</p>
    </para>
    <para xml:id="S6.p14">
      <p>Let <Math mode="inline" tex="{\alpha}_{1}:=q({\varepsilon}_{1})," text="alpha _ 1 assign q * varepsilon _ 1" xml:id="S6.p14.m1">

              </XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>. Then</p>
      <equation labels="LABEL:eq:sstr" xml:id="S6.Ex7">
        <tags>
          <tag>(<Math mode="inline" tex="\ast\ast" text="list@(ast, ast)" xml:id="S6.Ex7.m1">

        <Math mode="display" tex="q(x)={\alpha}_{1}x_{1}^{2}+{\beta}x_{1}x_{2}+{\alpha}_{2}x_{2}^{2}." text="q * x = alpha _ 1 * (x _ 1) ^ 2 + beta * x _ 1 * x _ 2 + alpha _ 2 * (x _ 2) ^ 2" xml:id="S6.Ex7.m3">
          <XMath>

                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>

                      <XMTok font="italic" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN">β</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>

                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math>
      </equation>
      <p>Looking at the <Math mode="inline" tex="\nu" text="nu" xml:id="S6.p14.m7">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>-dominant terms in the sum (<ref labelref="LABEL:eq:sstr"/>) we will run through several cases and will easily find out when <Math mode="inline" tex="x" text="x" xml:id="S6.p14.m8">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is <Math mode="inline" tex="q" text="q" xml:id="S6.p14.m9">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>-minimal.</p>
    </para>
    <para xml:id="S6.p15">
      <enumerate xml:id="S6.I4">

          <para xml:id="S6.I4.ix43.p1">
            <p>Assume that <Math mode="inline" tex="{\alpha}_{1}x_{1}^{2}" text="alpha _ 1 * (x _ 1) ^ 2" xml:id="S6.I4.ix43.p1.m1">

                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math> (or <Math mode="inline" tex="{\alpha}_{2}x_{2}^{2}" text="alpha _ 2 * (x _ 2) ^ 2" xml:id="S6.I4.ix43.p1.m2">
