                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math>) is the only <Math mode="inline" tex="\nu" text="nu" xml:id="S6.I4.ix43.p1.m3">
                <XMath>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
                </XMath>
              </Math>-dominant term. Then <Math mode="inline" tex="q(x)=q(x_{1}{\varepsilon}_{1})" text="q * x = q * x _ 1 * varepsilon _ 1" xml:id="S6.I4.ix43.p1.m4">

              </Math> or <Math mode="inline" tex="q(x)=q(x_{2}{\varepsilon}_{2})" text="q * x = q * x _ 2 * varepsilon _ 2" xml:id="S6.I4.ix43.p1.m5">

                </XMath>
              </Math>. Clearly <Math mode="inline" tex="x" text="x" xml:id="S6.I4.ix43.p1.m6">
                <XMath>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                </XMath>
              </Math> is not <Math mode="inline" tex="q" text="q" xml:id="S6.I4.ix43.p1.m7">
                <XMath>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                </XMath>
              </Math>-minimal.</p>
          </para>
        </item>
        <item xml:id="S6.I4.ix44">
          <tags>
            <tag>1)</tag>
            <tag role="typerefnum">item 1)</tag>
          </tags>
          <para xml:id="S6.I4.ix44.p1">
            <p>Assume that both <Math mode="inline" tex="{\alpha}_{1}x_{1}^{2}" text="alpha _ 1 * (x _ 1) ^ 2" xml:id="S6.I4.ix44.p1.m1">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="{\alpha}_{2}x_{2}^{2}" text="alpha _ 2 * (x _ 2) ^ 2" xml:id="S6.I4.ix44.p1.m2">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math> are <Math mode="inline" tex="\nu" text="nu" xml:id="S6.I4.ix44.p1.m3">
                <XMath>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
                </XMath>
              </Math>-dominant.
If, say, <Math mode="inline" tex="{\alpha}_{1}x_{1}^{2}" text="alpha _ 1 * (x _ 1) ^ 2" xml:id="S6.I4.ix44.p1.m4">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math> is ghost, then <Math mode="inline" tex="q(x)=q(x_{1}{\varepsilon}_{1})" text="q * x = q * x _ 1 * varepsilon _ 1" xml:id="S6.I4.ix44.p1.m5">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.I4.ix44.p1.m5.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.I4.ix44.p1.m5.1">x</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.I4.ix44.p1.m5.2"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S6.I4.ix44.p1.m5.2">
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                              <XMTok font="italic" name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math> again, and <Math mode="inline" tex="x" text="x" xml:id="S6.I4.ix44.p1.m6">
                <XMath>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                </XMath>
              </Math> is not <Math mode="inline" tex="q" text="q" xml:id="S6.I4.ix44.p1.m7">
                <XMath>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                </XMath>
              </Math>-minimal.
If both <Math mode="inline" tex="{\alpha}_{1}x_{1}^{2}" text="alpha _ 1 * (x _ 1) ^ 2" xml:id="S6.I4.ix44.p1.m8">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="{\alpha}_{2}x_{2}^{2}" text="alpha _ 2 * (x _ 2) ^ 2" xml:id="S6.I4.ix44.p1.m9">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math> are tangible, then for a vector
<Math mode="inline" tex="x^{\prime}=x^{\prime}_{1}{\varepsilon}_{1}+x^{\prime}_{2}{\varepsilon}_{2}&lt;x" text="x ^ prime = (x ^ prime) _ 1 * varepsilon _ 1 + (x ^ prime) _ 2 * varepsilon _ 2 less x" xml:id="S6.I4.ix44.p1.m10">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">&lt;</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math> either <Math mode="inline" tex="x^{\prime}_{1}&lt;x_{1}" text="(x ^ prime) _ 1 less x _ 1" xml:id="S6.I4.ix44.p1.m11">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">&lt;</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math> or <Math mode="inline" tex="x^{\prime}_{2}&lt;x_{2}" text="(x ^ prime) _ 2 less x _ 2" xml:id="S6.I4.ix44.p1.m12">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">&lt;</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math>, which implies
<Math mode="inline" tex="x^{\prime}_{1}&lt;_{\nu}x_{1}" text="(x ^ prime) _ 1 less _ nu x _ 1" xml:id="S6.I4.ix44.p1.m13">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMApp meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">&lt;</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math> or <Math mode="inline" tex="x^{\prime}_{2}&lt;_{\nu}x_{2}" text="(x ^ prime) _ 2 less _ nu x _ 2" xml:id="S6.I4.ix44.p1.m14">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMApp meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">&lt;</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math>, since both <Math mode="inline" tex="x_{1}^{\prime},x^{\prime}_{2}" text="list@((x _ 1) ^ prime, (x ^ prime) _ 2)" xml:id="S6.I4.ix44.p1.m15">
                <XMath>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.I4.ix44.p1.m15.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.I4.ix44.p1.m15.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S6.I4.ix44.p1.m15.1">
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S6.I4.ix44.p1.m15.2">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMath>
              </Math> are tangible. We conclude that
<Math mode="inline" tex="q(x^{\prime})&lt;q(x)" text="q * x ^ prime less q * x" xml:id="S6.I4.ix44.p1.m16">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">&lt;</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.I4.ix44.p1.m16.2"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S6.I4.ix44.p1.m16.2">
                            <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.I4.ix44.p1.m16.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.I4.ix44.p1.m16.1">x</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math>. Thus <Math mode="inline" tex="x" text="x" xml:id="S6.I4.ix44.p1.m17">
                <XMath>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                </XMath>
              </Math> is <Math mode="inline" tex="q" text="q" xml:id="S6.I4.ix44.p1.m18">
                <XMath>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                </XMath>
              </Math>-minimal iff <Math mode="inline" tex="{\alpha}_{1},{\alpha}_{2},x_{1},x_{2}" text="list@(alpha _ 1, alpha _ 2, x _ 1, x _ 2)" xml:id="S6.I4.ix44.p1.m19">
                <XMath>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.I4.ix44.p1.m19.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.I4.ix44.p1.m19.2"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.I4.ix44.p1.m19.3"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.I4.ix44.p1.m19.4"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S6.I4.ix44.p1.m19.1">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S6.I4.ix44.p1.m19.2">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S6.I4.ix44.p1.m19.3">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S6.I4.ix44.p1.m19.4">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMath>
              </Math> are all tangible.</p>
          </para>
        </item>
        <item xml:id="S6.I4.ix45">
          <tags>
            <tag>2)</tag>
            <tag role="typerefnum">item 2)</tag>
          </tags>
          <para xml:id="S6.I4.ix45.p1">
            <p>Assume that <Math mode="inline" tex="{\alpha}_{1}x_{1}^{2}{\cong_{\nu}}{\beta}x_{1}x_{2}&gt;{\alpha}_{2}x_{2}^{2}" text="alpha _ 1 * (x _ 1) ^ 2 approximately-equals _ nu beta * x _ 1 * x _ 2 &gt; alpha _ 2 * (x _ 2) ^ 2" xml:id="S6.I4.ix45.p1.m1">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp meaning="approximately-equals" role="RELOP">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok meaning="approximately-equals" name="cong" role="RELOP">≅</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN">β</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="greater-than" role="RELOP">&gt;</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math>. Then <Math mode="inline" tex="q(x)=e{\alpha}_{1}x_{1}^{2}=e{\beta}x_{1}x_{2}\in{\mathcal{G}}" text="q * x = e * alpha _ 1 * (x _ 1) ^ 2 = e * beta * x _ 1 * x _ 2 element-of G" xml:id="S6.I4.ix45.p1.m2">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.I4.ix45.p1.m2.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.I4.ix45.p1.m2.1">x</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>

                            <XMTok name="prime1" role="SUPOP" xml:id="S6.I4.ix45.p2.m9.2">′</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="PUNCT">⁣</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S6.I4.ix45.p2.m9.1">2</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math> <Math mode="inline" tex="{\beta}x^{\prime}_{1}x_{2}&lt;_{\nu}{\beta}x_{1}x_{2}" text="beta * (x ^ prime) _ 1 * x _ 2 less _ nu beta * x _ 1 * x _ 2" xml:id="S6.I4.ix45.p2.m10">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMApp meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">&lt;</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN">β</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN">β</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math>, and we see that <Math mode="inline" tex="q(x^{\prime})&lt;q(x)" text="q * x ^ prime less q * x" xml:id="S6.I4.ix45.p2.m11">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">&lt;</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.I4.ix45.p2.m11.2"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S6.I4.ix45.p2.m11.2">
                            <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.I4.ix45.p2.m11.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.I4.ix45.p2.m11.1">x</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math>. But if
<Math mode="inline" tex="x^{\prime}_{1}=x_{1}" text="(x ^ prime) _ 1 = x _ 1" xml:id="S6.I4.ix45.p2.m12">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math>, <Math mode="inline" tex="x^{\prime}_{2}&lt;x_{2}" text="(x ^ prime) _ 2 less x _ 2" xml:id="S6.I4.ix45.p2.m13">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">&lt;</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>

                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math>, <Math mode="inline" tex="ex^{\prime}_{2}=x_{2}" text="e * (x ^ prime) _ 2 = x _ 2" xml:id="S6.I4.ix45.p2.m14">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>

                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math>, and <Math mode="inline" tex="{\beta}\in{\mathcal{G}}" text="beta element-of G" xml:id="S6.I4.ix45.p2.m15">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN">β</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math>, then
<Math mode="inline" tex="q(x^{\prime})=q(x)" text="q * x ^ prime = q * x" xml:id="S6.I4.ix45.p2.m16">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>

                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.I4.ix45.p2.m16.2"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S6.I4.ix45.p2.m16.2">
                            <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.I4.ix45.p2.m16.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.I4.ix45.p2.m16.1">x</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math>, while if <Math mode="inline" tex="{\beta}\in{\mathcal{T}}" text="beta element-of T" xml:id="S6.I4.ix45.p2.m17">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN">β</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math> this cannot happen. We conclude that <Math mode="inline" tex="x" text="x" xml:id="S6.I4.ix45.p2.m18">
                <XMath>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                </XMath>
              </Math> is <Math mode="inline" tex="q" text="q" xml:id="S6.I4.ix45.p2.m19">
                <XMath>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                </XMath>
              </Math>-minimal iff <Math mode="inline" tex="{\alpha}_{1},{\beta},x_{1}" text="list@(alpha _ 1, beta, x _ 1)" xml:id="S6.I4.ix45.p2.m20">
                <XMath>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.I4.ix45.p2.m20.2"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.I4.ix45.p2.m20.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.I4.ix45.p2.m20.3"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S6.I4.ix45.p2.m20.2">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.I4.ix45.p2.m20.1">β</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S6.I4.ix45.p2.m20.3">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMath>
              </Math> are all tangible.</p>
          </para>
        </item>
        <item xml:id="S6.I4.ix46">
          <tags>
            <tag>3)</tag>
            <tag role="typerefnum">item 3)</tag>
          </tags>
          <para xml:id="S6.I4.ix46.p1">
            <p>Analogously, if <Math mode="inline" tex="{\alpha}_{2}x_{2}^{2}{\cong_{\nu}}{\beta}x_{1}x_{2}&gt;{\alpha}_{1}x_{1}^{2}" text="alpha _ 2 * (x _ 2) ^ 2 approximately-equals _ nu beta * x _ 1 * x _ 2 &gt; alpha _ 1 * (x _ 1) ^ 2" xml:id="S6.I4.ix46.p1.m1">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp meaning="approximately-equals" role="RELOP">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok meaning="approximately-equals" name="cong" role="RELOP">≅</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN">β</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="greater-than" role="RELOP">&gt;</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math>, then <Math mode="inline" tex="x" text="x" xml:id="S6.I4.ix46.p1.m2">
                <XMath>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                </XMath>
              </Math> is <Math mode="inline" tex="q" text="q" xml:id="S6.I4.ix46.p1.m3">
                <XMath>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                </XMath>
              </Math>-minimal iff
<Math mode="inline" tex="{\alpha}_{2},{\beta},x_{2}" text="list@(alpha _ 2, beta, x _ 2)" xml:id="S6.I4.ix46.p1.m4">
                <XMath>

        <item xml:id="S6.I4.ix47">
          <tags>
            <tag>4)</tag>
            <tag role="typerefnum">item 4)</tag>
          </tags>
          <para xml:id="S6.I4.ix47.p1">
            <p>Assume that <Math mode="inline" tex="{\alpha}_{1}x_{1}^{2}&lt;_{\nu}{\beta}x_{1}x_{2}" text="alpha _ 1 * (x _ 1) ^ 2 less _ nu beta * x _ 1 * x _ 2" xml:id="S6.I4.ix47.p1.m1">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMApp meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">&lt;</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN">β</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math>, <Math mode="inline" tex="{\alpha}_{2}x_{2}^{2}&lt;_{\nu}{\beta}x_{1}x_{2}" text="alpha _ 2 * (x _ 2) ^ 2 less _ nu beta * x _ 1 * x _ 2" xml:id="S6.I4.ix47.p1.m2">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMApp meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">&lt;</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN">β</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math>. Now <Math mode="inline" tex="q(x)={\beta}x_{1}x_{2}." text="q * x = beta * x _ 1 * x _ 2" xml:id="S6.I4.ix47.p1.m3">
                <XMath>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.I4.ix47.p1.m3.2"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S6.I4.ix47.p1.m3.2">
                        <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMRef idref="S6.I4.ix47.p1.m3.1"/>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.I4.ix47.p1.m3.1">x</XMTok>
                              <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN">β</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMath>
              </Math>
Arguing similarly as in Case 3), we see that, when <Math mode="inline" tex="{\beta}\in{\mathcal{G}}" text="beta element-of G" xml:id="S6.I4.ix47.p1.m4">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN">β</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math> then <Math mode="inline" tex="x" text="x" xml:id="S6.I4.ix47.p1.m5">
                <XMath>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                </XMath>
              </Math> is
<Math mode="inline" tex="q" text="q" xml:id="S6.I4.ix47.p1.m6">
                <XMath>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                </XMath>
              </Math>-minimal iff <Math mode="inline" tex="x_{1}\in{\mathcal{T}}" text="x _ 1 element-of T" xml:id="S6.I4.ix47.p1.m7">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="x_{2}\in{\mathcal{T}}" text="x _ 2 element-of T" xml:id="S6.I4.ix47.p1.m8">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math>, while when <Math mode="inline" tex="{\beta}\in{\mathcal{T}}" text="beta element-of T" xml:id="S6.I4.ix47.p1.m9">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN">β</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math>, then <Math mode="inline" tex="x" text="x" xml:id="S6.I4.ix47.p1.m10">
                <XMath>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                </XMath>
              </Math> is
<Math mode="inline" tex="q" text="q" xml:id="S6.I4.ix47.p1.m11">
                <XMath>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                </XMath>
              </Math>-minimal iff <Math mode="inline" tex="x_{1}\in{\mathcal{T}}" text="x _ 1 element-of T" xml:id="S6.I4.ix47.p1.m12">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math> or <Math mode="inline" tex="x_{2}\in{\mathcal{T}}" text="x _ 2 element-of T" xml:id="S6.I4.ix47.p1.m13">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math>. Thus all together <Math mode="inline" tex="x" text="x" xml:id="S6.I4.ix47.p1.m14">
                <XMath>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                </XMath>
              </Math> is
<Math mode="inline" tex="q" text="q" xml:id="S6.I4.ix47.p1.m15">
                <XMath>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                </XMath>
              </Math>-minimal iff at most one of the elements <Math mode="inline" tex="{\beta},x_{1},x_{2}" text="list@(beta, x _ 1, x _ 2)" xml:id="S6.I4.ix47.p1.m16">
                <XMath>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.I4.ix47.p1.m16.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.I4.ix47.p1.m16.2"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.I4.ix47.p1.m16.3"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.I4.ix47.p1.m16.1">β</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S6.I4.ix47.p1.m16.2">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S6.I4.ix47.p1.m16.3">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMath>
              </Math> is ghost.</p>
          </para>
        </item>
      </enumerate>
    </para>
    <para xml:id="S6.p16">
      <p>Summarizing we obtain</p>
    </para>
    <theorem class="ltx_theorem_thm" inlist="thm theorem:thm" labels="LABEL:thm:II.9.7" xml:id="S6.Thmthm7">
      <tags>
        <tag>Theorem 7</tag>
        <tag role="refnum">7</tag>
        <tag role="typerefnum">Theorem 7</tag>
      </tags>
      <title class="ltx_runin"><tag><text font="bold">Theorem 7</text></tag></title>
      <para xml:id="S6.Thmthm7.p1">
        <p><text font="italic">Assume that <Math mode="inline" tex="V" text="V" xml:id="S6.Thmthm7.p1.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> is free with base <Math mode="inline" tex="{\varepsilon}_{1},{\varepsilon}_{2}" text="list@(varepsilon _ 1, varepsilon _ 2)" xml:id="S6.Thmthm7.p1.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.Thmthm7.p1.m2.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.Thmthm7.p1.m2.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S6.Thmthm7.p1.m2.1">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S6.Thmthm7.p1.m2.2">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="x=x_{1}{\varepsilon}_{1}+x_{2}{\varepsilon}_{2}" text="x = x _ 1 * varepsilon _ 1 + x _ 2 * varepsilon _ 2" xml:id="S6.Thmthm7.p1.m3">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> with <Math mode="inline" tex="x_{1}\neq 0" text="x _ 1 not-equals 0" xml:id="S6.Thmthm7.p1.m4">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="not-equals" name="neq" role="RELOP">≠</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, <Math mode="inline" tex="x_{2}\neq 0" text="x _ 2 not-equals 0" xml:id="S6.Thmthm7.p1.m5">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="not-equals" name="neq" role="RELOP">≠</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>.
Let <Math mode="inline" tex="q=\left[\begin{smallmatrix}{\alpha}_{1}&amp;{\beta}\\&#10;&amp;{\alpha}_{2}\end{smallmatrix}\right]" text="q = delimited-[]@(Array[[alpha _ 1, beta], [absent, alpha _ 2]])" xml:id="S6.Thmthm7.p1.m6">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="delimited-[]"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.Thmthm7.p1.m6.1"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="true">[</XMTok>
                      <XMArray xml:id="S6.Thmthm7.p1.m6.1">
                        <XMRow>
                          <XMCell align="center">
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post9"/>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="49%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMCell>
                          <XMCell align="center">
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN">β</XMTok>
                          </XMCell>
                        </XMRow>
                        <XMRow>
                          <XMCell align="center">
                            <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                          </XMCell>
                          <XMCell align="center">
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post9"/>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="49%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMCell>
                        </XMRow>
                      </XMArray>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="true">]</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>. Then <Math mode="inline" tex="x" text="x" xml:id="S6.Thmthm7.p1.m7">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> is <Math mode="inline" tex="q" text="q" xml:id="S6.Thmthm7.p1.m8">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math>-minimal exactly in the following cases:</text></p>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="S6.Thmthm7.p2">
        <enumerate xml:id="S6.I5">
          <item xml:id="S6.I5.ix48">
            <tags>
              <tag>1)</tag>
              <tag role="typerefnum">item 1)</tag>
            </tags>
            <para xml:id="S6.I5.ix48.p1">
              <p><Math mode="inline" tex="{\alpha}_{1}x_{1}^{2}{\cong_{\nu}}{\alpha}_{2}x_{2}^{2}\geq_{\nu}{\beta}x_{1}x%&#10;_{2}" text="alpha _ 1 * (x _ 1) ^ 2 approximately-equals _ nu alpha _ 2 * (x _ 2) ^ 2 &gt;= _ nu beta * x _ 1 * x _ 2" xml:id="S6.I5.ix48.p1.m1">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>

                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp meaning="approximately-equals" role="RELOP">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post5"/>
                        <XMTok meaning="approximately-equals" name="cong" role="RELOP">≅</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>

                          </XMApp>

                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp meaning="greater-than-or-equals" role="RELOP">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>

                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN">β</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>

                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMath>
                </Math><text font="italic"> and </text><Math mode="inline" tex="{\alpha}_{1},{\alpha}_{2},x_{1},x_{2}\in{\mathcal{T}}" text="list@(alpha _ 1, alpha _ 2, x _ 1, x _ 2) element-of T" xml:id="S6.I5.ix48.p1.m2">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S6.I5.ix48.p1.m2.1"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S6.I5.ix48.p1.m2.2"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S6.I5.ix48.p1.m2.3"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S6.I5.ix48.p1.m2.4"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S6.I5.ix48.p1.m2.1">
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S6.I5.ix48.p1.m2.2">
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S6.I5.ix48.p1.m2.3">
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S6.I5.ix48.p1.m2.4">
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                      <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMath>
                </Math><text font="italic">;</text></p>
            </para>
          </item>
          <item xml:id="S6.I5.ix49">
            <tags>
              <tag>2)</tag>
              <tag role="typerefnum">item 2)</tag>
            </tags>
            <para xml:id="S6.I5.ix49.p1">
              <p><Math mode="inline" tex="{\alpha}_{1}x_{1}^{2}{\cong_{\nu}}{\beta}x_{1}x_{2}&gt;_{\nu}{\alpha}_{2}x_{2}^{2}" text="alpha _ 1 * (x _ 1) ^ 2 approximately-equals _ nu beta * x _ 1 * x _ 2 &gt; _ nu alpha _ 2 * (x _ 2) ^ 2" xml:id="S6.I5.ix49.p1.m1">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp meaning="approximately-equals" role="RELOP">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post5"/>
                        <XMTok meaning="approximately-equals" name="cong" role="RELOP">≅</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN">β</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp meaning="greater-than" role="RELOP">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>

    <para xml:id="S6.p17">
      <p>Concerning <Math mode="inline" tex="g" text="g" xml:id="S6.p17.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">g</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>-anisotropic vectors we note the following immediate consequence of Theorem <ref labelref="LABEL:thm:II.9.7"/>.</p>
    </para>
    <theorem class="ltx_theorem_cor" inlist="thm theorem:cor" labels="LABEL:cor:II.9.8" xml:id="S6.Thmthm8">
      <tags>
        <tag>Corollary 8</tag>
        <tag role="refnum">8</tag>
        <tag role="typerefnum">Corollary 8</tag>
      </tags>
      <title class="ltx_runin"><tag><text font="bold">Corollary 8</text></tag></title>
      <para xml:id="S6.Thmthm8.p1">
        <p><text font="italic">Assume again that <Math mode="inline" tex="x=x_{1}{\varepsilon}_{1}+x_{2}{\varepsilon}_{2}" text="x = x _ 1 * varepsilon _ 1 + x _ 2 * varepsilon _ 2" xml:id="S6.Thmthm8.p1.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>

                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

                        <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>

                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>

                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="q=\left[\begin{smallmatrix}{\alpha}_{1}&amp;{\beta}\\&#10;&amp;{\alpha}_{2}\end{smallmatrix}\right]" text="q = delimited-[]@(Array[[alpha _ 1, beta], [absent, alpha _ 2]])" xml:id="S6.Thmthm8.p1.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>

                      <XMArray xml:id="S6.Thmthm8.p1.m2.1">
                        <XMRow>
                          <XMCell align="center">
                            <XMApp>
