                            </XMApp>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok font="upright" role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post" xml:id="S7.Thmthm3.p1.m8.1">supp</XMTok>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                <XMTok role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.Thmthm3.p1.m8.2">z</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMDual>
                          <XMTok font="upright" role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                      <XMTok font="upright" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math> or <Math mode="inline" tex="n=4," text="n = 4" xml:id="S7.Thmthm3.p1.m9">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S7.Thmthm3.p1.m9.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S7.Thmthm3.p1.m9.1">
                      <XMTok font="upright" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="upright" meaning="4" role="NUMBER">4</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math> and
<Math mode="inline" tex="|{\operatorname{supp}}(y)|=|{\operatorname{supp}}(z)|=2." text="absolute-value@(supp@(y)) = absolute-value@(supp@(z)) = 2" xml:id="S7.Thmthm3.p1.m10">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S7.Thmthm3.p1.m10.5"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S7.Thmthm3.p1.m10.5">
                      <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S7.Thmthm3.p1.m10.5.1"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok font="upright" role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                          <XMDual xml:id="S7.Thmthm3.p1.m10.5.1">
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMRef idref="S7.Thmthm3.p1.m10.1"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S7.Thmthm3.p1.m10.2"/>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok font="upright" role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post" xml:id="S7.Thmthm3.p1.m10.1">supp</XMTok>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                <XMTok role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.Thmthm3.p1.m10.2">y</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMDual>
                          <XMTok font="upright" role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                      <XMTok font="upright" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S7.Thmthm3.p1.m10.5.2"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok font="upright" role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                          <XMDual xml:id="S7.Thmthm3.p1.m10.5.2">
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMRef idref="S7.Thmthm3.p1.m10.3"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S7.Thmthm3.p1.m10.4"/>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok font="upright" role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post" xml:id="S7.Thmthm3.p1.m10.3">supp</XMTok>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                <XMTok role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.Thmthm3.p1.m10.4">z</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMDual>
                          <XMTok font="upright" role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                      <XMTok font="upright" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="upright" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math> Then <Math mode="inline" tex="x:=y\vee z" text="x assign y or z" xml:id="S7.Thmthm3.p1.m11">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="assign" role="RELOP">:=</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" meaning="or" name="vee" role="ADDOP">∨</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> is <Math mode="inline" tex="q" text="q" xml:id="S7.Thmthm3.p1.m12">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math>-minimal.</text></p>
      </para>
    </theorem>
    <proof>
      <title class="ltx_runin" font="italic">Proof.</title>
      <para xml:id="S7.p14">
        <p>We have <Math mode="inline" tex="{\operatorname{supp}}(y)\cup{\operatorname{supp}}(z)=I," text="supp@(y) union supp@(z) = I" xml:id="S7.p14.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S7.p14.m1.5"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.p14.m1.5">
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="union" name="cup" role="ADDOP">∪</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMRef idref="S7.p14.m1.1"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S7.p14.m1.2"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post" xml:id="S7.p14.m1.1">supp</XMTok>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.p14.m1.2">y</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMDual>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMRef idref="S7.p14.m1.3"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S7.p14.m1.4"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post" xml:id="S7.p14.m1.3">supp</XMTok>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.p14.m1.4">z</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> which forces <Math mode="inline" tex="{\operatorname{supp}}(y)\cap{\operatorname{supp}}(z)=\emptyset." text="supp@(y) intersection supp@(z) = empty-set" xml:id="S7.p14.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S7.p14.m2.5"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.p14.m2.5">
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="intersection" name="cap" role="ADDOP">∩</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMRef idref="S7.p14.m2.1"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S7.p14.m2.2"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post" xml:id="S7.p14.m2.1">supp</XMTok>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.p14.m2.2">y</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMDual>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMRef idref="S7.p14.m2.3"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S7.p14.m2.4"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post" xml:id="S7.p14.m2.3">supp</XMTok>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.p14.m2.4">z</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="empty-set" name="emptyset" role="ID">∅</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math></p>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="S7.p15">
        <p>a) Assume first that <Math mode="inline" tex="n=3." text="n = 3" xml:id="S7.p15.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S7.p15.m1.1"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.p15.m1.1">
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                    <XMTok meaning="3" role="NUMBER">3</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> After a permutation of the
<Math mode="inline" tex="{\varepsilon}_{i}," text="varepsilon _ i" xml:id="S7.p15.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S7.p15.m2.1"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.p15.m2.1">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> we may assume</p>
        <equation xml:id="S7.Ex12">
          <Math mode="display" tex="y=y_{1}{\varepsilon}_{1},\qquad z=z_{2}{\varepsilon}_{2}+z_{3}{\varepsilon}_{3}," text="formulae@(y = y _ 1 * varepsilon _ 1, z = z _ 2 * varepsilon _ 2 + z _ 3 * varepsilon _ 3)" xml:id="S7.Ex12.m1">

            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>and then have <Math mode="inline" tex="x=\sum\limits_{1}^{3}x_{i}{\varepsilon}_{i}" text="x = ((sum _ 1) ^ 3)@(x _ i * varepsilon _ i)" xml:id="S7.p15.m3">

              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> with</p>
        <equation xml:id="S7.Ex13">
          <Math mode="display" tex="x_{1}=y_{1},\qquad x_{2}=z_{2},\qquad x_{3}=z_{3}." text="formulae@(x _ 1 = y _ 1, formulae@(x _ 2 = z _ 2, x _ 3 = z _ 3))" xml:id="S7.Ex13.m1">

          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>It follows from Proposition <ref labelref="LABEL:prop:II.9.6"/>.a and
Corollary <ref labelref="LABEL:cor:II.9.8"/> that <Math mode="inline" tex="{\alpha}_{1}x_{1}^{2}=q(y)\in{\mathcal{T}}" text="alpha _ 1 * (x _ 1) ^ 2 = q * y element-of T" xml:id="S7.p15.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.p15.m4.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.p15.m4.1">y</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and</p>
        <equation labels="LABEL:eq:7.8" xml:id="S7.E10">
          <tags>
            <tag>(7.10)</tag>
            <tag role="refnum">7.10</tag>
          </tags>
          <Math mode="display" tex="{\alpha}_{2}x_{2}^{2}+{\alpha}_{3}x_{3}^{2}&lt;_{\nu}{\beta}_{23}x_{2}x_{3}=q(z)%&#10;\in{\mathcal{T}}." text="alpha _ 2 * (x _ 2) ^ 2 + alpha _ 3 * (x _ 3) ^ 2 less _ nu beta _ 23 * x _ 2 * x _ 3 = q * z element-of T" xml:id="S7.E10.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S7.E10.m1.2"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.E10.m1.2">
                    <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="3" role="NUMBER">3</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="3" role="NUMBER">3</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">&lt;</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN">β</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="23" role="NUMBER">23</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="3" role="NUMBER">3</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S7.E10.m1.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.E10.m1.1">z</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>Thus <Math mode="inline" tex="x_{1},x_{2},x_{3},{\alpha}_{1},{\beta}_{23}" text="list@(x _ 1, x _ 2, x _ 3, alpha _ 1, beta _ 23)" xml:id="S7.p15.m5">

        <p>Here <Math mode="inline" tex="{\beta}_{11}=b({\varepsilon}_{1},{\varepsilon}_{1})\leq_{\nu}{\alpha}" text="beta _ 11 = b * open-interval@(varepsilon _ 1, varepsilon _ 1) less= _ nu alpha" xml:id="S7.p15.m6">

          </Math> (cf.

        <equation xml:id="S7.Ex14">
          <Math mode="display" tex="q(x)={\alpha}_{1}x_{1}^{2}+{\beta}_{23}x_{2}x_{3}=eq(y)=eq(z)." text="q * x = alpha _ 1 * (x _ 1) ^ 2 + beta _ 23 * x _ 2 * x _ 3 = e * q * y = e * q * z" xml:id="S7.Ex14.m1">

        </equation>
        <p>Given <Math mode="inline" tex="x^{\prime}=\sum\limits_{1}^{3}x_{i}^{\prime}{\varepsilon}_{i}&lt;x," text="x ^ prime = ((sum _ 1) ^ 3)@((x _ i) ^ prime * varepsilon _ i) less x" xml:id="S7.p15.m7">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S7.p15.m7.1"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.p15.m7.1">
                    <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid3"/>
                        <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid3"/>
                          <XMTok mathstyle="text" meaning="sum" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="mid">∑</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="3" role="NUMBER">3</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">&lt;</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> we want to prove
that <Math mode="inline" tex="q(x^{\prime})&lt;q(x)." text="q * x ^ prime less q * x" xml:id="S7.p15.m8">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S7.p15.m8.2"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.p15.m8.2">
                    <XMTok meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">&lt;</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S7.p15.m8.2.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S7.p15.m8.2.1">
                            <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S7.p15.m8.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.p15.m8.1">x</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> It suffices to consider the case <Math mode="inline" tex="x_{1}^{\prime}&lt;x_{1}," text="(x _ 1) ^ prime less x _ 1" xml:id="S7.p15.m9">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S7.p15.m9.1"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.p15.m9.1">
                    <XMTok meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">&lt;</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>

          </Math> implies <Math mode="inline" tex="x_{i}^{\prime}&lt;_{\nu}x_{i}" text="(x _ i) ^ prime less _ nu x _ i" xml:id="S7.p15.m16">

            <XMath>

          </Math> are
tangible.</p>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="S7.p16">
        <p>In the first case <Math mode="inline" tex="{\beta}_{23}x_{2}^{\prime}x_{3}^{\prime}={\beta}_{23}x_{2}x_{3}," text="beta _ 23 * (x _ 2) ^ prime * (x _ 3) ^ prime = beta _ 23 * x _ 2 * x _ 3" xml:id="S7.p16.m1">

                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and we
learn from (<ref labelref="LABEL:eq:7.8"/>) and (<ref labelref="LABEL:eq:7.9"/>) that in the sum</p>
        <equation xml:id="S7.Ex15">
          <Math mode="display" tex="\sum_{1}^{3}{\alpha}_{i}x_{i}^{\prime}{}^{2}+\sum_{i&lt;j}{\beta}_{ij}x_{i}^{%&#10;\prime}x_{j}^{\prime}=q(x^{\prime})" xml:id="S7.Ex15.m1">

                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">&lt;</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>

                </XMApp>

              <XMApp>

                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>there is only one <Math mode="inline" tex="\nu" text="nu" xml:id="S7.p16.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>-dominant term <Math mode="inline" tex="{\beta}_{23}x_{2}x_{3}," text="beta _ 23 * x _ 2 * x _ 3" xml:id="S7.p16.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S7.p16.m3.1"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.p16.m3.1">
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN">β</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="23" role="NUMBER">23</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="3" role="NUMBER">3</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> which is
tangible. Thus</p>
        <equation xml:id="S7.Ex16">
          <Math mode="display" tex="q(x^{\prime})={\beta}_{23}x_{2}x_{3}\in{\mathcal{T}},\quad\text{and}\quad q(x^%&#10;{\prime})\cong_{\nu}q(x)." text="formulae@(q * x ^ prime = beta _ 23 * x _ 2 * x _ 3 element-of T, list@([and], q * x ^ prime) approximately-equals _ nu q * x)" xml:id="S7.Ex16.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S7.Ex16.m1.3"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMDual xml:id="S7.Ex16.m1.3">

                      <XMApp xml:id="S7.Ex16.m1.3.1">
                        <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMRef idref="S7.Ex16.m1.3.1.1"/>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                              <XMApp xml:id="S7.Ex16.m1.3.1.1">
                                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>

                              <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN">β</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="23" role="NUMBER">23</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>

                          </XMApp>

                        <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT" rpadding="10.0pt">,</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S7.Ex16.m1.3.2">
                        <XMApp meaning="approximately-equals" role="RELOP">
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok meaning="approximately-equals" name="cong" role="RELOP">≅</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S7.Ex16.m1.2"/>

                          </XMApp>
                          <XMWrap>

                            <XMApp xml:id="S7.Ex16.m1.3.2.1">

                              <XMDual>

                                <XMWrap>
                                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

                                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>

                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>

                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMRef idref="S7.Ex16.m1.1"/>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.Ex16.m1.1">x</XMTok>

                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>Since <Math mode="inline" tex="q(x)" text="q * x" xml:id="S7.p16.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S7.p16.m4.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.p16.m4.1">x</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is ghost, this implies
<Math mode="inline" tex="q(x^{\prime})&lt;q(x)." text="q * x ^ prime less q * x" xml:id="S7.p16.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S7.p16.m5.2"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.p16.m5.2">
                    <XMTok meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">&lt;</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S7.p16.m5.2.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S7.p16.m5.2.1">
                            <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S7.p16.m5.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.p16.m5.1">x</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> In the second case where <Math mode="inline" tex="x_{2}^{\prime}&lt;x_{2}," text="(x _ 2) ^ prime less x _ 2" xml:id="S7.p16.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S7.p16.m6.1"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.p16.m6.1">
                    <XMTok meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">&lt;</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> we can
argue in the same way, now obtaining
<Math mode="inline" tex="q(x^{\prime})={\alpha}_{1}x_{2}^{2}\in{\mathcal{T}}" text="q * x ^ prime = alpha _ 1 * (x _ 2) ^ 2 element-of T" xml:id="S7.p16.m7">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.p16.m7.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S7.p16.m7.1">
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and then <Math mode="inline" tex="q(x^{\prime})&lt;q(x)." text="q * x ^ prime less q * x" xml:id="S7.p16.m8">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S7.p16.m8.2"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.p16.m8.2">
                    <XMTok meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">&lt;</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S7.p16.m8.2.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S7.p16.m8.2.1">
                            <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S7.p16.m8.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> Thus <Math mode="inline" tex="x" text="x" xml:id="S7.p16.m9">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
is indeed <Math mode="inline" tex="q" text="q" xml:id="S7.p16.m10">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>-minimal.

<!--  %**** String Line 1825 **** --></p>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="S7.p17">
        <p>b) Now let <Math mode="inline" tex="n=4." text="n = 4" xml:id="S7.p17.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>

                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> We may assume that <Math mode="inline" tex="{\operatorname{supp}}(y)=\{1,2\}" text="supp@(y) = set@(1, 2)" xml:id="S7.p17.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>

                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="{\operatorname{supp}}(z)=\{3,4\}," text="supp@(z) = set@(3, 4)" xml:id="S7.p17.m3">

            </XMath>
          </Math> whence</p>
        <equation xml:id="S7.Ex17">
          <Math mode="display" tex="y=y_{1}{\varepsilon}_{1}+y_{2}{\varepsilon}_{2},\qquad z=z_{3}{\varepsilon}_{3%&#10;}+z_{4}{\varepsilon}_{4}," text="formulae@(y = y _ 1 * varepsilon _ 1 + y _ 2 * varepsilon _ 2, z = z _ 3 * varepsilon _ 3 + z _ 4 * varepsilon _ 4)" xml:id="S7.Ex17.m1">

        </equation>
        <p>and
<Math mode="inline" tex="x=\sum\limits_{1}^{4}x_{i}{\varepsilon}_{i}" text="x = ((sum _ 1) ^ 4)@(x _ i * varepsilon _ i)" xml:id="S7.p17.m4">

        <p>Trivially <Math mode="inline" tex="y=x(1,2)," text="y = x * open-interval@(1, 2)" xml:id="S7.p17.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S7.p17.m5.3"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.p17.m5.3">
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S7.p17.m5.1"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S7.p17.m5.2"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S7.p17.m5.1">1</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                          <XMTok meaning="2" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S7.p17.m5.2">2</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> <Math mode="inline" tex="z=x(3,4)." text="z = x * open-interval@(3, 4)" xml:id="S7.p17.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>

                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.p17.m6.3">

                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>

that</p>

          </Math> which implies
<Math mode="inline" tex="x_{1}^{\prime}&lt;_{\nu}x_{1}." text="(x _ 1) ^ prime less _ nu x _ 1" xml:id="S7.p17.m10">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S7.p17.m10.1"/>

                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> If <Math mode="inline" tex="q(x^{\prime})=q(x)" text="q * x ^ prime = q * x" xml:id="S7.p17.m11">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.p17.m11.2"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S7.p17.m11.2">
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.p17.m11.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.p17.m11.1">x</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> would hold, then</p>
        <equationgroup class="ltx_eqn_align" xml:id="A0.EGx7">
          <equation xml:id="S7.Ex20">
            <MathFork>
              <Math tex="\displaystyle q(x^{\prime})={\beta}_{12}x_{1}^{\prime}x_{2}+{\beta}_{34}x_{3}x%&#10;_{4}={\beta}_{34}x_{3}x_{4}." text="q * x ^ prime = beta _ 12 * (x _ 1) ^ prime * x _ 2 + beta _ 34 * x _ 3 * x _ 4 = beta _ 34 * x _ 3 * x _ 4" xml:id="S7.Ex20.m3">
                <XMath>
                  <XMDual>

                        <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>

                          <XMDual>
                            <XMRef idref="S7.Ex20.m3.1.1"/>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

                            </XMApp>

                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>

                            </XMApp>

                            </XMApp>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post9"/>

                            </XMApp>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post9"/>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="4" role="NUMBER">4</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post9"/>

                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="34" role="NUMBER">34</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post9"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>

                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post9"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>

                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMath>
              </Math>
              <MathBranch>
                <td align="right"><Math mode="inline" tex="\displaystyle q(x^{\prime})" text="q * x ^ prime" xml:id="S7.Ex20.m1">
                    <XMath>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S7.Ex20.m1.1"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMApp xml:id="S7.Ex20.m1.1">
                              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post9"/>

                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMath>
                  </Math></td>
                <td align="left"><Math mode="inline" tex="\displaystyle={\beta}_{12}x_{1}^{\prime}x_{2}+{\beta}_{34}x_{3}x_{4}={\beta}_{%&#10;34}x_{3}x_{4}." text="absent = beta _ 12 * (x _ 1) ^ prime * x _ 2 + beta _ 34 * x _ 3 * x _ 4 = beta _ 34 * x _ 3 * x _ 4" xml:id="S7.Ex20.m2">
                    <XMath>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S7.Ex20.m2.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S7.Ex20.m2.1">
                            <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>

                              <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>

                                  </XMApp>
                                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>

                                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post9"/>

                              </XMApp>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post9"/>

                                </XMApp>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post9"/>

                                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post9"/>

                              </XMApp>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post9"/>
                                <XMTok font="italic" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN">β</XMTok>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="34" role="NUMBER">34</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>

                              </XMApp>

                                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post9"/>

                          </XMApp>

                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMath>
                  </Math></td>
              </MathBranch>
            </MathFork>
          </equation>
        </equationgroup>
        <p>But <Math mode="inline" tex="q(x^{\prime})" text="q * x ^ prime" xml:id="S7.p17.m12">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S7.p17.m12.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S7.p17.m12.1">
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is tangible, while <Math mode="inline" tex="q(x)" text="q * x" xml:id="S7.p17.m13">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S7.p17.m13.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.p17.m13.1">x</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is ghost. This contraction
proves that <Math mode="inline" tex="q(x^{\prime})&lt;q(x)" text="q * x ^ prime less q * x" xml:id="S7.p17.m14">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">&lt;</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.p17.m14.2"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S7.p17.m14.2">
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.p17.m14.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.p17.m14.1">x</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, and we conclude that <Math mode="inline" tex="x" text="x" xml:id="S7.p17.m15">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is <Math mode="inline" tex="q" text="q" xml:id="S7.p17.m16">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>-minimal.
∎</p>
      </para>
    </proof>
    <para xml:id="S7.p18">
      <p>If <Math mode="inline" tex="n=3" text="n = 3" xml:id="S7.p18.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
              <XMTok meaning="3" role="NUMBER">3</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="|{\operatorname{supp}}(y)|=|{\operatorname{supp}}(z)|=z," text="absolute-value@(supp@(y)) = absolute-value@(supp@(z)) = z" xml:id="S7.p18.m2">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMRef idref="S7.p18.m2.5"/>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMApp xml:id="S7.p18.m2.5">
                  <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S7.p18.m2.5.1"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                      <XMDual xml:id="S7.p18.m2.5.1">
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMRef idref="S7.p18.m2.1"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S7.p18.m2.2"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post" xml:id="S7.p18.m2.1">supp</XMTok>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.p18.m2.2">y</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMDual>
                      <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S7.p18.m2.5.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                      <XMDual xml:id="S7.p18.m2.5.2">
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMRef idref="S7.p18.m2.3"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S7.p18.m2.4"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post" xml:id="S7.p18.m2.3">supp</XMTok>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.p18.m2.4">z</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMDual>
                      <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math> then a crude converse to
<!--  %**** String Line 1850 **** -->Theorem <ref labelref="LABEL:thm:7.2"/>, analogous to Theorem <ref labelref="LABEL:thm:7.3"/> with only
condition (<ref labelref="LABEL:eq:7.7.b"/>) replaced by (<ref labelref="LABEL:eq:7.6.b"/>), does not
hold, as the following example shows.</p>
    </para>
    <theorem class="ltx_theorem_examp" inlist="thm theorem:examp" labels="LABEL:examp:7.4" xml:id="S7.Thmthm4">
      <tags>
        <tag>Example 4</tag>
        <tag role="refnum">4</tag>
        <tag role="typerefnum">Example 4</tag>
      </tags>
      <title class="ltx_runin"><tag><text font="bold">Example 4</text></tag></title>
      <para xml:id="S7.Thmthm4.p1">
        <p><text font="italic">Let <Math mode="inline" tex="y=y_{1}{\varepsilon}_{1}+y_{2}{\varepsilon}_{2}" text="y = y _ 1 * varepsilon _ 1 + y _ 2 * varepsilon _ 2" xml:id="S7.Thmthm4.p1.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> and
<Math mode="inline" tex="z=z_{1}{\varepsilon}_{1}+z_{3}{\varepsilon}_{3}" text="z = z _ 1 * varepsilon _ 1 + z _ 3 * varepsilon _ 3" xml:id="S7.Thmthm4.p1.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="3" role="NUMBER">3</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="3" role="NUMBER">3</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> with
<Math mode="inline" tex="y_{1},y_{2},z_{1},z_{3}\in{\mathcal{T}}" text="list@(y _ 1, y _ 2, z _ 1, z _ 3) element-of T" xml:id="S7.Thmthm4.p1.m3">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S7.Thmthm4.p1.m3.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S7.Thmthm4.p1.m3.2"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S7.Thmthm4.p1.m3.3"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S7.Thmthm4.p1.m3.4"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S7.Thmthm4.p1.m3.1">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S7.Thmthm4.p1.m3.2">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S7.Thmthm4.p1.m3.3">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S7.Thmthm4.p1.m3.4">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="3" role="NUMBER">3</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMTok font="caligraphic upright" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="ey_{1}=ez_{1}," text="e * y _ 1 = e * z _ 1" xml:id="S7.Thmthm4.p1.m4">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>

        <p><text font="italic">Both <Math mode="inline" tex="y" text="y" xml:id="S7.Thmthm4.p1.m7">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
              </XMath>

              <XMath>
                <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>

              <XMath>
                <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math>-minimal and <Math mode="inline" tex="g" text="g" xml:id="S7.Thmthm4.p1.m10">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">g</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math>-anisotropic by
Corollary <ref labelref="LABEL:cor:II.9.8"/>
, and
<!--  %**** String Line 1875 **** --></text></p>
        <equation xml:id="S7.Ex23">
          <Math mode="display" tex="q(y)={\beta}_{12}y_{1}y_{2}\cong_{\nu}{\beta}_{13}z_{1}z_{3}=q(z)." text="q * y = beta _ 12 * y _ 1 * y _ 2 approximately-equals _ nu beta _ 13 * z _ 1 * z _ 3 = q * z" xml:id="S7.Ex23.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S7.Ex23.m1.3"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.Ex23.m1.3">
                    <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S7.Ex23.m1.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.Ex23.m1.1">y</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN">β</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="12" role="NUMBER">12</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp meaning="approximately-equals" role="RELOP">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok meaning="approximately-equals" name="cong" role="RELOP">≅</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN">β</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="13" role="NUMBER">13</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="3" role="NUMBER">3</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S7.Ex23.m1.2"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.Ex23.m1.2">z</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p><text font="italic">Since <Math mode="inline" tex="{\beta}_{11}:=b({\varepsilon}_{1},{\varepsilon}_{1})\leq_{\nu}{\alpha}_{1}" text="beta _ 11 assign b * open-interval@(varepsilon _ 1, varepsilon _ 1) less= _ nu alpha _ 1" xml:id="S7.Thmthm4.p1.m11">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok name="beta" role="UNKNOWN">β</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="11" role="NUMBER">11</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="assign" role="RELOP">:=</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S7.Thmthm4.p1.m11.1"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S7.Thmthm4.p1.m11.2"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S7.Thmthm4.p1.m11.2">
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

                      </XMWrap>

                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="upright" meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>

                    <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>
and <Math mode="inline" tex="ey_{1}=ez_{1}," text="e * y _ 1 = e * z _ 1" xml:id="S7.Thmthm4.p1.m12">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S7.Thmthm4.p1.m12.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S7.Thmthm4.p1.m12.1">
                      <XMTok font="upright" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>

                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math> we have</text></p>
        <equation xml:id="S7.Ex24">
          <Math mode="display" tex="b(y_{1}{\varepsilon}_{1},z_{1}{\varepsilon}_{1})\leq_{\nu}{\alpha}_{1}y_{1}^{2%&#10;}\cong_{\nu}{\alpha}_{1}z_{1}^{2}" text="b * open-interval@(y _ 1 * varepsilon _ 1, z _ 1 * varepsilon _ 1) less= _ nu alpha _ 1 * (y _ 1) ^ 2 approximately-equals _ nu alpha _ 1 * (z _ 1) ^ 2" xml:id="S7.Ex24.m1">

          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p><text font="italic">and conclude that</text></p>

        <p><text font="italic">Thus Condition (<ref labelref="LABEL:eq:7.6.b"/>) is valid. We have <Math mode="inline" tex="x=y+z," text="x = y + z" xml:id="S7.Thmthm4.p1.m13">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S7.Thmthm4.p1.m13.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S7.Thmthm4.p1.m13.1">
                      <XMTok font="upright" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="upright" meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math> whence</text></p>
        <equation xml:id="S7.Ex26">
          <Math mode="display" tex="q(x)=q(y)+q(z)+b(y,z)=eq(y)." text="q * x = q * y + q * z + b * open-interval@(y, z) = e * q * y" xml:id="S7.Ex26.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S7.Ex26.m1.7"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.Ex26.m1.7">
                    <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>

                        <XMWrap>

                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>

                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
