                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S7.Ex26.m1.3"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.Ex26.m1.3">z</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S7.Ex26.m1.4"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S7.Ex26.m1.5"/>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.Ex26.m1.4">y</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.Ex26.m1.5">z</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S7.Ex26.m1.6"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.Ex26.m1.6">y</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p><text font="italic">Let now <Math mode="inline" tex="x^{\prime}:=y_{1}{\varepsilon}_{1}+y_{2}{\varepsilon}_{2}+z_{3}{\varepsilon}_{%&#10;3}." text="x ^ prime assign y _ 1 * varepsilon _ 1 + y _ 2 * varepsilon _ 2 + z _ 3 * varepsilon _ 3" xml:id="S7.Thmthm4.p1.m14">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S7.Thmthm4.p1.m14.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S7.Thmthm4.p1.m14.1">
                      <XMTok font="upright" meaning="assign" role="RELOP">:=</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="upright" meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="3" role="NUMBER">3</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="3" role="NUMBER">3</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math>
Then <Math mode="inline" tex="x^{\prime}&lt;x," text="x ^ prime less x" xml:id="S7.Thmthm4.p1.m15">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S7.Thmthm4.p1.m15.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S7.Thmthm4.p1.m15.1">
                      <XMTok font="upright" meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">&lt;</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math> but</text></p>
        <equation xml:id="S7.Ex27">
          <Math mode="display" tex="q(x^{\prime})\geq{\beta}_{12}y_{1}y_{2}+{\beta}_{13}y_{1}z_{3}=eq(y)." text="q * x ^ prime &gt;= beta _ 12 * y _ 1 * y _ 2 + beta _ 13 * y _ 1 * z _ 3 = e * q * y" xml:id="S7.Ex27.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S7.Ex27.m1.2"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.Ex27.m1.2">
                    <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S7.Ex27.m1.2.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S7.Ex27.m1.2.1">
                            <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN">β</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="12" role="NUMBER">12</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN">β</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="13" role="NUMBER">13</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="3" role="NUMBER">3</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S7.Ex27.m1.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.Ex27.m1.1">y</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p><text font="italic">Thus <Math mode="inline" tex="q(x^{\prime})=q(x)." text="q * x ^ prime = q * x" xml:id="S7.Thmthm4.p1.m16">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S7.Thmthm4.p1.m16.2"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S7.Thmthm4.p1.m16.2">
                      <XMTok font="upright" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S7.Thmthm4.p1.m16.2.1"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMApp xml:id="S7.Thmthm4.p1.m16.2.1">
                              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                              <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S7.Thmthm4.p1.m16.1"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.Thmthm4.p1.m16.1">x</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math> This proves that <Math mode="inline" tex="x" text="x" xml:id="S7.Thmthm4.p1.m17">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> is not
<Math mode="inline" tex="q" text="q" xml:id="S7.Thmthm4.p1.m18">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math>-minimal.</text></p>
      </para>
    </theorem>
    <para xml:id="S7.p19">
      <p>The vector <Math mode="inline" tex="x=y\vee z" text="x = y or z" xml:id="S7.p19.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="or" name="vee" role="ADDOP">∨</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> in Theorem <ref labelref="LABEL:thm:7.3"/> obviously satisfies
<Math mode="inline" tex="y=x(J)," text="y = x * J" xml:id="S7.p19.m2">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMRef idref="S7.p19.m2.2"/>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMApp xml:id="S7.p19.m2.2">
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S7.p19.m2.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.p19.m2.1">J</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math> <Math mode="inline" tex="z=x(K)" text="z = x * K" xml:id="S7.p19.m3">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S7.p19.m3.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.p19.m3.1">K</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> with <Math mode="inline" tex="J:={\operatorname{supp}}(y)," text="J assign supp@(y)" xml:id="S7.p19.m4">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMRef idref="S7.p19.m4.3"/>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMApp xml:id="S7.p19.m4.3">
                  <XMTok meaning="assign" role="RELOP">:=</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">J</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMRef idref="S7.p19.m4.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S7.p19.m4.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post" xml:id="S7.p19.m4.1">supp</XMTok>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.p19.m4.2">y</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math> <Math mode="inline" tex="K:={\operatorname{supp}}(z)," text="K assign supp@(z)" xml:id="S7.p19.m5">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMRef idref="S7.p19.m5.3"/>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMApp xml:id="S7.p19.m5.3">
                  <XMTok meaning="assign" role="RELOP">:=</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMRef idref="S7.p19.m5.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S7.p19.m5.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post" xml:id="S7.p19.m5.1">supp</XMTok>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.p19.m5.2">z</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math> while for the
vector <Math mode="inline" tex="y\vee z" text="y or z" xml:id="S7.p19.m6">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="or" name="vee" role="ADDOP">∨</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> in Example <ref labelref="LABEL:examp:7.4"/> this does not hold. If
we insist on the property <Math mode="inline" tex="y=x(J)," text="y = x * J" xml:id="S7.p19.m7">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMRef idref="S7.p19.m7.2"/>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMApp xml:id="S7.p19.m7.2">
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S7.p19.m7.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.p19.m7.1">J</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math> <Math mode="inline" tex="z=x(K)," text="z = x * K" xml:id="S7.p19.m8">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMRef idref="S7.p19.m8.2"/>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMApp xml:id="S7.p19.m8.2">
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S7.p19.m8.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.p19.m8.1">K</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math> then we obtain a
converse of Theorem <ref labelref="LABEL:thm:7.2"/> also in the cases B) and D) as
follows.</p>
    </para>
    <theorem class="ltx_theorem_thm" inlist="thm theorem:thm" labels="LABEL:thm:7.5" xml:id="S7.Thmthm5">
      <tags>
        <tag>Theorem 5</tag>
        <tag role="refnum">5</tag>
        <tag role="typerefnum">Theorem 5</tag>
      </tags>
      <title class="ltx_runin"><tag><text font="bold">Theorem 5</text></tag></title>
      <para xml:id="S7.Thmthm5.p1">
        <p><text font="italic">Let <Math mode="inline" tex="n=3." text="n = 3" xml:id="S7.Thmthm5.p1.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S7.Thmthm5.p1.m1.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S7.Thmthm5.p1.m1.1">
                      <XMTok font="upright" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="upright" meaning="3" role="NUMBER">3</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math> Assume that <Math mode="inline" tex="y,z\in V" text="list@(y, z) element-of V" xml:id="S7.Thmthm5.p1.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S7.Thmthm5.p1.m2.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S7.Thmthm5.p1.m2.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.Thmthm5.p1.m2.1">y</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.Thmthm5.p1.m2.2">z</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> are <Math mode="inline" tex="g" text="g" xml:id="S7.Thmthm5.p1.m3">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">g</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math>-anisotropic and
<Math mode="inline" tex="q" text="q" xml:id="S7.Thmthm5.p1.m4">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math>-minimal with respective support <Math mode="inline" tex="J,K" text="list@(J, K)" xml:id="S7.Thmthm5.p1.m5">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.Thmthm5.p1.m5.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.Thmthm5.p1.m5.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.Thmthm5.p1.m5.1">J</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.Thmthm5.p1.m5.2">K</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math> such that <Math mode="inline" tex="|J|=2," text="absolute-value@(J) = 2" xml:id="S7.Thmthm5.p1.m6">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S7.Thmthm5.p1.m6.2"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S7.Thmthm5.p1.m6.2">
                      <XMTok font="upright" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S7.Thmthm5.p1.m6.1"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok font="upright" role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.Thmthm5.p1.m6.1">J</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="upright" role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                      <XMTok font="upright" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math> <Math mode="inline" tex="|K|=2," text="absolute-value@(K) = 2" xml:id="S7.Thmthm5.p1.m7">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S7.Thmthm5.p1.m7.2"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S7.Thmthm5.p1.m7.2">
                      <XMTok font="upright" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S7.Thmthm5.p1.m7.1"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok font="upright" role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.Thmthm5.p1.m7.1">K</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="upright" role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                      <XMTok font="upright" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math> <Math mode="inline" tex="J\cup K=I," text="J union K = I" xml:id="S7.Thmthm5.p1.m8">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S7.Thmthm5.p1.m8.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S7.Thmthm5.p1.m8.1">
                      <XMTok font="upright" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="upright" meaning="union" name="cup" role="ADDOP">∪</XMTok>
<!--  %**** String Line 1900 **** -->                        <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">J</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math> whence <Math mode="inline" tex="J\cap K" text="J intersection K" xml:id="S7.Thmthm5.p1.m9">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="intersection" name="cap" role="ADDOP">∩</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">J</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> is a singleton. Assume that <Math mode="inline" tex="y(J\cap K)=z(J\cap K)" text="y * (J intersection K) = z * (J intersection K)" xml:id="S7.Thmthm5.p1.m10">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S7.Thmthm5.p1.m10.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S7.Thmthm5.p1.m10.1">
                          <XMTok font="upright" meaning="intersection" name="cap" role="ADDOP">∩</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">J</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S7.Thmthm5.p1.m10.2"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S7.Thmthm5.p1.m10.2">
                          <XMTok font="upright" meaning="intersection" name="cap" role="ADDOP">∩</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">J</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> and furthermore that either</text></p>

        <p><text font="italic">Then <Math mode="inline" tex="x:=y\vee z" text="x assign y or z" xml:id="S7.Thmthm5.p1.m11">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="assign" role="RELOP">:=</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" meaning="or" name="vee" role="ADDOP">∨</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> is <Math mode="inline" tex="q" text="q" xml:id="S7.Thmthm5.p1.m12">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math>-minimal and, of course, <Math mode="inline" tex="x(J)=y," text="x * J = y" xml:id="S7.Thmthm5.p1.m13">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S7.Thmthm5.p1.m13.2"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S7.Thmthm5.p1.m13.2">

                        <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S7.Thmthm5.p1.m13.1"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

                            <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math>
<Math mode="inline" tex="x(K)=z." text="x * K = z" xml:id="S7.Thmthm5.p1.m14">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S7.Thmthm5.p1.m14.2"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S7.Thmthm5.p1.m14.2">

              </XMath>
            </Math></text></p>
      </para>
    </theorem>
    <proof>
      <title class="ltx_runin" font="italic">Proof.</title>
      <para xml:id="S7.p20">
        <p>We may assume that <Math mode="inline" tex="J=\{1,2\}," text="J = set@(1, 2)" xml:id="S7.p20.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S7.p20.m1.3"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.p20.m1.3">
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">J</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="set"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S7.p20.m1.1"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S7.p20.m1.2"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                        <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S7.p20.m1.1">1</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMTok meaning="2" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S7.p20.m1.2">2</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> <Math mode="inline" tex="K=\{1,3\}," text="K = set@(1, 3)" xml:id="S7.p20.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S7.p20.m2.3"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.p20.m2.3">
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="set"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S7.p20.m2.1"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S7.p20.m2.2"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                        <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S7.p20.m2.1">1</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMTok meaning="3" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S7.p20.m2.2">3</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
and then
have</p>
        <equation xml:id="S7.Ex28">
          <Math mode="display" tex="y=y_{1}{\varepsilon}_{1}+y_{2}{\varepsilon}_{2},\qquad z=z_{1}{\varepsilon}_{1%&#10;}+z_{3}{\varepsilon}_{3}" text="formulae@(y = y _ 1 * varepsilon _ 1 + y _ 2 * varepsilon _ 2, z = z _ 1 * varepsilon _ 1 + z _ 3 * varepsilon _ 3)" xml:id="S7.Ex28.m1">

              <XMDual>

                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>

                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT" rpadding="20.0pt">,</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.Ex28.m1.2">
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>

          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>with <Math mode="inline" tex="y_{1}=z_{1}." text="y _ 1 = z _ 1" xml:id="S7.p20.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S7.p20.m3.1"/>

            </XMath>
          </Math> Then
<Math mode="inline" tex="x=\sum\limits_{1}^{3}x_{i}{\varepsilon}_{i}" text="x = ((sum _ 1) ^ 3)@(x _ i * varepsilon _ i)" xml:id="S7.p20.m4">

        <p>Assume that <Math mode="inline" tex="x^{\prime}=\sum\limits_{1}^{3}x_{i}^{\prime}{\varepsilon}_{i}" text="x ^ prime = ((sum _ 1) ^ 3)@((x _ i) ^ prime * varepsilon _ i)" xml:id="S7.p20.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid3"/>
                    <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid3"/>
                      <XMTok mathstyle="text" meaning="sum" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="mid">∑</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="3" role="NUMBER">3</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is given with
either</p>
        <equationgroup class="ltx_eqn_align" xml:id="A0.EGx8">
          <equation xml:id="S7.Ex30">
            <MathFork>
              <Math tex="\displaystyle x_{1}^{\prime}&lt;x_{1},\quad x_{2}^{\prime}=x_{2},\quad x_{3}^{%&#10;\prime}=x_{3}\quad\text{or}" text="formulae@((x _ 1) ^ prime less x _ 1, formulae@((x _ 2) ^ prime = x _ 2, (x _ 3) ^ prime = list@(x _ 3, [or])))" xml:id="S7.Ex30.m2">
                <XMath>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="formulae"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S7.Ex30.m2.2"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S7.Ex30.m2.3"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S7.Ex30.m2.2">
                        <XMTok meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">&lt;</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post9"/>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post9"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>

        <p>We will prove that <Math mode="inline" tex="q(x^{\prime})&lt;q(x)," text="q * x ^ prime less q * x" xml:id="S7.p20.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S7.p20.m6.2"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.p20.m6.2">
                    <XMTok meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">&lt;</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S7.p20.m6.2.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S7.p20.m6.2.1">
                            <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S7.p20.m6.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.p20.m6.1">x</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and then will be done.</p>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="S7.p21">
        <p>Taking into account that</p>
        <equation xml:id="S7.Ex32">
          <Math mode="display" tex="b(y(J\setminus K),z(K\setminus J))=b(y_{2}{\varepsilon}_{2},z_{3}{\varepsilon}%&#10;_{3})={\beta}_{23}x_{2}x_{3}," text="b * open-interval@(y * (J set-minus K), z * (K set-minus J)) = b * open-interval@(y _ 2 * varepsilon _ 2, z _ 3 * varepsilon _ 3) = beta _ 23 * x _ 2 * x _ 3" xml:id="S7.Ex32.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S7.Ex32.m1.1"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.Ex32.m1.1">
                    <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S7.Ex32.m1.1.1"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S7.Ex32.m1.1.2"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S7.Ex32.m1.1.1">
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMRef idref="S7.Ex32.m1.1.1.1"/>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                <XMApp xml:id="S7.Ex32.m1.1.1.1">
                                  <XMTok meaning="set-minus" name="setminus" role="ADDOP">∖</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">J</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S7.Ex32.m1.1.2">
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMRef idref="S7.Ex32.m1.1.2.1"/>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                <XMApp xml:id="S7.Ex32.m1.1.2.1">
                                  <XMTok meaning="set-minus" name="setminus" role="ADDOP">∖</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">J</XMTok>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S7.Ex32.m1.1.3"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S7.Ex32.m1.1.4"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S7.Ex32.m1.1.3">
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                              <XMTok font="italic" name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S7.Ex32.m1.1.4">
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="3" role="NUMBER">3</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                              <XMTok font="italic" name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="3" role="NUMBER">3</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN">β</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="23" role="NUMBER">23</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="3" role="NUMBER">3</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>we
see that</p>

      <para xml:id="S7.p22">
        <p>Assume that (3) holds. If <Math mode="inline" tex="x_{1}^{\prime}&lt;x_{1}," text="(x _ 1) ^ prime less x _ 1" xml:id="S7.p22.m1">
            <XMath>

                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> then <Math mode="inline" tex="x_{1}^{\prime}&lt;_{\nu}x_{1}," text="(x _ 1) ^ prime less _ nu x _ 1" xml:id="S7.p22.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S7.p22.m2.1"/>

                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>

                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and
thus</p>

        <p>It follows from (1),
(2), (3) that <Math mode="inline" tex="q(x^{\prime})&lt;_{\nu}q(x)," text="q * x ^ prime less _ nu q * x" xml:id="S7.p22.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S7.p22.m3.2"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.p22.m3.2">
                    <XMApp meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">&lt;</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S7.p22.m3.2.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S7.p22.m3.2.1">
                            <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S7.p22.m3.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.p22.m3.1">x</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> whence <Math mode="inline" tex="q(x^{\prime})&lt;q(x)." text="q * x ^ prime less q * x" xml:id="S7.p22.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S7.p22.m4.2"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.p22.m4.2">
                    <XMTok meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">&lt;</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S7.p22.m4.2.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S7.p22.m4.2.1">
                            <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S7.p22.m4.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.p22.m4.1">x</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> If
<Math mode="inline" tex="x_{2}^{\prime}&lt;x_{2}," text="(x _ 2) ^ prime less x _ 2" xml:id="S7.p22.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S7.p22.m5.1"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.p22.m5.1">
                    <XMTok meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">&lt;</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> then <Math mode="inline" tex="x_{2}^{\prime}&lt;_{\nu}x_{2}," text="(x _ 2) ^ prime less _ nu x _ 2" xml:id="S7.p22.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S7.p22.m6.1"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.p22.m6.1">
                    <XMApp meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">&lt;</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and thus</p>
        <equation xml:id="S7.Ex34">
          <Math mode="display" tex="{\beta}_{12}x_{1}x_{2}&lt;_{\nu}{\beta}_{12}x_{1}x_{2},\qquad{\beta}_{23}x_{2}^{%&#10;\prime}x_{3}&lt;_{\nu}{\beta}_{23}x_{2}x_{3}." text="formulae@(beta _ 12 * x _ 1 * x _ 2 less _ nu beta _ 12 * x _ 1 * x _ 2, beta _ 23 * (x _ 2) ^ prime * x _ 3 less _ nu beta _ 23 * x _ 2 * x _ 3)" xml:id="S7.Ex34.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S7.Ex34.m1.1"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMDual xml:id="S7.Ex34.m1.1">
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="formulae"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S7.Ex34.m1.1.1"/>

                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S7.Ex34.m1.1.1">
                        <XMApp meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">&lt;</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>

                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>

                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

                          </XMApp>

                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>

                          </XMApp>

                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN">β</XMTok>

                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT" rpadding="20.0pt">,</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S7.Ex34.m1.1.2">
                        <XMApp meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">&lt;</XMTok>

                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="23" role="NUMBER">23</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="3" role="NUMBER">3</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN">β</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="23" role="NUMBER">23</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="3" role="NUMBER">3</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>Now we conclude from
(1), (2), (3) that</p>
        <equation xml:id="S7.Ex35">
          <Math mode="display" tex="q(x^{\prime})={\beta}_{13}x_{1}x_{3}\cong_{\nu}q(x)." text="q * x ^ prime = beta _ 13 * x _ 1 * x _ 3 approximately-equals _ nu q * x" xml:id="S7.Ex35.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S7.Ex35.m1.2"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.Ex35.m1.2">

                    <XMApp>

                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S7.Ex35.m1.2.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

                            <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
