                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN">β</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="13" role="NUMBER">13</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="3" role="NUMBER">3</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp meaning="approximately-equals" role="RELOP">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok meaning="approximately-equals" name="cong" role="RELOP">≅</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S7.Ex35.m1.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.Ex35.m1.1">x</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>But <Math mode="inline" tex="q(x^{\prime})\in{\mathcal{T}}," text="q * x ^ prime element-of T" xml:id="S7.p22.m7">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S7.p22.m7.1"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.p22.m7.1">
                    <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S7.p22.m7.1.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S7.p22.m7.1.1">
                            <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> <Math mode="inline" tex="q(x)\in{\mathcal{G}}," text="q * x element-of G" xml:id="S7.p22.m8">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S7.p22.m8.2"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.p22.m8.2">
                    <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S7.p22.m8.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.p22.m8.1">x</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and so
<Math mode="inline" tex="q(x^{\prime})&lt;q(x)" text="q * x ^ prime less q * x" xml:id="S7.p22.m9">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">&lt;</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.p22.m9.2"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S7.p22.m9.2">
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.p22.m9.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.p22.m9.1">x</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> again.</p>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="S7.p23">
        <p>Assume finally that (4) holds. If <Math mode="inline" tex="x_{1}^{\prime}&lt;x_{1}" text="(x _ 1) ^ prime less x _ 1" xml:id="S7.p23.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">&lt;</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, we see by the same
reasoning that</p>
        <equation xml:id="S7.Ex36">
          <Math mode="display" tex="q(x^{\prime})={\beta}_{23}x_{2}x_{3}\cong_{\nu}q(x)," text="q * x ^ prime = beta _ 23 * x _ 2 * x _ 3 approximately-equals _ nu q * x" xml:id="S7.Ex36.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S7.Ex36.m1.2"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.Ex36.m1.2">
                    <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S7.Ex36.m1.2.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S7.Ex36.m1.2.1">
                            <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN">β</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="23" role="NUMBER">23</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="3" role="NUMBER">3</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp meaning="approximately-equals" role="RELOP">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok meaning="approximately-equals" name="cong" role="RELOP">≅</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S7.Ex36.m1.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.Ex36.m1.1">x</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>while if
<Math mode="inline" tex="x_{2}^{\prime}&lt;x_{2}" text="(x _ 2) ^ prime less x _ 2" xml:id="S7.p23.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">&lt;</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> then</p>
        <equation xml:id="S7.Ex37">
          <Math mode="display" tex="q(x^{\prime})={\beta}_{13}x_{1}x_{3}\cong_{\nu}q(x)." text="q * x ^ prime = beta _ 13 * x _ 1 * x _ 3 approximately-equals _ nu q * x" xml:id="S7.Ex37.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S7.Ex37.m1.2"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.Ex37.m1.2">
                    <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S7.Ex37.m1.2.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S7.Ex37.m1.2.1">
                            <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN">β</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="13" role="NUMBER">13</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="3" role="NUMBER">3</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp meaning="approximately-equals" role="RELOP">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok meaning="approximately-equals" name="cong" role="RELOP">≅</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S7.Ex37.m1.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.Ex37.m1.1">x</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>In both cases <Math mode="inline" tex="q(x^{\prime})\in{\mathcal{T}}," text="q * x ^ prime element-of T" xml:id="S7.p23.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S7.p23.m3.1"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.p23.m3.1">
                    <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S7.p23.m3.1.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S7.p23.m3.1.1">
                            <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> <Math mode="inline" tex="q(x)\in{\mathcal{G}}," text="q * x element-of G" xml:id="S7.p23.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S7.p23.m4.2"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.p23.m4.2">
                    <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S7.p23.m4.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.p23.m4.1">x</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and so
<Math mode="inline" tex="q(x^{\prime})&lt;q(x)." text="q * x ^ prime less q * x" xml:id="S7.p23.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S7.p23.m5.2"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.p23.m5.2">
                    <XMTok meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">&lt;</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S7.p23.m5.2.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S7.p23.m5.2.1">
                            <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S7.p23.m5.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.p23.m5.1">x</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> This completes the proof that <Math mode="inline" tex="x" text="x" xml:id="S7.p23.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is <Math mode="inline" tex="q" text="q" xml:id="S7.p23.m7">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>-minimal.
∎</p>
      </para>
    </proof>
    <para xml:id="S7.p24">
      <p>We complement Theorems <ref labelref="LABEL:thm:7.2"/>, <ref labelref="LABEL:thm:7.3"/>, <ref labelref="LABEL:thm:7.5"/> by an observation on certain
<!--  %**** String Line 1975 **** -->pairs of <Math mode="inline" tex="q" text="q" xml:id="S7.p24.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>-minimal vectors.</p>
    </para>
    <theorem class="ltx_theorem_thm" inlist="thm theorem:thm" labels="LABEL:thm:7.6" xml:id="S7.Thmthm6">
      <tags>
        <tag>Theorem 6</tag>

      </tags>

      <para xml:id="S7.Thmthm6.p1">
        <p><text font="italic">Assume that <Math mode="inline" tex="x,y\in V" text="list@(x, y) element-of V" xml:id="S7.Thmthm6.p1.m1">
              <XMath>

                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> are <Math mode="inline" tex="q" text="q" xml:id="S7.Thmthm6.p1.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math>-minimal vectors with <Math mode="inline" tex="y&lt;x" text="y less x" xml:id="S7.Thmthm6.p1.m3">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">&lt;</XMTok>

              </XMath>
            </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="q(y)\cong_{\nu}q(x)." text="q * y approximately-equals _ nu q * x" xml:id="S7.Thmthm6.p1.m4">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S7.Thmthm6.p1.m4.3"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S7.Thmthm6.p1.m4.3">
                      <XMApp meaning="approximately-equals" role="RELOP">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S7.Thmthm6.p1.m4.1"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.Thmthm6.p1.m4.1">y</XMTok>

                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>

                          </XMWrap>

                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math> Let <Math mode="inline" tex="J:={\operatorname{supp}}(y)." text="J assign supp@(y)" xml:id="S7.Thmthm6.p1.m5">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S7.Thmthm6.p1.m5.3"/>

                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>

                            <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math> Then <Math mode="inline" tex="q(y)\in{\mathcal{T}}," text="q * y element-of T" xml:id="S7.Thmthm6.p1.m6">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S7.Thmthm6.p1.m6.2"/>
                  <XMWrap>

                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math> <Math mode="inline" tex="q(x)\in{\mathcal{G}}," text="q * x element-of G" xml:id="S7.Thmthm6.p1.m7">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>

                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math> and one of the following cases holds:</text></p>
        <enumerate xml:id="S7.I9">
          <item xml:id="S7.I9.ix70">

            <para xml:id="S7.I9.ix71.p1">
              <p><Math mode="inline" tex="|{\operatorname{supp}}(y)|=|{\operatorname{supp}}(x)|=2," text="absolute-value@(supp@(y)) = absolute-value@(supp@(x)) = 2" xml:id="S7.I9.ix71.p1.m1">

                                  <XMWrap>

                                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.I9.ix71.p1.m1.4">x</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                  </XMWrap>
                                </XMApp>
                              </XMDual>
                              <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                          <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                          <XMTok meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMath>
                </Math><text font="italic"> </text><Math mode="inline" tex="y&lt;x&lt;ey." text="y less x less e * y" xml:id="S7.I9.ix71.p1.m2">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S7.I9.ix71.p1.m2.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S7.I9.ix71.p1.m2.1">
                          <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                          <XMTok meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">&lt;</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                          <XMTok meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">&lt;</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMath>
                </Math><text font="italic"></text></p>
            </para>
          </item>
          <item xml:id="S7.I9.ix72">
            <tags>
              <tag>3)</tag>
              <tag role="typerefnum">item 3)</tag>
            </tags>
            <para xml:id="S7.I9.ix72.p1">
              <p><Math mode="inline" tex="|{\operatorname{supp}}(y)|=1," text="absolute-value@(supp@(y)) = 1" xml:id="S7.I9.ix72.p1.m1">

                </Math><text font="italic"> </text><Math mode="inline" tex="|{\operatorname{supp}}(x)|\geq 2," text="absolute-value@(supp@(x)) &gt;= 2" xml:id="S7.I9.ix72.p1.m2">

                                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.I9.ix72.p1.m2.2">x</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                  </XMWrap>
                                </XMApp>
                              </XMDual>
                              <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                          <XMTok meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMath>
                </Math><text font="italic"> </text><Math mode="inline" tex="y=x(J)." text="y = x * J" xml:id="S7.I9.ix72.p1.m3">
                  <XMath>

                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMRef idref="S7.I9.ix72.p1.m3.1"/>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

                                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMath>
                </Math><text font="italic"></text></p>

                              <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>

                    </XMDual>
                  </XMath>
                </Math><text font="italic"> </text><Math mode="inline" tex="y=x(J)." text="y = x * J" xml:id="S7.I9.ix73.p1.m3">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S7.I9.ix73.p1.m3.2"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S7.I9.ix73.p1.m3.2">
                          <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>

                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMRef idref="S7.I9.ix73.p1.m3.1"/>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.I9.ix73.p1.m3.1">J</XMTok>
                                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMath>
                </Math><text font="italic"></text></p>
            </para>
          </item>
        </enumerate>
      </para>
    </theorem>
    <proof>
      <title class="ltx_runin" font="italic">Proof.</title>
      <para xml:id="S7.p25">
        <p>a) We may assume that <Math mode="inline" tex="{\operatorname{supp}}(x)=\{1,\dots,n\}." text="supp@(x) = set@(1, dots, n)" xml:id="S7.p25.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S7.p25.m1.6"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.p25.m1.6">
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMRef idref="S7.p25.m1.1"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S7.p25.m1.2"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post" xml:id="S7.p25.m1.1">supp</XMTok>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.p25.m1.2">x</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMDual>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="set"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S7.p25.m1.3"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S7.p25.m1.4"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S7.p25.m1.5"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                        <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S7.p25.m1.3">1</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMTok name="dots" role="ID" xml:id="S7.p25.m1.4">…</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.p25.m1.5">n</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> We have <Math mode="inline" tex="q(y)&lt;q(x)" text="q * y less q * x" xml:id="S7.p25.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">&lt;</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.p25.m2.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.p25.m2.1">y</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.p25.m2.2"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.p25.m2.2">x</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> because <Math mode="inline" tex="x" text="x" xml:id="S7.p25.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is <Math mode="inline" tex="q" text="q" xml:id="S7.p25.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>-minimal. This forces <Math mode="inline" tex="q(y)\in{\mathcal{T}}," text="q * y element-of T" xml:id="S7.p25.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S7.p25.m5.2"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.p25.m5.2">
                    <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S7.p25.m5.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.p25.m5.1">y</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> <Math mode="inline" tex="q(x)\in{\mathcal{G}}." text="q * x element-of G" xml:id="S7.p25.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S7.p25.m6.2"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.p25.m6.2">
                    <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S7.p25.m6.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.p25.m6.1">x</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math></p>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="S7.p26">
        <p>b) Assume <Math mode="inline" tex="n=1." text="n = 1" xml:id="S7.p26.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S7.p26.m1.1"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.p26.m1.1">
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                    <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> Now <Math mode="inline" tex="y=y_{1}{\varepsilon}_{1}," text="y = y _ 1 * varepsilon _ 1" xml:id="S7.p26.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S7.p26.m2.1"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.p26.m2.1">
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> <Math mode="inline" tex="x=x_{1}{\varepsilon}_{1}," text="x = x _ 1 * varepsilon _ 1" xml:id="S7.p26.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S7.p26.m3.1"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.p26.m3.1">
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="{\alpha}_{1}^{2}y_{1}\in{\mathcal{T}}," text="(alpha _ 1) ^ 2 * y _ 1 element-of T" xml:id="S7.p26.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S7.p26.m4.1"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.p26.m4.1">
                    <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> <Math mode="inline" tex="e{\alpha}_{1}^{2}y_{1}={\alpha}_{1}^{2}y_{1}\in{\mathcal{T}}," text="e * (alpha _ 1) ^ 2 * y _ 1 = (alpha _ 1) ^ 2 * y _ 1 element-of T" xml:id="S7.p26.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S7.p26.m5.1"/>
                <XMWrap>

        <equation labels="LABEL:eq:7.12" xml:id="S7.E16">
          <tags>
            <tag>(7.16)</tag>
            <tag role="refnum">7.16</tag>
          </tags>
          <Math mode="display" tex="\sum_{1}^{n}{\alpha}_{i}x_{i}^{2}+\sum_{i&lt;j}{\beta}_{ij}x_{i}x_{j}=q(x)" text="((sum _ 1) ^ n)@(alpha _ i * (x _ i) ^ 2) + (sum _ (i less j))@(beta _ (i * j) * x _ i * x _ j) = q * x" xml:id="S7.E16.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid3"/>
                      <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid3"/>
                        <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="sum" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="mid">∑</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid3"/>
                      <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="sum" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="mid">∑</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">&lt;</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN">β</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.E16.m1.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.E16.m1.1">x</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>Since <Math mode="inline" tex="x" text="x" xml:id="S7.p27.m11">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is <Math mode="inline" tex="q" text="q" xml:id="S7.p27.m12">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>-minimal, this forces <Math mode="inline" tex="{\alpha}_{1}x_{1}^{2}\in{\mathcal{T}}" text="alpha _ 1 * (x _ 1) ^ 2 element-of T" xml:id="S7.p27.m13">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and then <Math mode="inline" tex="{\alpha}_{1}y_{1}^{2}={\alpha}_{1}x_{1}^{2}." text="alpha _ 1 * (y _ 1) ^ 2 = alpha _ 1 * (x _ 1) ^ 2" xml:id="S7.p27.m14">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S7.p27.m14.1"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.p27.m14.1">
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> We conclude that <Math mode="inline" tex="y_{1}=x_{1}," text="y _ 1 = x _ 1" xml:id="S7.p27.m15">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S7.p27.m15.1"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.p27.m15.1">
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> i.e., <Math mode="inline" tex="y=x(1)." text="y = x * 1" xml:id="S7.p27.m16">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S7.p27.m16.2"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.p27.m16.2">
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S7.p27.m16.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S7.p27.m16.1">1</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>

d) Suppose that <Math mode="inline" tex="|J|=2," text="absolute-value@(J) = 2" xml:id="S7.p27.m17">

                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> <Math mode="inline" tex="n\geq 2." text="n &gt;= 2" xml:id="S7.p27.m18">

            </XMath>
          </Math> We may assume that <Math mode="inline" tex="J=\{1,2\}." text="J = set@(1, 2)" xml:id="S7.p27.m19">

            </XMath>
          </Math> By Corollary <ref labelref="LABEL:cor:II.9.8"/>,</p>
        <equation xml:id="S7.Ex38">
          <Math mode="display" tex="{\alpha}_{1}y_{1}^{2}+{\alpha}_{2}y_{2}^{2}&lt;{\beta}_{12}y_{1}y_{2}=q(y)\in{%&#10;\mathcal{T}}." text="alpha _ 1 * (y _ 1) ^ 2 + alpha _ 2 * (y _ 2) ^ 2 less beta _ 12 * y _ 1 * y _ 2 = q * y element-of T" xml:id="S7.Ex38.m1">

                      </XMApp>

                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">&lt;</XMTok>

        </equation>
        <p>It follows from <Math mode="inline" tex="q(y)\cong_{\nu}q(x)" text="q * y approximately-equals _ nu q * x" xml:id="S7.p27.m20">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMApp meaning="approximately-equals" role="RELOP">
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.p27.m20.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.p27.m20.2"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="y_{1}\leq x_{1}," text="y _ 1 less= x _ 1" xml:id="S7.p27.m21">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S7.p27.m21.1"/>

                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> <Math mode="inline" tex="y_{2}\leq x_{2}" text="y _ 2 less= x _ 2" xml:id="S7.p27.m22">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                <XMApp>

                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> that <Math mode="inline" tex="{\beta}_{12}x_{1}x_{2}" text="beta _ 12 * x _ 1 * x _ 2" xml:id="S7.p27.m23">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>

              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is a <Math mode="inline" tex="\nu" text="nu" xml:id="S7.p27.m24">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>-dominant term in the sum (<ref labelref="LABEL:eq:7.12"/>) and <Math mode="inline" tex="{\beta}_{12}x_{1}x_{2}\cong_{\nu}{\beta}_{12}y_{1}y_{2}," text="beta _ 12 * x _ 1 * x _ 2 approximately-equals _ nu beta _ 12 * y _ 1 * y _ 2" xml:id="S7.p27.m25">
