      </para>
      <para xml:id="S7.p28">
        <p>If <Math mode="inline" tex="n&gt;2," text="n &gt; 2" xml:id="S7.p28.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S7.p28.m1.1"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.p28.m1.1">
                    <XMTok meaning="greater-than" role="RELOP">&gt;</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                    <XMTok meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> then the <Math mode="inline" tex="q" text="q" xml:id="S7.p28.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>-minimality of <Math mode="inline" tex="x" text="x" xml:id="S7.p28.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> forces <Math mode="inline" tex="{\beta}_{12}x_{1}x_{2}\in{\mathcal{T}}," text="beta _ 12 * x _ 1 * x _ 2 element-of T" xml:id="S7.p28.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S7.p28.m4.1"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.p28.m4.1">
                    <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN">β</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="12" role="NUMBER">12</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and we conclude from <Math mode="inline" tex="y_{1}\leq x_{1}" text="y _ 1 less= x _ 1" xml:id="S7.p28.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, <Math mode="inline" tex="y_{2}\leq x_{2}" text="y _ 2 less= x _ 2" xml:id="S7.p28.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> that <Math mode="inline" tex="y_{1}=x_{1}," text="y _ 1 = x _ 1" xml:id="S7.p28.m7">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S7.p28.m7.1"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.p28.m7.1">
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> <Math mode="inline" tex="y_{2}=x_{2}," text="y _ 2 = x _ 2" xml:id="S7.p28.m8">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S7.p28.m8.1"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.p28.m8.1">
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> i.e., <Math mode="inline" tex="y=x(1,2)." text="y = x * open-interval@(1, 2)" xml:id="S7.p28.m9">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S7.p28.m9.3"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.p28.m9.3">
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S7.p28.m9.1"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S7.p28.m9.2"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S7.p28.m9.1">1</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                          <XMTok meaning="2" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S7.p28.m9.2">2</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math></p>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="S7.p29">
        <p>If <Math mode="inline" tex="n=2," text="n = 2" xml:id="S7.p29.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S7.p29.m1.1"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.p29.m1.1">
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                    <XMTok meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> we conclude from <Math mode="inline" tex="q(y)&lt;q(x)" text="q * y less q * x" xml:id="S7.p29.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">&lt;</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.p29.m2.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.p29.m2.1">y</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.p29.m2.2"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.p29.m2.2">x</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> that <Math mode="inline" tex="e{\beta}_{12}y_{1}y_{2}={\beta}_{12}x_{1}x_{2}," text="e * beta _ 12 * y _ 1 * y _ 2 = beta _ 12 * x _ 1 * x _ 2" xml:id="S7.p29.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S7.p29.m3.1"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.p29.m3.1">
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN">β</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="12" role="NUMBER">12</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN">β</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="12" role="NUMBER">12</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and then that <Math mode="inline" tex="y_{1}\cong_{\nu}x_{1}," text="y _ 1 approximately-equals _ nu x _ 1" xml:id="S7.p29.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S7.p29.m4.1"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.p29.m4.1">
                    <XMApp meaning="approximately-equals" role="RELOP">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok meaning="approximately-equals" name="cong" role="RELOP">≅</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> <Math mode="inline" tex="y_{2}\cong_{\nu}x_{2}," text="y _ 2 approximately-equals _ nu x _ 2" xml:id="S7.p29.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S7.p29.m5.1"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.p29.m5.1">
                    <XMApp meaning="approximately-equals" role="RELOP">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok meaning="approximately-equals" name="cong" role="RELOP">≅</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="nu" role="UNKNOWN">ν</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> whence <Math mode="inline" tex="ex=ey." text="e * x = e * y" xml:id="S7.p29.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S7.p29.m6.1"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.p29.m6.1">
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
But <Math mode="inline" tex="x\neq ey," text="x not-equals e * y" xml:id="S7.p29.m7">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S7.p29.m7.1"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.p29.m7.1">
                    <XMTok meaning="not-equals" name="neq" role="RELOP">≠</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> since the vector <Math mode="inline" tex="ey" text="e * y" xml:id="S7.p29.m8">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is not <Math mode="inline" tex="q" text="q" xml:id="S7.p29.m9">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>-minimal. Thus either <Math mode="inline" tex="x_{1}=ey_{1}," text="x _ 1 = e * y _ 1" xml:id="S7.p29.m10">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S7.p29.m10.1"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.p29.m10.1">
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> <Math mode="inline" tex="x_{2}=y_{2}," text="x _ 2 = y _ 2" xml:id="S7.p29.m11">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S7.p29.m11.1"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.p29.m11.1">
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> or <Math mode="inline" tex="x_{1}=y_{1}," text="x _ 1 = y _ 1" xml:id="S7.p29.m12">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S7.p29.m12.1"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.p29.m12.1">
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> <Math mode="inline" tex="x_{2}=ey_{2}." text="x _ 2 = e * y _ 2" xml:id="S7.p29.m13">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S7.p29.m13.1"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.p29.m13.1">
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> We conclude that <Math mode="inline" tex="y&lt;x&lt;ey." text="y less x less e * y" xml:id="S7.p29.m14">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S7.p29.m14.1"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.p29.m14.1">
                    <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                    <XMTok meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">&lt;</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                    <XMTok meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">&lt;</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
∎</p>
      </para>
    </proof>
  </section>
